"_'' WHALING_VVG VOYAGE_NP BY_NP ONE_CD ISHMAEL_NP ._SENT 
"_'' BLOODY_JJ BATTLE_NP IN_IN AFFGHANISTAN_NP ._SENT "_'' 


Though_IN I_PP cannot_MD tell_VV why_WRB it_PP was_VBD exactly_RB that_IN/that those_DT stage_NN managers_NNS ,_, 
the_DT Fates_NP ,_, put_VVD me_PP down_RP for_IN this_DT shabby_JJ part_NN of_IN a_DT whaling_NN voyage_NN ,_, when_WRB

Chief_JJ among_IN these_DT motives_NNS was_VBD the_DT overwhelming_JJ idea_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ 
whale_VV himself_PP ._SENT Such_PDT a_DT portentous_JJ and_CC mysterious_JJ monster_NN roused_VVD all_RB 
my_PP$ curiosity_NN ._SENT Then_RB the_DT wild_JJ and_CC distant_JJ seas_NNS where_WRB he_PP rolled_VVD his_PP$

The_DT Spouter-Inn_NP ._SENT

exasperated_VVN whale_NN ,_, purposing_VVG to_TO spring_VV clean_JJ over_IN the_DT craft_NN ,_, is_VBZ in_IN

any_DT sort_NN of_IN skin_NN ._SENT But_CC then_RB ,_, what_WP to_TO make_VV of_IN his_PP$ unearthly_JJ

completely_RB independent_JJ of_IN the_DT squares_NNS of_IN tattooing_VVG ._SENT To_TO be_VB sure_JJ ,_, it_PP 
might_MD be_VB nothing_NN but_CC a_DT good_JJ coat_NN of_IN tropical_JJ tanning_VVG ;_: but_CC I_PP never_RB 
heard_VVN of_IN a_DT hot_JJ sun_NN 's_VBZ tanning_VVG a_DT white_JJ man_NN into_IN a_DT purplish_JJ yellow_NN one_PP ._SENT

there_RB produced_VVN these_DT extraordinary_JJ effects_NNS upon_IN the_DT skin_NN ._SENT Now_RB ,_, while_NN

having_VHG opened_VVN his_PP$ bag_NN ,_, he_PP commenced_VVD fumbling_VVG in_IN it_PP ,_, and_CC presently_RB

"_'' Who-e_NP debel_NP you_PP ?_SENT "_'' --he_NN at_IN last_JJ said--_NN "_'' you_PP no_DT speak-e_NN ,_, dam-me_NN ,_, I_PP

thought_VVD I_PP to_TO myself--the_NN man_NN 's_VBZ a_DT human_JJ being_VBG just_RB as_RB I_PP am_VBP :_: he_PP has_VHZ 
just_RB as_IN much_JJ reason_NN to_TO fear_VV me_PP ,_, as_IN I_PP have_VHP to_TO be_VB afraid_JJ of_IN him_PP ._SENT

"_'' Landlord_NN ,_, "_'' said_VVD I_PP ,_, "_`` tell_VV him_PP to_TO stash_VV his_PP$ tomahawk_NN there_RB ,_, or_CC pipe_NN ,_,

I_PP turned_VVD in_IN ,_, and_CC never_RB slept_VVD better_JJR in_IN my_PP$ life_NN ._SENT 



CHAPTER_NN 4_CD 

The_DT Counterpane_NP ._SENT 


Upon_IN waking_VVG next_JJ morning_NN about_IN daylight_NN ,_, I_PP found_VVD Queequeg_NP 's_POS arm_NN 
thrown_VVN over_IN me_PP in_IN the_DT most_RBS loving_JJ and_CC affectionate_JJ manner_NN ._SENT You_PP had_VHD 
almost_RB thought_VVD I_PP had_VHD been_VBN his_PP$ wife_NN ._SENT The_DT counterpane_NN was_VBD of_IN 
patchwork_JJ ,_, full_JJ of_IN odd_JJ little_JJ parti-coloured_JJ squares_NNS and_CC triangles_NNS ;_: 
and_CC this_DT arm_NN of_IN his_PP$ tattooed_VVN all_RB over_IN with_IN an_DT interminable_JJ Cretan_JJ 
labyrinth_NN of_IN a_DT figure_NN ,_, no_RB two_CD parts_NNS of_IN which_WDT were_VBD of_IN one_CD precise_JJ 
shade--owing_VVG I_PP suppose_VVP to_TO his_PP$ keeping_VVG his_PP$ arm_NN at_IN sea_NN unmethodically_RB 
in_IN sun_NN and_CC shade_NN ,_, his_PP$ shirt_NN sleeves_NNS irregularly_RB rolled_VVD up_RP at_IN various_JJ 
times--this_NNS same_JJ arm_NN of_IN his_PP$ ,_, I_PP say_VVP ,_, looked_VVD for_IN all_PDT the_DT world_NN like_IN a_DT 
strip_NN of_IN that_DT same_JJ patchwork_JJ quilt_NN ._SENT Indeed_RB ,_, partly_RB lying_VVG on_IN it_PP as_RB 
the_DT arm_NN did_VVD when_WRB I_PP first_RB awoke_VVD ,_, I_PP could_MD hardly_RB tell_VV it_PP from_IN the_DT 
quilt_NN ,_, they_PP so_RB blended_VVD their_PP$ hues_NNS together_RB ;_: and_CC it_PP was_VBD only_RB by_IN the_DT 
sense_NN of_IN weight_NN and_CC pressure_NN that_IN/that I_PP could_MD tell_VV that_IN/that Queequeg_NP was_VBD 
hugging_VVG me_PP ._SENT 

My_PP$ sensations_NNS were_VBD strange_JJ ._SENT Let_VV me_PP try_VV to_TO explain_VV them_PP ._SENT When_WRB I_PP was_VBD 
a_DT child_NN ,_, I_PP well_RB remember_VVP a_DT somewhat_RB similar_JJ circumstance_NN that_WDT befell_VVD 
me_FW ;_: whether_IN it_PP was_VBD a_DT reality_NN or_CC a_DT dream_NN ,_, I_PP never_RB could_MD entirely_RB 
settle_VV ._SENT The_DT circumstance_NN was_VBD this_DT ._SENT I_PP had_VHD been_VBN cutting_VVG up_RP some_DT caper_NN 
or_CC other--I_NNS think_VVP it_PP was_VBD trying_VVG to_TO crawl_VV up_RP the_DT chimney_NN ,_, as_IN I_PP had_VHD 
seen_VVN a_DT little_JJ sweep_NN do_VVP a_DT few_JJ days_NNS previous_JJ ;_: and_CC my_PP$ stepmother_NN who_WP ,_, 
somehow_RB or_CC other_JJ ,_, was_VBD all_PDT the_DT time_NN whipping_VVG me_PP ,_, or_CC sending_VVG me_PP to_TO bed_NN 
supperless_JJ ,_, --my_JJ mother_NN dragged_VVD me_PP by_IN the_DT legs_NNS out_RP of_IN the_DT chimney_NN and_CC 
packed_VVD me_PP off_RP to_TO bed_NN ,_, though_IN it_PP was_VBD only_RB two_CD o'clock_RB in_IN the_DT afternoon_NN 
of_IN the_DT 21st_JJ June_NP ,_, the_DT longest_JJS day_NN in_IN the_DT year_NN in_IN our_PP$ hemisphere_NN ._SENT I_PP 
felt_VVN dreadfully_RB ._SENT But_CC there_EX was_VBD no_DT help_NN for_IN it_PP ,_, so_RB up_IN stairs_NNS I_PP went_VVD 
to_TO my_PP$ little_JJ room_NN in_IN the_DT third_JJ floor_NN ,_, undressed_VVD myself_PP as_RB slowly_RB as_RB 
possible_RB so_RB as_RB to_TO kill_VV time_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN a_DT bitter_JJ sigh_NN got_VVD between_IN the_DT 
sheets_NNS ._SENT 

I_PP lay_VVD there_RB dismally_RB calculating_VVG that_IN/that sixteen_CD entire_JJ hours_NNS must_MD 
elapse_VV before_IN I_PP could_MD hope_VV for_IN a_DT resurrection_NN ._SENT Sixteen_CD hours_NNS in_IN bed_NN !_SENT 
the_DT small_JJ of_IN my_PP$ back_RB ached_VVN to_TO think_VV of_IN it_PP ._SENT And_CC it_PP was_VBD so_RB light_JJ too_RB ;_: 
the_DT sun_NN shining_VVG in_IN at_IN the_DT window_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT great_JJ rattling_VVG of_IN coaches_NNS in_IN 
the_DT streets_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT sound_NN of_IN gay_JJ voices_NNS all_RB over_IN the_DT house_NN ._SENT I_PP felt_VVD 
worse_JJR and_CC worse--at_RB last_JJ I_PP got_VVD up_RP ,_, dressed_VVN ,_, and_CC softly_RB going_VVG down_RP in_IN 
my_PP$ stockinged_JJ feet_NNS ,_, sought_VVD out_RP my_PP$ stepmother_NN ,_, and_CC suddenly_RB threw_VVD 
myself_PP at_IN her_PP$ feet_NNS ,_, beseeching_VVG her_PP as_IN a_DT particular_JJ favour_NN to_TO give_VV me_PP a_DT 
good_JJ slippering_VVG for_IN my_PP$ misbehaviour_NN ;_: anything_NN indeed_RB but_CC condemning_VVG 
me_PP to_TO lie_VV abed_RB such_PDT an_DT unendurable_JJ length_NN of_IN time_NN ._SENT But_CC she_PP was_VBD the_DT 
best_JJS and_CC most_RBS conscientious_JJ of_IN stepmothers_NNS ,_, and_CC back_RB I_PP had_VHD to_TO go_VV to_TO 
my_PP$ room_NN ._SENT For_IN several_JJ hours_NNS I_PP lay_VVD there_RB broad_JJ awake_RB ,_, feeling_VVG a_DT great_JJ 
deal_NN worse_JJR than_IN I_PP have_VHP ever_RB done_VVN since_IN ,_, even_RB from_IN the_DT greatest_JJS 
subsequent_JJ misfortunes_NNS ._SENT At_IN last_JJ I_PP must_MD have_VH fallen_VVN into_IN a_DT troubled_JJ 
nightmare_NN of_IN a_DT doze_NN ;_: and_CC slowly_RB waking_VVG from_IN it--half_NN steeped_VVN in_IN 
dreams--I_NP opened_VVD my_PP$ eyes_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT before_RB sun-lit_JJ room_NN was_VBD now_RB wrapped_VVN 
in_IN outer_JJ darkness_NN ._SENT Instantly_RB I_PP felt_VVD a_DT shock_NN running_VVG through_IN all_PDT my_PP$ 
frame_NN ;_: nothing_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB seen_VVN ,_, and_CC nothing_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB heard_VVN ;_: but_CC a_DT

CHAPTER_NN 5_CD 

Breakfast_NN ._SENT

CHAPTER_NN 6_CD 

The_DT Street_NP ._SENT 


If_IN I_PP had_VHD been_VBN astonished_VVN at_IN first_RB catching_VVG a_DT glimpse_NN of_IN so_RB outlandish_JJ

In_IN thoroughfares_NNS nigh_IN the_DT docks_NNS ,_, any_DT considerable_JJ seaport_NN will_MD 
frequently_RB offer_VV to_TO view_VV the_DT queerest_JJS looking_VVG nondescripts_NNS from_IN 
foreign_JJ parts_NNS ._SENT Even_RB in_IN Broadway_NP and_CC Chestnut_NP streets_NNS ,_, Mediterranean_NP

beats_VVZ all_DT Water_NP Street_NP and_CC Wapping_NN ._SENT In_IN these_DT last-mentioned_JJ haunts_NNS

on_IN their_PP$ bones_NNS unholy_JJ flesh_NN ._SENT It_PP makes_VVZ a_DT stranger_NN stare_NN ._SENT 

But_CC ,_, besides_IN the_DT Feegeeans_NP ,_, Tongatobooarrs_NP ,_, Erromanggoans_NP ,_, 
Pannangians_NP ,_, and_CC Brighggians_NP ,_, and_CC ,_, besides_IN the_DT wild_JJ specimens_NNS of_IN the_DT 
whaling-craft_NNS which_WDT unheeded_JJ reel_NN about_IN the_DT streets_NNS ,_, you_PP will_MD see_VV 
other_JJ sights_NNS still_RB more_RBR curious_JJ ,_, certainly_RB more_RBR comical_JJ ._SENT There_RB 
weekly_JJ arrive_VVP in_IN this_DT town_NN scores_NNS of_IN green_JJ Vermonters_NP and_CC New_NP 
Hampshire_NP men_NNS ,_, all_DT athirst_JJ for_IN gain_NN and_CC glory_NN in_IN the_DT fishery_NN ._SENT They_PP 
are_VBP mostly_RB young_JJ ,_, of_IN stalwart_JJ frames_NNS ;_: fellows_NNS who_WP have_VHP felled_VVN 
forests_NNS ,_, and_CC now_RB seek_VV to_TO drop_VV the_DT axe_NN and_CC snatch_VV the_DT whale-lance_NN ._SENT 
Many_JJ are_VBP as_RB green_JJ as_IN the_DT Green_NP Mountains_NP whence_RB they_PP came_VVD ._SENT In_IN some_DT 
things_NNS you_PP would_MD think_VV them_PP but_CC a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS old_JJ ._SENT Look_VV there_RB !_SENT that_RB 
chap_VV strutting_VVG round_NN the_DT corner_NN ._SENT He_PP wears_VVZ a_DT beaver_NN hat_NN and_NP 
swallow-tailed_JJ coat_NN ,_, girdled_VVN with_IN a_DT sailor-belt_NN and_CC sheath-knife_NN ._SENT 
Here_RB comes_VVZ another_DT with_IN a_DT sou'-wester_NN and_CC a_DT bombazine_NN cloak_NN ._SENT 

No_DT town-bred_JJ dandy_NN will_MD compare_VV with_IN a_DT country-bred_JJ one--I_NNS mean_VVP a_DT 
downright_JJ bumpkin_NN dandy--a_NN fellow_NN that_IN/that ,_, in_IN the_DT dog-days_NNS ,_, will_MD mow_VV his_PP$ 
two_CD acres_NNS in_IN buckskin_JJ gloves_NNS for_IN fear_NN of_IN tanning_VVG his_PP$ hands_NNS ._SENT Now_RB when_WRB 
a_DT country_NN dandy_NN like_IN this_DT takes_VVZ it_PP into_IN his_PP$ head_NN to_TO make_VV a_DT 
distinguished_JJ reputation_NN ,_, and_CC joins_VVZ the_DT great_JJ whale-fishery_NN ,_, you_PP 
should_MD see_VV the_DT comical_JJ things_NNS he_PP does_VVZ upon_IN reaching_VVG the_DT seaport_NN ._SENT In_RB

straps_NNS to_TO his_PP$ canvas_NN trowsers_NNS ._SENT Ah_UH ,_, poor_JJ Hay-Seed_NN !_SENT how_WRB bitterly_RB will_MD 
burst_VV those_DT straps_NNS in_IN the_DT first_JJ howling_VVG gale_NN ,_, when_WRB thou_NN art_NN driven_VVN ,_, 
straps_NNS ,_, buttons_NNS ,_, and_CC all_RB ,_, down_RB the_DT throat_NN of_IN the_DT tempest_NN ._SENT 

But_CC think_VVP not_RB that_IN/that this_DT famous_JJ town_NN has_VHZ only_JJ harpooneers_NNS ,_, cannibals_NNS ,_, 
and_CC bumpkins_NNS to_TO show_VV her_PP$ visitors_NNS ._SENT Not_RB at_IN all_DT ._SENT Still_RB New_NP Bedford_NP is_VBZ 
a_DT queer_JJ place_NN ._SENT Had_VHD it_PP not_RB been_VBN for_IN us_PP whalemen_NNS ,_, that_DT tract_NN of_IN land_NN

In_IN New_NP Bedford_NP ,_, fathers_NNS ,_, they_PP say_VVP ,_, give_VVP whales_NNS for_IN dowers_NNS to_TO their_PP$

In_IN summer_NN time_NN ,_, the_DT town_NN is_VBZ sweet_JJ to_TO see_VV ;_: full_JJ of_IN fine_NN maples--long_JJ

at_IN creation_NN 's_POS final_JJ day_NN ._SENT

CHAPTER_NN 7_CD 

The_DT Chapel_NP ._SENT 


In_IN this_DT same_JJ New_NP Bedford_NP there_RB stands_VVZ a_DT Whaleman_NP 's_POS Chapel_NP ,_, and_CC few_JJ 
are_VBP the_DT moody_JJ fishermen_NNS ,_, shortly_RB bound_VVN for_IN the_DT Indian_NP Ocean_NP or_CC

Shaking_VVG off_RP the_DT sleet_NN from_IN my_PP$ ice-glazed_JJ hat_NN and_CC jacket_NN ,_, I_PP seated_VVD

Oh_UH !_SENT ye_NN whose_WP$ dead_JJ lie_NN buried_VVN beneath_IN the_DT green_JJ grass_NN ;_: who_WP standing_NN

But_CC Faith_NP ,_, like_IN a_DT jackal_NN ,_, feeds_VVZ among_IN the_DT tombs_NNS ,_, and_CC even_RB from_IN these_DT 
dead_JJ doubts_NNS she_PP gathers_VVZ her_PP$ most_RBS vital_JJ hope_NN ._SENT 

It_PP needs_VVZ scarcely_RB to_TO be_VB told_VVN ,_, with_IN what_WP feelings_NNS ,_, on_IN the_DT eve_NN of_IN a_DT

CHAPTER_NN 8_CD 

The_DT Pulpit_NN ._SENT 


I_PP had_VHD not_RB been_VBN seated_VVN very_RB long_RB ere_IN a_DT man_NN of_IN a_DT certain_JJ venerable_JJ 
robustness_NN entered_VVD ;_: immediately_RB as_IN the_DT storm-pelted_JJ door_NN flew_VVD back_RB 
upon_IN admitting_VVG him_PP ,_, a_DT quick_JJ regardful_JJ eyeing_VVG of_IN him_PP by_IN all_PDT the_DT 
congregation_NN ,_, sufficiently_RB attested_VVD that_IN/that this_DT fine_JJ old_JJ man_NN was_VBD the_DT 
chaplain_NN ._SENT Yes_UH ,_, it_PP was_VBD the_DT famous_JJ Father_NP Mapple_NP ,_, so_RB called_VVN by_IN the_DT 
whalemen_NNS ,_, among_IN whom_WP he_PP was_VBD a_DT very_RB great_JJ favourite_NN ._SENT He_PP had_VHD been_VBN a_DT 
sailor_NN and_CC a_DT harpooneer_NN in_IN his_PP$ youth_NN ,_, but_CC for_IN many_JJ years_NNS past_NN had_VHD 
dedicated_VVN his_PP$ life_NN to_TO the_DT ministry_NN ._SENT At_IN the_DT time_NN I_PP now_RB write_VVP of_IN ,_, 
Father_NP Mapple_NP was_VBD in_IN the_DT hardy_JJ winter_NN of_IN a_DT healthy_JJ old_JJ age_NN ;_: that_DT sort_NN 
of_IN old_JJ age_NN which_WDT seems_VVZ merging_VVG into_IN a_DT second_JJ flowering_JJ youth_NN ,_, for_IN 
among_IN all_PDT the_DT fissures_NNS of_IN his_PP$ wrinkles_NNS ,_, there_RB shone_VVN certain_JJ mild_JJ

even_RB beneath_IN February_NP 's_POS snow_NN ._SENT No_DT one_PP having_VHG previously_RB heard_VVN his_PP$ 
history_NN ,_, could_MD for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN behold_VV Father_NP Mapple_NP without_IN the_DT 
utmost_JJ interest_NN ,_, because_IN there_EX were_VBD certain_JJ engrafted_VVN clerical_NN 
peculiarities_NNS about_IN him_PP ,_, imputable_JJ to_TO that_DT adventurous_JJ maritime_JJ life_NN 
he_PP had_VHD led_VVN ._SENT When_WRB he_PP entered_VVD I_PP observed_VVD that_IN/that he_PP carried_VVD no_DT umbrella_NN ,_, 
and_CC certainly_RB had_VHD not_RB come_VVN in_IN his_PP$ carriage_NN ,_, for_IN his_PP$ tarpaulin_NN hat_NN ran_VVD 
down_RB with_IN melting_VVG sleet_NN ,_, and_CC his_PP$ great_JJ pilot_NN cloth_NN jacket_NN seemed_VVD 
almost_RB to_TO drag_VV him_PP to_TO the_DT floor_NN with_IN the_DT weight_NN of_IN the_DT water_NN it_PP had_VHD 
absorbed_VVN ._SENT However_RB ,_, hat_NN and_CC coat_NN and_CC overshoes_NNS were_VBD one_CD by_IN one_CD 
removed_VVN ,_, and_CC hung_VVD up_RP in_IN a_DT little_JJ space_NN in_IN an_DT adjacent_JJ corner_NN ;_: when_WRB ,_, 
arrayed_VVN in_IN a_DT decent_JJ suit_NN ,_, he_PP quietly_RB approached_VVD the_DT pulpit_NN ._SENT 

Like_IN most_JJS old_JJ fashioned_VVN pulpits_NNS ,_, it_PP was_VBD a_DT very_RB lofty_JJ one_CD ,_, and_CC since_IN a_DT 
regular_JJ stairs_NNS to_TO such_PDT a_DT height_NN would_MD ,_, by_IN its_PP$ long_JJ angle_NN with_IN the_DT 
floor_NN ,_, seriously_RB contract_NN the_DT already_RB small_JJ area_NN of_IN the_DT chapel_NN ,_, the_DT 
architect_NN ,_, it_PP seemed_VVD ,_, had_VHD acted_VVN upon_IN the_DT hint_NN of_IN Father_NP Mapple_NP ,_, and_NP 
finished_VVD the_DT pulpit_NN without_IN a_DT stairs_NNS ,_, substituting_VVG a_DT perpendicular_NN 
side_NN ladder_NN ,_, like_IN those_DT used_VVN in_IN mounting_VVG a_DT ship_NN from_IN a_DT boat_NN at_IN sea_NN ._SENT 
The_DT wife_NN of_IN a_DT whaling_NN captain_NN had_VHD provided_VVN the_DT chapel_NN with_IN a_DT handsome_JJ 
pair_NN of_IN red_JJ worsted_NN man-ropes_NNS for_IN this_DT ladder_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, being_VBG itself_PP 
nicely_RB headed_VVN ,_, and_CC stained_VVD with_IN a_DT mahogany_NN colour_NN ,_, the_DT whole_NN

CHAPTER_NN 9_CD 

The_DT Sermon_NP ._SENT

"_'' Now_RB Jonah_NP 's_POS Captain_NP ,_, shipmates_NNS ,_, was_VBD one_CD whose_WP$ discernment_NN detects_VVZ

is_VBZ a_DT fugitive_NN ;_: but_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN resolves_NNS to_TO help_VV a_DT flight_NN that_RB 
paves_VVZ its_PP$ rear_NN with_IN gold_NN ._SENT Yet_RB when_WRB Jonah_NP fairly_RB takes_VVZ out_RP his_PP$ purse_NN ,_, 
prudent_JJ suspicions_NNS still_RB molest_VVP the_DT Captain_NP ._SENT He_PP rings_VVZ every_DT coin_NN to_TO 
find_VV a_DT counterfeit_NN ._SENT Not_RB a_DT forger_NN ,_, any_DT way_NN ,_, he_PP mutters_VVZ ;_: and_CC Jonah_NP is_VBZ 
put_VVN down_RB for_IN his_PP$ passage_NN ._SENT '_'' Point_NP out_IN my_PP$ state-room_NN ,_, Sir_NP ,_, '_'' says_VVZ Jonah_NP 
now_RB ,_, '_'' I_PP 'm_VBP travel-weary_JJ ;_: I_PP need_MD sleep_VV ._SENT '_'' '_'' Thou_NP lookest_NP like_IN it_PP ,_, '_'' says_VVZ 
the_DT Captain_NP ,_, '_'' there_EX 's_VBZ thy_NN room_NN ._SENT '_'' Jonah_NP enters_VVZ ,_, and_CC would_MD lock_VV the_DT

"_'' Screwed_VVN at_IN its_PP$ axis_NN against_IN the_DT side_NN ,_, a_DT swinging_VVG lamp_NN slightly_RB

"_`` Like_IN one_PP who_WP after_IN a_DT night_NN of_IN drunken_JJ revelry_NN hies_VVZ to_TO his_PP$ bed_NN ,_, still_RB

"_'' '_'' I_PP am_VBP a_DT Hebrew_JJ ,_, '_'' he_PP cries--and_VVP then--'I_NNS fear_VVP the_DT Lord_NP the_DT God_NP of_IN

While_IN he_PP was_VBD speaking_VVG these_DT words_NNS ,_, the_DT howling_VVG of_IN the_DT shrieking_VVG ,_,

shipmates_NNS ?_SENT To_TO preach_VV the_DT Truth_NP to_TO the_DT face_NN of_IN Falsehood_NP !_SENT That_DT was_VBD

"_'' This_DT ,_, shipmates_NNS ,_, this_DT is_VBZ that_DT other_JJ lesson_NN ;_: and_CC woe_NN to_TO that_DT pilot_NN of_IN

to_TO him_PP who_WP would_MD not_RB be_VB true_JJ ,_, even_RB though_RB to_TO be_VB false_JJ were_VBD salvation_NN !_SENT

to_TO others_NNS is_VBZ himself_PP a_DT castaway_NN !_SENT "_'' 

He_PP dropped_VVD and_CC fell_VVD away_RB from_IN himself_PP for_IN a_DT moment_NN ;_: then_RB lifting_VVG his_PP$ 
face_NN to_TO them_PP again_RB ,_, showed_VVD a_DT deep_JJ joy_NN in_IN his_PP$ eyes_NNS ,_, as_IN he_PP cried_VVD out_RP 
with_IN a_DT heavenly_JJ enthusiasm_NN ,_, --_: "_`` But_CC oh_UH !_SENT shipmates_NNS !_SENT on_IN the_DT starboard_NN

that_DT delight_NN ,_, than_IN the_DT bottom_NN of_IN the_DT woe_NN is_VBZ deep_JJ ._SENT Is_VBZ not_RB the_DT 
main-truck_NN higher_JJR than_IN the_DT kelson_NN is_VBZ low_JJ ?_SENT Delight_NN is_VBZ to_TO him--a_NN far_RB ,_,

commodores_NNS of_IN this_DT earth_NN ,_, ever_RB stands_VVZ forth_IN his_PP$ own_JJ inexorable_JJ self_NN ._SENT 
Delight_NN is_VBZ to_TO him_PP whose_WP$ strong_JJ arms_NNS yet_RB support_VVP him_PP ,_, when_WRB the_DT ship_NN of_IN

him_PP ,_, who_WP gives_VVZ no_DT quarter_NN in_IN the_DT truth_NN ,_, and_CC kills_VVZ ,_, burns_NNS ,_, and_NP

CHAPTER_NN 10_CD 

A_DT Bosom_NP Friend_NP ._SENT

CHAPTER_NN 11_CD 

Nightgown_NN ._SENT 


We_PP had_VHD lain_VVN thus_RB in_IN bed_NN ,_, chatting_VVG and_CC napping_VVG at_IN short_JJ intervals_NNS ,_, and_NP 
Queequeg_NP now_RB and_CC then_RB affectionately_RB throwing_VVG his_PP$ brown_JJ tattooed_VVN legs_NNS 
over_IN mine_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB drawing_VVG them_PP back_RB ;_: so_RB entirely_RB sociable_JJ and_CC free_JJ 
and_CC easy_RB were_VBD we_PP ;_: when_WRB ,_, at_IN last_JJ ,_, by_IN reason_NN of_IN our_PP$ confabulations_NNS ,_, 
what_WP little_JJ nappishness_NN remained_VVD in_IN us_PP altogether_RB departed_VVD ,_, and_CC we_PP 
felt_VVN like_IN getting_VVG up_RP again_RB ,_, though_IN day-break_NN was_VBD yet_RB some_DT way_NN down_RB 
the_DT future_NN ._SENT 

Yes_UH ,_, we_PP became_VVD very_RB wakeful_JJ ;_: so_RB much_RB so_RB that_IN/that our_PP$ recumbent_JJ position_NN 
began_VVD to_TO grow_VV wearisome_JJ ,_, and_CC by_IN little_JJ and_CC little_RB we_PP found_VVD ourselves_PP 
sitting_VVG up_RP ;_: the_DT clothes_NNS well_RB tucked_VVN around_IN us_PP ,_, leaning_VVG against_IN the_DT 
head-board_NN with_IN our_PP$ four_CD knees_NNS drawn_VVN up_RP close_RB together_RB ,_, and_CC our_PP$ two_CD 
noses_NNS bending_VVG over_IN them_PP ,_, as_RB if_IN our_PP$ kneepans_NNS were_VBD warming-pans_NNS ._SENT We_PP 
felt_VVN very_RB nice_JJ and_CC snug_JJ ,_, the_DT more_RBR so_RB since_IN it_PP was_VBD so_RB chilly_JJ out_IN of_IN 
doors_NNS ;_: indeed_RB out_RB of_IN bed-clothes_NNS too_RB ,_, seeing_VVG that_IN/that there_EX was_VBD no_DT fire_NN 
in_IN the_DT room_NN ._SENT The_DT more_RBR so_RB ,_, I_PP say_VVP ,_, because_IN truly_RB to_TO enjoy_VV bodily_JJ 
warmth_NN ,_, some_DT small_JJ part_NN of_IN you_PP must_MD be_VB cold_JJ ,_, for_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT quality_NN 
in_IN this_DT world_NN that_WDT is_VBZ not_RB what_WP it_PP is_VBZ merely_RB by_IN contrast_NN ._SENT Nothing_NN 
exists_VVZ in_IN itself_PP ._SENT If_IN you_PP flatter_VVP yourself_PP that_IN/that you_PP are_VBP all_RB over_RB 
comfortable_JJ ,_, and_CC have_VHP been_VBN so_RB a_DT long_JJ time_NN ,_, then_RB you_PP cannot_MD be_VB said_VVN to_TO 
be_VB comfortable_JJ any_RB more_RBR ._SENT But_CC if_IN ,_, like_IN Queequeg_NP and_CC me_PP in_IN the_DT bed_NN ,_, 
the_DT tip_NN of_IN your_PP$ nose_NN or_CC the_DT crown_NN of_IN your_PP$ head_NN be_VB slightly_RB chilled_VVN ,_, 
why_WRB then_RB ,_, indeed_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT general_JJ consciousness_NN you_PP feel_VVP most_RBS 
delightfully_RB and_CC unmistakably_RB warm_JJ ._SENT For_IN this_DT reason_NN a_DT sleeping_NN

luxurious_JJ discomforts_NNS of_IN the_DT rich_JJ ._SENT For_IN the_DT height_NN of_IN this_DT sort_NN of_IN

CHAPTER_NN 12_CD 

Biographical_JJ ._SENT 


Queequeg_NP was_VBD a_DT native_NN of_IN Rokovoko_NP ,_, an_DT island_NN far_RB away_RB to_TO the_DT West_NP 
and_CC South_NP ._SENT It_PP is_VBZ not_RB down_RB in_IN any_DT map_NN ;_: true_JJ places_NNS never_RB are_VBP ._SENT

tink_NN now_RB ?_SENT --Did_NNS n't_RB our_PP$ people_NNS laugh_NN ?_SENT "_''

CHAPTER_NN 14_CD 

Nantucket_NP ._SENT 


Nothing_NN more_JJR happened_VVN on_IN the_DT passage_NN worthy_JJ the_DT mentioning_VVG ;_: so_RB ,_, after_RB

Nantucket_NP !_SENT Take_VV out_RP your_PP$ map_NN and_CC look_VV at_IN it_PP ._SENT See_VV what_WP a_DT real_JJ corner_NN

Look_VV now_RB at_IN the_DT wondrous_JJ traditional_JJ story_NN of_IN how_WRB this_DT island_NN was_VBD

empty_JJ ivory_NN casket_NN ,_, --the_VVG poor_JJ little_JJ Indian_NP 's_POS skeleton_NN ._SENT 

What_WP wonder_VVP ,_, then_RB ,_, that_IN/that these_DT Nantucketers_NP ,_, born_VVN on_IN a_DT beach_NN ,_, should_MD 
take_VV to_TO the_DT sea_NN for_IN a_DT livelihood_NN !_SENT They_PP first_RB caught_VVD crabs_NNS and_NP

circumnavigations_NNS round_VVP it_PP ;_: peeped_VVN in_IN at_IN Behring_NP 's_POS Straits_NP ;_: and_CC in_IN

mightiest_JJS animated_JJ mass_NN that_WDT has_VHZ survived_VVN the_DT flood_NN ;_: most_RBS monstrous_JJ 
and_CC most_RBS mountainous_JJ !_SENT That_DT Himmalehan_NP ,_, salt-sea_NP Mastodon_NP ,_, clothed_VVD 
with_IN such_JJ portentousness_NN of_IN unconscious_JJ power_NN ,_, that_IN/that his_PP$ very_JJ panics_NNS

And_CC thus_RB have_VH these_DT naked_JJ Nantucketers_NP ,_, these_DT sea_NN hermits_NNS ,_, issuing_VVG 
from_IN their_PP$ ant-hill_NN in_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, overrun_VVN and_CC conquered_VVN the_DT watery_JJ

Nantucketer_NP 's_POS ._SENT For_IN the_DT sea_NN is_VBZ his_PP$ ;_: he_PP owns_VVZ it_PP ,_, as_IN Emperors_NNS own_JJ

deep_RB itself_PP ._SENT The_DT Nantucketer_NP ,_, he_PP alone_RB resides_VVZ and_CC riots_VVZ on_IN the_DT sea_NN ;_:

land_NN ;_: so_RB that_IN/that when_WRB he_PP comes_VVZ to_TO it_PP at_IN last_JJ ,_, it_PP smells_VVZ like_IN another_DT 
world_NN ,_, more_RBR strangely_RB than_IN the_DT moon_NN would_MD to_TO an_DT Earthsman_NP ._SENT With_IN the_DT 
landless_JJ gull_NN ,_, that_WDT at_IN sunset_NN folds_VVZ her_PP$ wings_NNS and_CC is_VBZ rocked_VVN to_TO sleep_VV

land_NN ,_, furls_VVZ his_PP$ sails_NNS ,_, and_CC lays_VVZ him_PP to_TO his_PP$ rest_NN ,_, while_IN under_IN his_PP$ very_JJ 
pillow_NN rush_NN herds_NNS of_IN walruses_NNS and_CC whales_NNS ._SENT 



CHAPTER_NN 15_CD 

Chowder_NN ._SENT 


It_PP was_VBD quite_RB late_JJ in_IN the_DT evening_NN when_WRB the_DT little_JJ Moss_NP came_VVD snugly_RB to_TO 
anchor_NN ,_, and_CC Queequeg_NP and_CC I_PP went_VVD ashore_RB ;_: so_RB we_PP could_MD attend_VV to_TO no_DT 
business_NN that_DT day_NN ,_, at_IN least_JJS none_NN but_CC a_DT supper_NN and_CC a_DT bed_NN ._SENT The_DT 
landlord_NN of_IN the_DT Spouter-Inn_NP had_VHD recommended_VVN us_PP to_TO his_PP$ cousin_NN Hosea_NP 
Hussey_NP of_IN the_DT Try_NP Pots_NP ,_, whom_WP he_PP asserted_VVD to_TO be_VB the_DT proprietor_NN of_IN one_CD 
of_IN the_DT best_RBS kept_VVN hotels_NNS in_IN all_DT Nantucket_NP ,_, and_CC moreover_RB he_PP had_VHD assured_VVN 
us_PP that_IN/that Cousin_NP Hosea_NP ,_, as_IN he_PP called_VVD him_PP ,_, was_VBD famous_JJ for_IN his_PP$ chowders_NNS ._SENT 
In_IN short_JJ ,_, he_PP plainly_RB hinted_VVD that_IN/that we_PP could_MD not_RB possibly_RB do_VVP better_JJR than_IN 
try_VV pot-luck_NN at_IN the_DT Try_NP Pots_NNS ._SENT But_CC the_DT directions_NNS he_PP had_VHD given_VVN us_PP 
about_IN keeping_VVG a_DT yellow_JJ warehouse_NN on_IN our_PP$ starboard_JJ hand_NN till_IN we_PP opened_VVD 
a_DT white_JJ church_NN to_TO the_DT larboard_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB keeping_VVG that_IN/that on_IN the_DT larboard_NN 
hand_NN till_IN we_PP made_VVD a_DT corner_JJ three_CD points_NNS to_TO the_DT starboard_NN ,_, and_CC that_DT 
done_VVN ,_, then_RB ask_VV the_DT first_JJ man_NN we_PP met_VVD where_WRB the_DT place_NN was_VBD :_: these_DT 
crooked_JJ directions_NNS of_IN his_PP$ very_RB much_RB puzzled_VVN us_PP at_IN first_JJ ,_, especially_RB

CHAPTER_NN 16_CD 

The_DT Ship_NN ._SENT 


In_IN bed_NN we_PP concocted_VVD our_PP$ plans_NNS for_IN the_DT morrow_NN ._SENT But_CC to_TO my_PP$ surprise_NN and_CC

You_PP may_MD have_VH seen_VVN many_JJ a_DT quaint_JJ craft_NN in_IN your_PP$ day_NN ,_, for_IN aught_NN I_PP

claw-footed_JJ look_NN about_IN her_PP ._SENT Long_RB seasoned_VVN and_CC weather-stained_VVN in_IN the_DT

vessel_NN of_IN his_PP$ own_JJ ,_, and_CC now_RB a_DT retired_VVN seaman_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD of_IN the_DT principal_NN

his_PP$ neck_NN heavy_JJ with_IN pendants_NNS of_IN polished_JJ ivory_NN ._SENT She_PP was_VBD a_DT thing_NN of_IN 
trophies_NNS ._SENT A_DT cannibal_NN of_IN a_DT craft_NN ,_, tricking_VVG herself_PP forth_RB in_IN the_DT 
chased_VVN bones_NNS of_IN her_PP$ enemies_NNS ._SENT All_DT round_NN ,_, her_PP unpanelled_VVD ,_, open_RB 
bulwarks_NNS were_VBD garnished_VVN like_IN one_CD continuous_JJ jaw_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT long_RB sharp_JJ 
teeth_NNS of_IN the_DT sperm_NN whale_NN ,_, inserted_VVN there_RB for_IN pins_NNS ,_, to_TO fasten_VV her_PP$ old_JJ 
hempen_JJ thews_NNS and_CC tendons_NNS to_TO ._SENT Those_DT thews_NNS ran_VVD not_RB through_IN base_NN blocks_NNS 
of_IN land_NN wood_NN ,_, but_CC deftly_RB travelled_VVN over_IN sheaves_NNS of_IN sea-ivory_NN ._SENT

tiller_NN ;_: and_CC that_DT tiller_NN was_VBD in_IN one_CD mass_NN ,_, curiously_RB carved_VVN from_IN the_DT 
long_RB narrow_VV lower_JJR jaw_NN of_IN her_PP$ hereditary_JJ foe_NN ._SENT The_DT helmsman_NN who_WP 
steered_VVN by_IN that_DT tiller_NN in_IN a_DT tempest_NN ,_, felt_VVN like_IN the_DT Tartar_NP ,_, when_WRB he_PP 
holds_NNS back_VVP his_PP$ fiery_JJ steed_NN by_IN clutching_VVG its_PP$ jaw_NN ._SENT A_DT noble_JJ craft_NN ,_, but_RB 
somehow_RB a_DT most_RBS melancholy_JJ !_SENT All_DT noble_JJ things_NNS are_VBP touched_VVN with_IN that_DT ._SENT 

Now_RB when_WRB I_PP looked_VVD about_IN the_DT quarter-deck_NN ,_, for_IN some_DT one_PP having_VHG 
authority_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO propose_VV myself_PP as_IN a_DT candidate_NN for_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, 
at_IN first_RB I_PP saw_VVD nobody_NN ;_: but_CC I_PP could_MD not_RB well_RB overlook_VV a_DT strange_JJ sort_NN 
of_IN tent_NN ,_, or_CC rather_RB wigwam_NN ,_, pitched_VVD a_DT little_JJ behind_IN the_DT main-mast_NN ._SENT It_PP 
seemed_VVD only_RB a_DT temporary_JJ erection_NN used_VVN in_IN port_NN ._SENT It_PP was_VBD of_IN a_DT conical_JJ 
shape_NN ,_, some_DT ten_CD feet_NNS high_JJ ;_: consisting_VVG of_IN the_DT long_JJ ,_, huge_JJ slabs_NNS of_IN 
limber_JJ black_JJ bone_NN taken_VVN from_IN the_DT middle_NN and_CC highest_JJS part_NN of_IN the_DT jaws_NNS

he_PP had_VHD long_RB since_RB come_VV to_TO the_DT sage_NN and_CC sensible_JJ conclusion_NN that_IN/that a_DT 
man_NN 's_POS religion_NN is_VBZ one_CD thing_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT practical_JJ world_NN quite_RB another_DT ._SENT 
This_DT world_NN pays_VVZ dividends_NNS ._SENT Rising_VVG from_IN a_DT little_JJ cabin-boy_NN in_IN short_JJ 
clothes_NNS of_IN the_DT drabbest_JJS drab_NN ,_, to_TO a_DT harpooneer_NN in_IN a_DT broad_JJ shad-bellied_NN

and_CC finally_RB a_DT ship_NN owner_NN ;_: Bildad_NP ,_, as_IN I_PP hinted_VVD before_RB ,_, had_VHD concluded_VVN 
his_PP$ adventurous_JJ career_NN by_IN wholly_RB retiring_VVG from_IN active_JJ life_NN at_IN the_DT

Now_RB ,_, Bildad_NP ,_, I_PP am_VBP sorry_JJ to_TO say_VV ,_, had_VHD the_DT reputation_NN of_IN being_VBG an_DT 
incorrigible_JJ old_JJ hunks_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN his_PP$ sea-going_JJ days_NNS ,_, a_DT bitter_JJ ,_, hard_JJ

"_`` Yes_UH ,_, but_CC I_PP should_MD like_VV to_TO see_VV him_PP ._SENT "_'' 

"_`` But_CC I_PP do_VVP n't_RB think_VV thou_NN wilt_NN be_VB able_JJ to_TO at_IN present_NN ._SENT I_PP do_VVP n't_RB know_VV

ever_RB ,_, thank_VVP God_NP ,_, and_CC his_PP$ Ramadan_NN only_RB comes_VVZ once_RB a_DT year_NN ;_: and_CC I_PP do_VVP n't_RB

I_PP went_VVD down_RB to_TO supper_VV ._SENT After_IN sitting_VVG a_DT long_JJ time_NN listening_VVG to_TO the_DT 
long_JJ stories_NNS of_IN some_DT sailors_NNS who_WP had_VHD just_RB come_VVN from_IN a_DT plum-pudding_NN 
voyage_NN ,_, as_IN they_PP called_VVD it_PP (_( that_DT is_VBZ ,_, a_DT short_JJ whaling-voyage_NN in_IN a_DT 
schooner_NN or_CC brig_NN ,_, confined_VVN to_TO the_DT north_NN of_IN the_DT line_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT Atlantic_NP 
Ocean_NP only_RB )_) ;_: after_IN listening_VVG to_TO these_DT plum-puddingers_NNS till_IN nearly_RB 
eleven_NN o'clock_RB ,_, I_PP went_VVD up_RP stairs_NNS to_TO go_VV to_TO bed_NN ,_, feeling_VVG quite_RB sure_JJ by_IN 
this_DT time_NN Queequeg_NN must_MD certainly_RB have_VH brought_VVN his_PP$ Ramadan_NN to_TO a_DT 
termination_NN ._SENT But_CC no_RB ;_: there_RB he_PP was_VBD just_RB where_WRB I_PP had_VHD left_VVN him_PP ;_: he_PP had_VHD 
not_RB stirred_VVD an_DT inch_NN ._SENT I_PP began_VVD to_TO grow_VV vexed_JJ with_IN him_PP ;_: it_PP seemed_VVD so_RB 
downright_RB senseless_JJ and_CC insane_JJ to_TO be_VB sitting_VVG there_RB all_DT day_NN and_CC half_NN 
the_DT night_NN on_IN his_PP$ hams_NNS in_IN a_DT cold_JJ room_NN ,_, holding_VVG a_DT piece_NN of_IN wood_NN on_IN his_PP$ 
head_NN ._SENT 

"_'' For_IN heaven_NN 's_POS sake_NN ,_, Queequeg_NP ,_, get_VV up_RP and_CC shake_VV yourself_PP ;_: get_VV up_RP and_CC 
have_VHP some_DT supper_NN ._SENT You_PP 'll_MD starve_VV ;_: you_PP 'll_MD kill_VV yourself_PP ,_, Queequeg_NP ._SENT "_'' 
But_CC not_RB a_DT word_NN did_VVD he_PP reply_VV ._SENT 

Despairing_VVG of_IN him_PP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, I_PP determined_VVD to_TO go_VV to_TO bed_NN and_CC to_TO sleep_VV ;_: 
and_CC no_DT doubt_NN ,_, before_IN a_DT great_JJ while_NN ,_, he_PP would_MD follow_VV me_PP ._SENT But_CC previous_JJ 
to_TO turning_VVG in_IN ,_, I_PP took_VVD my_PP$ heavy_JJ bearskin_NN jacket_NN ,_, and_CC threw_VVD it_PP over_RP

Ramadan_NP !_SENT 

But_CC somehow_RB I_PP dropped_VVD off_RP at_IN last_JJ ,_, and_CC knew_VVD nothing_NN more_RBR till_IN break_VV 
of_IN day_NN ;_: when_WRB ,_, looking_VVG over_IN the_DT bedside_NN ,_, there_RB squatted_VVN Queequeg_NP ,_, as_RB 
if_IN he_PP had_VHD been_VBN screwed_VVN down_RP to_TO the_DT floor_NN ._SENT But_CC as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT first_JJ

pressed_VVN his_PP$ forehead_NN again_RB against_IN mine_NN ;_: and_CC said_VVD his_PP$ Ramadan_NP was_VBD 
over_RB ._SENT 

Now_RB ,_, as_IN I_PP before_RB hinted_VVD ,_, I_PP have_VHP no_DT objection_NN to_TO any_DT person_NN 's_POS 
religion_NN ,_, be_VB it_PP what_WP it_PP may_MD ,_, so_RB long_RB as_IN that_DT person_NN does_VVZ not_RB kill_VV or_CC

also_RB ._SENT But_CC when_WRB a_DT man_NN 's_POS religion_NN becomes_VVZ really_RB frantic_JJ ;_: when_WRB it_PP is_VBZ a_DT 
positive_JJ torment_NN to_TO him_PP ;_: and_CC ,_, in_IN fine_NN ,_, makes_VVZ this_DT earth_NN of_IN ours_PP an_DT

individual_NN aside_RB and_CC argue_VVP the_DT point_NN with_IN him_PP ._SENT 

And_CC just_RB so_RB I_PP now_RB did_VVD with_IN Queequeg_NP ._SENT "_`` Queequeg_NN ,_, "_'' said_VVD I_PP ,_, "_`` get_VV into_IN

and_CC all_DT thoughts_NNS born_VVN of_IN a_DT fast_RB must_MD necessarily_RB be_VB half-starved_VVN ._SENT 
This_DT is_VBZ the_DT reason_NN why_WRB most_JJS dyspeptic_JJ religionists_NNS cherish_VVP such_JJ 
melancholy_JJ notions_NNS about_IN their_PP$ hereafters_NNS ._SENT In_IN one_CD word_NN ,_, Queequeg_NP ,_,

undigested_JJ apple-dumpling_NN ;_: and_CC since_IN then_RB perpetuated_VVN through_IN the_DT 
hereditary_JJ dyspepsias_NNS nurtured_VVN by_IN Ramadans_NNS ._SENT 

I_PP then_RB asked_VVD Queequeg_NP whether_IN he_PP himself_PP was_VBD ever_RB troubled_VVN with_IN 
dyspepsia_NN ;_: expressing_VVG the_DT idea_NN very_RB plainly_RB ,_, so_IN that_WDT he_PP could_MD take_VV it_PP

o'clock_RB in_IN the_DT afternoon_NN ,_, and_CC all_DT cooked_VVN and_CC eaten_VVN that_DT very_JJ evening_NN ._SENT 

"_'' No_RB more_RBR ,_, Queequeg_NP ,_, "_'' said_VVD I_PP ,_, shuddering_VVG ;_: "_`` that_WDT will_MD do_VV ;_: "_`` for_IN I_PP knew_VVD 
the_DT inferences_NNS without_IN his_PP$ further_JJR hinting_VVG them_PP ._SENT I_PP had_VHD seen_VVN a_DT sailor_NN 
who_WP had_VHD visited_VVN that_IN/that very_JJ island_NN ,_, and_CC he_PP told_VVD me_PP that_IN/that it_PP was_VBD the_DT 
custom_NN ,_, when_WRB a_DT great_JJ battle_NN had_VHD been_VBN gained_VVN there_RB ,_, to_TO barbecue_NN all_RB

his_PP$ friends_NNS ,_, just_RB as_RB though_IN these_DT presents_NNS were_VBD so_RB many_JJ Christmas_NP 
turkeys_NNS ._SENT 

After_IN all_DT ,_, I_PP do_VVP not_RB think_VV that_IN/that my_PP$ remarks_NNS about_IN religion_NN made_VVN much_RB 
impression_NN upon_IN Queequeg_NP ._SENT Because_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN ,_, he_PP somehow_RB

At_IN last_JJ we_PP rose_VVD and_CC dressed_VVD ;_: and_CC Queequeg_NP ,_, taking_VVG a_DT prodigiously_RB

CHAPTER_NN 18_CD 

His_PP$ Mark_NN ._SENT 


As_IN we_PP were_VBD walking_VVG down_RP the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT wharf_NN towards_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_,

"_'' What_WP do_VVP you_PP mean_VV by_IN that_DT ,_, Captain_NP Peleg_NP ?_SENT "_'' said_VVD I_PP ,_, now_RB jumping_VVG on_IN the_DT

"_`` I_PP mean_VVP ,_, "_'' he_PP replied_VVD ,_, "_`` he_PP must_MD show_VV his_PP$ papers_NNS ._SENT "_''

"_'' Why_WRB ,_, "_'' said_VVD I_PP ,_, "_`` he_PP 's_VBZ a_DT member_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ Congregational_JJ Church_NN ._SENT "_''

"_'' First_JJ Congregational_JJ Church_NN ,_, "_'' cried_VVD Bildad_NP ,_, "_`` what_WP !_SENT that_IN/that worships_VVZ in_IN

very_RB long_RB ,_, I_PP rather_RB guess_VVP ,_, young_JJ man_NN ._SENT "_''

"_`` I_PP do_VVP n't_RB know_VV anything_NN about_IN Deacon_NP Deuteronomy_NP or_CC his_PP$ meeting_NN ,_, "_'' said_VVD 
I_PP ;_: "_`` all_DT I_PP know_VVP is_VBZ ,_, that_IN/that Queequeg_NP here_RB is_VBZ a_DT born_VVN member_NN of_IN the_DT First_NP 
Congregational_JJ Church_NP ._SENT He_PP is_VBZ a_DT deacon_NN himself_PP ,_, Queequeg_NP is_VBZ ._SENT "_'' 

"_'' Young_JJ man_NN ,_, "_'' said_VVD Bildad_NP sternly_RB ,_, "_`` thou_NN art_NN skylarking_VVG with_IN

Finding_VVG myself_PP thus_RB hard_RB pushed_VVN ,_, I_PP replied_VVD ._SENT "_`` I_PP mean_VVP ,_, sir_NN ,_, the_DT same_JJ 
ancient_JJ Catholic_JJ Church_NN to_TO which_WDT you_PP and_CC I_PP ,_, and_CC Captain_NP Peleg_NP there_RB ,_,

"_'' Splice_NN ,_, thou_NNS mean'st_VVP SPLICE_JJ hands_NNS ,_, "_'' cried_VVD Peleg_NP ,_, drawing_VVG nearer_JJR ._SENT 
"_'' Young_JJ man_NN ,_, you_PP 'd_MD better_RBR ship_VV for_IN a_DT missionary_NN ,_, instead_RB of_IN a_DT

say_VV ,_, Quohog_NP ,_, or_CC whatever_WDT your_PP$ name_NN is_VBZ ,_, did_VVD you_PP ever_RB stand_VVP in_IN the_DT head_NN

Without_IN saying_VVG a_DT word_NN ,_, Queequeg_NP ,_, in_IN his_PP$ wild_JJ sort_NN of_IN way_NN ,_, jumped_VVD upon_RP 
the_DT bulwarks_NNS ,_, from_IN thence_RB into_IN the_DT bows_NNS of_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT whale-boats_NNS

"_'' Cap'ain_NP ,_, you_PP see_VVP him_PP small_JJ drop_NN tar_NN on_IN water_NN dere_NN ?_SENT You_PP see_VVP him_PP ?_SENT 
well_RB ,_, spose_VVG him_PP one_CD whale_NN eye_NN ,_, well_RB ,_, den_NN !_SENT "_'' and_CC taking_VVG sharp_JJ aim_NN at_IN

across_IN the_DT ship_NN 's_POS decks_NNS ,_, and_CC struck_VVD the_DT glistening_VVG tar_NN spot_NN out_RP of_IN 
sight_NN ._SENT 

"_'' Now_RB ,_, "_'' said_VVD Queequeg_NP ,_, quietly_RB hauling_VVG in_IN the_DT line_NN ,_, "_`` spos-ee_VV him_PP 
whale-e_JJ eye_NN ;_: why_WRB ,_, dad_NN whale_NN dead_JJ ._SENT "_'' 

"_'' Quick_RB ,_, Bildad_NP ,_, "_'' said_VVD Peleg_NP ,_, his_PP$ partner_NN ,_, who_WP ,_, aghast_JJ at_IN the_DT close_NN

must_MD have_VH Hedgehog_NP there_RB ,_, I_PP mean_VVP Quohog_NP ,_, in_IN one_CD of_IN our_PP$ boats_NNS ._SENT Look_NN

ever_RB was_VBD given_VVN a_DT harpooneer_NN yet_RB out_RB of_IN Nantucket_NP ._SENT "_'' 

So_RB down_RB we_PP went_VVD into_IN the_DT cabin_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO my_PP$ great_JJ joy_NN Queequeg_NN was_VBD soon_RB 
enrolled_VVN among_IN the_DT same_JJ ship_NN 's_POS company_NN to_TO which_WDT I_NN myself_PP belonged_VVD ._SENT 

When_WRB all_DT preliminaries_NNS were_VBD over_IN and_CC Peleg_NP had_VHD got_VVN everything_NN ready_JJ 
for_IN signing_NN ,_, he_PP turned_VVD to_TO me_PP and_CC said_VVD ,_, "_`` I_PP guess_VVP ,_, Quohog_NP there_RB do_VVP n't_RB 
know_VV how_WRB to_TO write_VV ,_, does_VVZ he_PP ?_SENT I_PP say_VVP ,_, Quohog_NP ,_, blast_NN ye_NN !_SENT dost_NN thou_NNS sign_NN 
thy_NN name_NN or_CC make_VV thy_NN mark_NN ?_SENT 

But_CC at_IN this_DT question_NN ,_, Queequeg_NP ,_, who_WP had_VHD twice_RB or_CC thrice_RB before_RB taken_VVN 
part_NN in_IN similar_JJ ceremonies_NNS ,_, looked_VVD no_DT ways_NNS abashed_VVN ;_: but_CC taking_VVG the_DT 
offered_VVN pen_NN ,_, copied_VVN upon_IN the_DT paper_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT proper_JJ place_NN ,_, an_DT exact_JJ 
counterpart_NN of_IN a_DT queer_JJ round_NN figure_NN which_WDT was_VBD tattooed_VVN upon_IN his_PP$ arm_NN ;_: 
so_RB that_IN/that through_IN Captain_NP Peleg_NP 's_POS obstinate_JJ mistake_NN touching_VVG his_PP$ 
appellative_JJ ,_, it_PP stood_VVD something_NN like_IN this_DT :_: --_: 

Quohog_NP ._SENT 
his_PP$ X_NP mark_NN ._SENT 

Meanwhile_RB Captain_NP Bildad_NP sat_VVD earnestly_RB and_CC steadfastly_RB eyeing_VVG 
Queequeg_NP ,_, and_CC at_IN last_JJ rising_VVG solemnly_RB and_CC fumbling_VVG in_IN the_DT huge_JJ 
pockets_NNS of_IN his_PP$ broad-skirted_JJ drab_JJ coat_NN ,_, took_VVD out_RP a_DT bundle_NN of_IN tracts_NNS ,_, 
and_CC selecting_VVG one_PP entitled_VVD "_`` The_DT Latter_NP Day_NP Coming_NP ;_: or_CC No_DT Time_NP to_TO 
Lose_VV ,_, "_'' placed_VVD it_PP in_IN Queequeg_NP 's_POS hands_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB grasping_VVG them_PP and_CC the_DT 
book_NN with_IN both_CC his_PP$ ,_, looked_VVD earnestly_RB into_IN his_PP$ eyes_NNS ,_, and_CC said_VVD ,_, "_`` Son_NP of_IN

"_`` Elijah_NP ._SENT "_''

CHAPTER_NN 20_CD 

All_DT Astir_NP ._SENT 


A_DT day_NN or_CC two_CD passed_VVD ,_, and_CC there_EX was_VBD great_JJ activity_NN aboard_IN the_DT Pequod_NP ._SENT 
Not_RB only_RB were_VBD the_DT old_JJ sails_NNS being_VBG mended_VVN ,_, but_CC new_JJ sails_NNS were_VBD coming_VVG 
on_IN board_NN ,_, and_CC bolts_NNS of_IN canvas_NN ,_, and_CC coils_NNS of_IN rigging_NN ;_: in_IN short_JJ ,_, 
everything_NN betokened_VVD that_IN/that the_DT ship_NN 's_POS preparations_NNS were_VBD hurrying_VVG to_TO a_DT 
close_NN ._SENT Captain_NP Peleg_NP seldom_RB or_CC never_RB went_VVD ashore_RB ,_, but_CC sat_VVD in_IN his_PP$ 
wigwam_NN keeping_VVG a_DT sharp_JJ look-out_NN upon_IN the_DT hands_NNS :_: Bildad_NP did_VVD all_PDT the_DT 
purchasing_VVG and_CC providing_VVG at_IN the_DT stores_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT men_NNS employed_VVN in_IN the_DT 
hold_NN and_CC on_IN the_DT rigging_NN were_VBD working_VVG till_IN long_RB after_IN night-fall_NN ._SENT 

On_IN the_DT day_NN following_VVG Queequeg_NP 's_POS signing_VVG the_DT articles_NNS ,_, word_NN was_VBD given_VVN 
at_IN all_PDT the_DT inns_NNS where_WRB the_DT ship_NN 's_POS company_NN were_VBD stopping_VVG ,_, that_IN/that their_PP$ 
chests_NNS must_MD be_VB on_IN board_NN before_IN night_NN ,_, for_IN there_EX was_VBD no_RB telling_VVG how_WRB 
soon_RB the_DT vessel_NN might_MD be_VB sailing_VVG ._SENT So_IN Queequeg_NP and_CC I_PP got_VVD down_RP our_PP$ 
traps_NNS ,_, resolving_VVG ,_, however_RB ,_, to_TO sleep_VV ashore_RB till_IN the_DT last_JJ ._SENT But_CC it_PP 
seems_VVZ they_PP always_RB give_VVP very_RB long_JJ notice_NN in_IN these_DT cases_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT ship_NN 
did_VVD not_RB sail_VV for_IN several_JJ days._NN But_CC no_DT wonder_NN ;_: there_EX was_VBD a_DT good_JJ deal_NN 
to_TO be_VB done_VVN ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_RB telling_VVG how_WRB many_JJ things_NNS to_TO be_VB thought_VVN of_IN ,_, 
before_IN the_DT Pequod_NP was_VBD fully_RB equipped_VVN ._SENT 

Every_DT one_CD knows_VVZ what_WP a_DT multitude_NN of_IN things--beds_NNS ,_, sauce-pans_NNS ,_, knives_NNS 
and_CC forks_NNS ,_, shovels_NNS and_CC tongs_NNS ,_, napkins_NNS ,_, nut-crackers_NNS ,_, and_CC what_WP not_RB ,_, 
are_VBP indispensable_JJ to_TO the_DT business_NN of_IN housekeeping_NN ._SENT Just_RB so_RB with_IN 
whaling_NN ,_, which_WDT necessitates_VVZ a_DT three-years_NNS '_POS housekeeping_NN upon_IN the_DT wide_JJ 
ocean_NN ,_, far_RB from_IN all_DT grocers_NNS ,_, costermongers_NNS ,_, doctors_NNS ,_, bakers_NNS ,_, and_NP 
bankers_NNS ._SENT And_CC though_IN this_DT also_RB holds_VVZ true_JJ of_IN merchant_NN vessels_NNS ,_, yet_RB 
not_RB by_IN any_DT means_NN to_TO the_DT same_JJ extent_NN as_IN with_IN whalemen_NNS ._SENT For_IN besides_RB 
the_DT great_JJ length_NN of_IN the_DT whaling_NN voyage_NN ,_, the_DT numerous_JJ articles_NNS 
peculiar_JJ to_TO the_DT prosecution_NN of_IN the_DT fishery_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT impossibility_NN of_IN 
replacing_VVG them_PP at_IN the_DT remote_JJ harbors_NNS usually_RB frequented_VVN ,_, it_PP must_MD be_VB 
remembered_VVN ,_, that_IN/that of_IN all_DT ships_NNS ,_, whaling_VVG vessels_NNS are_VBP the_DT most_RBS exposed_VVN 
to_TO accidents_NNS of_IN all_DT kinds_NNS ,_, and_CC especially_RB to_TO the_DT destruction_NN and_CC loss_NN 
of_IN the_DT very_JJ things_NNS upon_IN which_WDT the_DT success_NN of_IN the_DT voyage_NN most_RBS depends_VVZ ._SENT 
Hence_RB ,_, the_DT spare_JJ boats_NNS ,_, spare_JJ spars_NNS ,_, and_CC spare_JJ lines_NNS and_CC harpoons_NNS ,_, 
and_CC spare_JJ everythings_NNS ,_, almost_RB ,_, but_CC a_DT spare_JJ Captain_NP and_CC duplicate_JJ 
ship_NN ._SENT 

At_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN our_PP$ arrival_NN at_IN the_DT Island_NP ,_, the_DT heaviest_JJS storage_NN of_IN 
the_DT Pequod_NP had_VHD been_VBN almost_RB completed_VVN ;_: comprising_VVG her_PP$ beef_NN ,_, bread_NN ,_, 
water_NN ,_, fuel_NN ,_, and_CC iron_NN hoops_NNS and_CC staves_NNS ._SENT But_CC ,_, as_RB before_IN hinted_VVN ,_, for_IN 
some_DT time_NN there_EX was_VBD a_DT continual_JJ fetching_VVG and_CC carrying_VVG on_IN board_NN of_IN 
divers_NNS odds_NNS and_CC ends_NNS of_IN things_NNS ,_, both_CC large_JJ and_CC small_JJ ._SENT 

Chief_JJ among_IN those_DT who_WP did_VVD this_DT fetching_VVG and_CC carrying_VVG was_VBD Captain_NP 
Bildad_NP 's_POS sister_NN ,_, a_DT lean_JJ old_JJ lady_NN of_IN a_DT most_RBS determined_VVN and_CC 
indefatigable_JJ spirit_NN ,_, but_CC withal_RB very_RB kindhearted_JJ ,_, who_WP seemed_VVD 
resolved_VVN that_IN/that ,_, if_IN SHE_NP could_MD help_VV it_PP ,_, nothing_NN should_MD be_VB found_VVN wanting_VVG 
in_IN the_DT Pequod_NP ,_, after_IN once_RB fairly_RB getting_VVG to_TO sea_NN ._SENT At_IN one_CD time_NN she_PP 
would_MD come_VV on_IN board_NN with_IN a_DT jar_NN of_IN pickles_NNS for_IN the_DT steward_NN 's_POS pantry_NN ;_: 
another_DT time_NN with_IN a_DT bunch_NN of_IN quills_NNS for_IN the_DT chief_JJ mate_NN 's_POS desk_NN ,_, where_WRB 
he_PP kept_VVD his_PP$ log_NN ;_: a_DT third_JJ time_NN with_IN a_DT roll_NN of_IN flannel_NN for_IN the_DT small_JJ of_IN 
some_DT one_CD 's_VBZ rheumatic_JJ back_RB ._SENT Never_RB did_VVD any_DT woman_NN better_RBR deserve_VV her_PP 
name_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD Charity--Aunt_NP Charity_NP ,_, as_IN everybody_NN called_VVD her_PP ._SENT And_CC 
like_IN a_DT sister_NN of_IN charity_NN did_VVD this_DT charitable_JJ Aunt_NP Charity_NP bustle_NN 
about_RB hither_RB and_CC thither_RB ,_, ready_JJ to_TO turn_VV her_PP$ hand_NN and_CC heart_RB to_TO 
anything_NN that_WDT promised_VVD to_TO yield_VV safety_NN ,_, comfort_NN ,_, and_CC consolation_NN to_TO 
all_RB on_IN board_NN a_DT ship_NN in_IN which_WDT her_PP$ beloved_JJ brother_NN Bildad_NP was_VBD 
concerned_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN which_WDT she_PP herself_PP owned_VVD a_DT score_NN or_CC two_CD of_IN 
well-saved_JJ dollars_NNS ._SENT 

But_CC it_PP was_VBD startling_JJ to_TO see_VV this_DT excellent_JJ hearted_VVN Quakeress_NN coming_VVG

and_CC a_DT still_RB longer_RBR whaling_VVG lance_NN in_IN the_DT other_JJ ._SENT Nor_CC was_VBD Bildad_NP himself_PP 
nor_CC Captain_NP Peleg_NP at_IN all_DT backward_RB ._SENT As_RB for_IN Bildad_NP ,_, he_PP carried_VVD about_RB 
with_IN him_PP a_DT long_JJ list_NN of_IN the_DT articles_NNS needed_VVD ,_, and_CC at_IN every_DT fresh_JJ 
arrival_NN ,_, down_RB went_VVD his_PP$ mark_NN opposite_IN that_DT article_NN upon_IN the_DT paper_NN ._SENT 
Every_DT once_RB in_IN a_DT while_IN Peleg_NP came_VVD hobbling_VVG out_RP of_IN his_PP$ whalebone_NN den_NN ,_, 
roaring_VVG at_IN the_DT men_NNS down_IN the_DT hatchways_NNS ,_, roaring_VVG up_RP to_TO the_DT riggers_NNS at_IN 
the_DT mast-head_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB concluded_VVN by_IN roaring_VVG back_RB into_IN his_PP$ wigwam_NN ._SENT 

During_IN these_DT days_NNS of_IN preparation_NN ,_, Queequeg_NP and_CC I_PP often_RB visited_VVD the_DT 
craft_NN ,_, and_CC as_RB often_RB I_PP asked_VVD about_IN Captain_NP Ahab_NP ,_, and_CC how_WRB he_PP was_VBD ,_, and_NP

was_VBD to_TO be_VB the_DT absolute_JJ dictator_NN of_IN it_PP ,_, so_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT ship_NN sailed_VVD out_RP 
upon_IN the_DT open_JJ sea_NN ._SENT But_CC when_WRB a_DT man_NN suspects_VVZ any_DT wrong_JJ ,_, it_PP sometimes_RB 
happens_VVZ that_IN/that if_IN he_PP be_VB already_RB involved_VVN in_IN the_DT matter_NN ,_, he_PP insensibly_RB 
strives_VVZ to_TO cover_VV up_RP his_PP$ suspicions_NNS even_RB from_IN himself_PP ._SENT And_CC much_RB this_DT 
way_RB it_PP was_VBD with_IN me_PP ._SENT I_PP said_VVD nothing_NN ,_, and_CC tried_VVD to_TO think_VV nothing_NN ._SENT 

At_IN last_JJ it_PP was_VBD given_VVN out_RP that_IN/that some_DT time_NN next_JJ day_NN the_DT ship_NN would_MD 
certainly_RB sail_NN ._SENT So_IN next_JJ morning_NN ,_, Queequeg_NP and_CC I_PP took_VVD a_DT very_RB early_JJ 
start_NN ._SENT 



CHAPTER_NN 21_CD 

Going_VVG Aboard_NN ._SENT

"_'' Gracious_JJ !_SENT Queequeg_NP ,_, do_VVP n't_RB sit_VV there_EX ,_, "_'' said_VVD I_PP ._SENT

"_'' Face_NN !_SENT "_'' said_VVD I_PP ,_, "_'' call_VVP that_IN/that his_PP$ face_NN ?_SENT very_RB benevolent_JJ countenance_NN

Queequeg_NP removed_VVD himself_PP to_TO just_RB beyond_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT sleeper_NN ,_, and_NP

"_`` What_WP 's_VBZ that_IN/that for_IN ,_, Queequeg_NP ?_SENT "_'' 

"_'' Perry_NP easy_RB ,_, kill-e_VVG ;_: oh_UH !_SENT perry_NN easy_RB !_SENT 

He_PP was_VBD going_VVG on_IN with_IN some_DT wild_JJ reminiscences_NNS about_IN his_PP$ tomahawk-pipe_NN ,_,

"_`` What_WP Captain_NP ?_SENT --Ahab_NN ?_SENT "_'' 

"_`` Who_WP but_CC him_PP indeed_RB ?_SENT "_''

It_PP was_VBD now_RB clear_JJ sunrise_NN ._SENT Soon_RB the_DT crew_NN came_VVD on_IN board_NN in_IN twos_NNS and_CC

invisibly_RB enshrined_VVN within_IN his_PP$ cabin_NN ._SENT 



CHAPTER_NN 22_CD 

Merry_NP Christmas_NP ._SENT 


At_IN length_NN ,_, towards_IN noon_NN ,_, upon_IN the_DT final_JJ dismissal_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN 's_POS 
riggers_NNS ,_, and_CC after_IN the_DT Pequod_NP had_VHD been_VBN hauled_VVN out_RP from_IN the_DT wharf_NN ,_, and_NP 
after_IN the_DT ever-thoughtful_JJ Charity_NP had_VHD come_VVN off_RP in_IN a_DT whale-boat_NN ,_, with_IN 
her_PP$ last_JJ gift--a_NN night-cap_NN for_IN Stubb_NP ,_, the_DT second_JJ mate_NN ,_, her_PP 
brother-in-law_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT spare_JJ Bible_NN for_IN the_DT steward--after_NN all_RB this_DT ,_, 
the_DT two_CD Captains_NP ,_, Peleg_NP and_CC Bildad_NP ,_, issued_VVN from_IN the_DT cabin_NN ,_, and_NP 
turning_VVG to_TO the_DT chief_JJ mate_NN ,_, Peleg_NP said_VVD :_: 

"_'' Now_RB ,_, Mr._NP Starbuck_NP ,_, are_VBP you_PP sure_JJ everything_NN is_VBZ right_JJ ?_SENT Captain_NP Ahab_NP 
is_VBZ all_DT ready--just_NN spoke_VVD to_TO him--nothing_VVG more_RBR to_TO be_VB got_VVN from_IN shore_NN ,_,

CHAPTER_NN 24_CD 

The_DT Advocate_NN ._SENT 


As_IN Queequeg_NP and_CC I_PP are_VBP now_RB fairly_RB embarked_VVN in_IN this_DT business_NN of_IN 
whaling_NN ;_: and_CC as_IN this_DT business_NN of_IN whaling_NN has_VHZ somehow_RB come_VVN to_TO be_VB

pursuit_NN ;_: therefore_RB ,_, I_PP am_VBP all_DT anxiety_NN to_TO convince_VV ye_NN ,_, ye_NN landsmen_NNS ,_, of_IN

CHAPTER_NN 25_CD

CHAPTER_NN 26_CD 

Knights_NP and_CC Squires_NP ._SENT 


The_DT chief_JJ mate_NN of_IN the_DT Pequod_NP was_VBD Starbuck_NP ,_, a_DT native_NN of_IN Nantucket_NP ,_, and_NP 
a_DT Quaker_NP by_IN descent_NN ._SENT He_PP was_VBD a_DT long_JJ ,_, earnest_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC though_RB born_VVN on_RP 
an_DT icy_JJ coast_NN ,_, seemed_VVD well_RB adapted_VVN to_TO endure_VV hot_JJ latitudes_NNS ,_, his_PP$ flesh_NN 
being_VBG hard_JJ as_IN twice-baked_JJ biscuit_NN ._SENT Transported_VVN to_TO the_DT Indies_NP ,_, his_PP$ 
live_JJ blood_NN would_MD not_RB spoil_VV like_IN bottled_JJ ale_NN ._SENT He_PP must_MD have_VH been_VBN born_VVN 
in_IN some_DT time_NN of_IN general_JJ drought_NN and_CC famine_NN ,_, or_CC upon_IN one_CD of_IN those_DT fast_JJ 
days_NNS for_IN which_WDT his_PP$ state_NN is_VBZ famous_JJ ._SENT Only_RB some_DT thirty_CD arid_JJ summers_NNS 
had_VHD he_PP seen_VVN ;_: those_DT summers_NNS had_VHD dried_VVN up_RP all_PDT his_PP$ physical_JJ

Knights_NP and_CC Squires_NP ._SENT 


Stubb_NP was_VBD the_DT second_JJ mate_NN ._SENT He_PP was_VBD a_DT native_NN of_IN Cape_NP Cod_NP ;_: and_CC hence_RB ,_,

picked_VVN trio_NN of_IN lancers_NNS ;_: even_RB as_IN the_DT harpooneers_NNS were_VBD flingers_NNS of_IN

And_CC since_IN in_IN this_DT famous_JJ fishery_NN ,_, each_DT mate_NN or_CC headsman_NN ,_, like_IN a_DT 
Gothic_JJ Knight_NP of_IN old_JJ ,_, is_VBZ always_RB accompanied_VVN by_IN his_PP$ boat-steerer_NN or_CC

lance_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT former_JJ one_CD has_VHZ been_VBN badly_RB twisted_VVN ,_, or_CC elbowed_VVD in_IN the_DT 
assault_NN ;_: and_CC moreover_RB ,_, as_IN there_EX generally_RB subsists_VVZ between_IN the_DT two_CD ,_, a_DT

headsman_NN each_DT of_IN them_PP belonged_VVD ._SENT

CHAPTER_NN 28_CD 

Ahab_NP ._SENT 


For_IN several_JJ days_NNS after_IN leaving_VVG Nantucket_NP ,_, nothing_NN above_IN hatches_NNS was_VBD

seemed_VVD to_TO be_VB the_DT only_JJ commanders_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN ;_: only_RB they_PP sometimes_RB 
issued_VVN from_IN the_DT cabin_NN with_IN orders_NNS so_IN sudden_JJ and_CC peremptory_JJ ,_, that_RB 
after_IN all_DT it_PP was_VBD plain_JJ they_PP but_CC commanded_VVD vicariously_RB ._SENT Yes_UH ,_, their_PP$ 
supreme_JJ lord_NN and_CC dictator_NN was_VBD there_RB ,_, though_IN hitherto_RB unseen_JJ by_IN any_DT 
eyes_NNS not_RB permitted_VVN to_TO penetrate_VV into_IN the_DT now_RB sacred_JJ retreat_NN of_IN the_DT 
cabin_NN ._SENT 

Every_DT time_NN I_PP ascended_VVD to_TO the_DT deck_NN from_IN my_PP$ watches_NNS below_RB ,_, I_PP instantly_RB

of_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, became_VVD almost_RB a_DT perturbation_NN ._SENT This_DT was_VBD strangely_RB

before_IN conceived_VVN of_IN ._SENT But_CC poorly_RB could_MD I_PP withstand_VV them_PP ,_, much_RB as_RB in_IN

could_MD not_RB readily_RB be_VB found_VVN ,_, and_CC they_PP were_VBD every_DT one_CD of_IN them_PP 
Americans_NPS ;_: a_DT Nantucketer_NP ,_, a_DT Vineyarder_NP ,_, a_DT Cape_NP man_NN ._SENT Now_RB ,_, it_PP being_VBG 
Christmas_NP when_WRB the_DT ship_NN shot_VVD from_IN out_IN her_PP$ harbor_NN ,_, for_IN a_DT space_NN we_PP had_VHD 
biting_JJ Polar_NP weather_NN ,_, though_IN all_PDT the_DT time_NN running_VVG away_RB from_IN it_PP to_TO the_DT

quarter-deck_NN ._SENT

So_RB powerfully_RB did_VVD the_DT whole_JJ grim_JJ aspect_NN of_IN Ahab_NP affect_VVP me_PP ,_, and_CC the_DT

I_PP was_VBD struck_VVN with_IN the_DT singular_JJ posture_NN he_PP maintained_VVD ._SENT Upon_IN each_DT side_NN

crucifixion_NN in_IN his_PP$ face_NN ;_: in_IN all_PDT the_DT nameless_JJ regal_NN overbearing_VVG 
dignity_NN of_IN some_DT mighty_JJ woe_NN ._SENT 

Ere_IN long_RB ,_, from_IN his_PP$ first_JJ visit_NN in_IN the_DT air_NN ,_, he_PP withdrew_VVD into_IN his_PP$ 
cabin_NN ._SENT But_CC after_IN that_DT morning_NN ,_, he_PP was_VBD every_DT day_NN visible_JJ to_TO the_DT crew_NN ;_:

air_NN ;_: but_CC ,_, as_IN yet_RB ,_, for_IN all_DT that_WDT he_PP said_VVD ,_, or_CC perceptibly_RB did_VVD ,_, on_IN the_DT at_IN 
last_JJ sunny_JJ deck_NN ,_, he_PP seemed_VVD as_RB unnecessary_JJ there_RB as_IN another_DT mast_NN ._SENT But_RB

spouting_VVG fish_NN the_DT tail_NN ,_, though_IN it_PP may_MD be_VB similarly_RB shaped_VVN ,_, invariably_RB

*_SYM Why_WRB this_DT book_NN of_IN whales_NNS is_VBZ not_RB denominated_VVN the_DT Quarto_NP is_VBZ very_RB plain_JJ ._SENT

form_NN does_VVZ not_RB preserve_VV the_DT shape_NN of_IN the_DT Folio_NP volume_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT Octavo_NP

BOOK_NN II_NP ._SENT (_( OCTAVO_NN )_) ,_, CHAPTER_NP I_NP ._SENT (_( GRAMPUS_NN )_) .--Though_NN this_DT fish_NN ,_, whose_WP$

CHAPTER_NN 33_CD 

The_DT Specksynder_NP ._SENT 


Concerning_VVG the_DT officers_NNS of_IN the_DT whale-craft_NN ,_, this_DT seems_VVZ as_RB good_JJ a_DT 
place_NN as_IN any_DT to_TO set_VV down_RP a_DT little_JJ domestic_JJ peculiarity_NN on_IN ship-board_NN ,_, 
arising_VVG from_IN the_DT existence_NN of_IN the_DT harpooneer_NN class_NN of_IN officers_NNS ,_, a_DT 
class_NN unknown_NN of_IN course_NN in_IN any_DT other_JJ marine_NN than_IN the_DT whale-fleet_NN ._SENT 

The_DT large_JJ importance_NN attached_VVN to_TO the_DT harpooneer_NN 's_POS vocation_NN is_VBZ evinced_VVN 
by_IN the_DT fact_NN ,_, that_WDT originally_RB in_IN the_DT old_JJ Dutch_NP Fishery_NP ,_, two_CD centuries_NNS 
and_CC more_RBR ago_RB ,_, the_DT command_NN of_IN a_DT whale_NN ship_NN was_VBD not_RB wholly_RB lodged_VVN in_IN

officer_NN called_VVD the_DT Specksynder_NP ._SENT Literally_RB this_DT word_NN means_VVZ 
Fat-Cutter_NN ;_: usage_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, in_IN time_NN made_VVD it_PP equivalent_JJ to_TO Chief_NP 
Harpooneer_NN ._SENT In_IN those_DT days_NNS ,_, the_DT captain_NN 's_POS authority_NN was_VBD restricted_VVN to_TO

whale-hunting_VVG department_NN and_CC all_PDT its_PP$ concerns_NNS ,_, the_DT Specksynder_NP or_CC 
Chief_NP Harpooneer_NP reigned_VVD supreme_JJ ._SENT In_IN the_DT British_NP Greenland_NP Fishery_NP ,_,

captain_NN 's_VBZ more_RBR inferior_JJ subalterns_NNS ._SENT Nevertheless_RB ,_, as_RB upon_IN the_DT good_JJ

Now_RB ,_, the_DT grand_JJ distinction_NN drawn_VVN between_IN officer_NN and_CC man_NN at_IN sea_NN ,_, is_VBZ 
this--the_JJ first_JJ lives_NNS aft_RB ,_, the_DT last_JJ forward_NN ._SENT Hence_RB ,_, in_IN whale-ships_NNS

captain_NN ;_: and_CC so_RB ,_, too_RB ,_, in_IN most_JJS of_IN the_DT American_JJ whalers_NNS the_DT harpooneers_NNS

Though_IN the_DT long_JJ period_NN of_IN a_DT Southern_NP whaling_NN voyage_NN (_( by_IN far_RB the_DT

CHAPTER_NN 34_CD 

The_DT Cabin-Table_NP ._SENT

it_PP was_VBD ,_, Flask_NP ,_, alas_UH !_SENT was_VBD a_DT butterless_JJ man_NN !_SENT 

Another_DT thing_NN ._SENT Flask_NN was_VBD the_DT last_JJ person_NN down_RB at_IN the_DT dinner_NN ,_, and_NP 
Flask_NN is_VBZ the_DT first_JJ man_NN up_RB ._SENT Consider_VV !_SENT For_IN hereby_RB Flask_NP 's_POS dinner_NN was_VBD 
badly_RB jammed_VVN in_IN point_NN of_IN time_NN ._SENT Starbuck_NP and_CC Stubb_NP both_CC had_VHD the_DT start_NN 
of_IN him_PP ;_: and_CC yet_RB they_PP also_RB have_VHP the_DT privilege_NN of_IN lounging_VVG in_IN the_DT rear_NN ._SENT 
If_IN Stubb_NP even_RB ,_, who_WP is_VBZ but_CC a_DT peg_NN higher_JJR than_IN Flask_NP ,_, happens_VVZ to_TO have_VH 
but_CC a_DT small_JJ appetite_NN ,_, and_CC soon_RB shows_VVZ symptoms_NNS of_IN concluding_VVG his_PP$

precede_VV Flask_NP to_TO the_DT deck_NN ._SENT Therefore_RB it_PP was_VBD that_IN/that Flask_NP once_RB admitted_VVD 
in_IN private_JJ ,_, that_IN/that ever_RB since_IN he_PP had_VHD arisen_VVN to_TO the_DT dignity_NN of_IN an_DT 
officer_NN ,_, from_IN that_WDT moment_NN he_PP had_VHD never_RB known_VVN what_WP it_PP was_VBD to_TO be_VB 
otherwise_RB than_IN hungry_JJ ,_, more_JJR or_CC less_JJR ._SENT For_IN what_WP he_PP ate_VVD did_VVD not_RB so_RB much_JJ 
relieve_VV his_PP$ hunger_NN ,_, as_RB keep_VV it_PP immortal_JJ in_IN him_PP ._SENT Peace_NP and_NP 
satisfaction_NN ,_, thought_VVD Flask_NP ,_, have_VHP for_IN ever_RB departed_VVN from_IN my_PP$ stomach_NN ._SENT 
I_PP am_VBP an_DT officer_NN ;_: but_CC ,_, how_WRB I_PP wish_VVP I_PP could_MD fish_VV a_DT bit_NN of_IN old-fashioned_JJ 
beef_NN in_IN the_DT forecastle_NN ,_, as_IN I_PP used_VVN to_TO when_WRB I_PP was_VBD before_IN the_DT mast_NN ._SENT 
There_EX 's_VBZ the_DT fruits_NNS of_IN promotion_NN now_RB ;_: there_EX 's_VBZ the_DT vanity_NN of_IN glory_NN :_: 
there_EX 's_VBZ the_DT insanity_NN of_IN life_NN !_SENT Besides_RB ,_, if_IN it_PP were_VBD so_RB that_IN/that any_DT mere_JJ 
sailor_NN of_IN the_DT Pequod_NP had_VHD a_DT grudge_NN against_IN Flask_NP in_IN Flask_NP 's_POS official_NN 
capacity_NN ,_, all_PDT that_DT sailor_NN had_VHD to_TO do_VV ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO obtain_VV ample_JJ 
vengeance_NN ,_, was_VBD to_TO go_VV aft_RB at_IN dinner-time_NN ,_, and_CC get_VV a_DT peep_NN at_IN Flask_NP 
through_IN the_DT cabin_NN sky-light_NN ,_, sitting_VVG silly_JJ and_CC dumfoundered_JJ before_RB 
awful_JJ Ahab_NP ._SENT 

Now_RB ,_, Ahab_NP and_CC his_PP$ three_CD mates_NNS formed_VVN what_WP may_MD be_VB called_VVN the_DT first_JJ 
table_NN in_IN the_DT Pequod_NP 's_POS cabin_NN ._SENT After_IN their_PP$ departure_NN ,_, taking_VVG place_NN in_IN 
inverted_JJ order_NN to_TO their_PP$ arrival_NN ,_, the_DT canvas_NN cloth_NN was_VBD cleared_VVN ,_, or_CC 
rather_RB was_VBD restored_VVN to_TO some_DT hurried_JJ order_NN by_IN the_DT pallid_JJ steward_NN ._SENT And_CC 
then_RB the_DT three_CD harpooneers_NNS were_VBD bidden_VVN to_TO the_DT feast_NN ,_, they_PP being_VBG its_PP$ 
residuary_JJ legatees_NNS ._SENT They_PP made_VVD a_DT sort_NN of_IN temporary_JJ servants_NNS '_POS hall_NN of_IN 
the_DT high_JJ and_CC mighty_JJ cabin_NN ._SENT 

In_IN strange_JJ contrast_NN to_TO the_DT hardly_RB tolerable_JJ constraint_NN and_CC nameless_JJ 
invisible_JJ domineerings_NNS of_IN the_DT captain_NN 's_POS table_NN ,_, was_VBD the_DT entire_NN 
care-free_JJ license_NN and_CC ease_VV ,_, the_DT almost_RB frantic_JJ democracy_NN of_IN those_DT 
inferior_JJ fellows_NNS the_DT harpooneers_NNS ._SENT While_IN their_PP$ masters_NNS ,_, the_DT mates_NNS ,_, 
seemed_VVN afraid_JJ of_IN the_DT sound_NN of_IN the_DT hinges_NNS of_IN their_PP$ own_JJ jaws_NNS ,_, the_DT 
harpooneers_NNS chewed_VVD their_PP$ food_NN with_IN such_PDT a_DT relish_NN that_IN/that there_EX was_VBD a_DT 
report_NN to_TO it_PP ._SENT They_PP dined_VVD like_IN lords_NNS ;_: they_PP filled_VVD their_PP$ bellies_NNS like_VVP 
Indian_JJ ships_NNS all_DT day_NN loading_NN with_IN spices_NNS ._SENT Such_JJ portentous_JJ appetites_NNS 
had_VHD Queequeg_NP and_CC Tashtego_NP ,_, that_IN/that to_TO fill_VV out_RP the_DT vacancies_NNS made_VVN by_IN the_DT 
previous_JJ repast_NN ,_, often_RB the_DT pale_JJ Dough-Boy_NN was_VBD fain_JJ to_TO bring_VV on_IN a_DT 
great_JJ baron_NN of_IN salt-junk_NNS ,_, seemingly_RB quarried_VVN out_RP of_IN the_DT solid_JJ ox_NN ._SENT 
And_CC if_IN he_PP were_VBD not_RB lively_JJ about_IN it_PP ,_, if_IN he_PP did_VVD not_RB go_VV with_IN a_DT nimble_JJ 
hop-skip-and-jump_NN ,_, then_RB Tashtego_NP had_VHD an_DT ungentlemanly_RB way_NN of_IN 
accelerating_VVG him_PP by_IN darting_VVG a_DT fork_NN at_IN his_PP$ back_NN ,_, harpoon-wise_RB ._SENT And_CC 
once_IN Daggoo_NP ,_, seized_VVN with_IN a_DT sudden_JJ humor_NN ,_, assisted_VVN Dough-Boy_NP 's_POS memory_NN 
by_IN snatching_VVG him_PP up_RB bodily_JJ ,_, and_CC thrusting_VVG his_PP$ head_NN into_IN a_DT great_JJ empty_JJ

circle_NN preliminary_JJ to_TO scalping_VVG him_PP ._SENT He_PP was_VBD naturally_RB a_DT very_RB nervous_JJ ,_, 
shuddering_VVG sort_NN of_IN little_JJ fellow_NN ,_, this_DT bread-faced_JJ steward_NN ;_: the_DT 
progeny_NN of_IN a_DT bankrupt_JJ baker_NN and_CC a_DT hospital_NN nurse_NN ._SENT And_CC what_WP with_IN the_DT 
standing_VVG spectacle_NN of_IN the_DT black_JJ terrific_JJ Ahab_NP ,_, and_CC the_DT periodical_NN 
tumultuous_JJ visitations_NNS of_IN these_DT three_CD savages_NNS ,_, Dough-Boy_NP 's_POS whole_JJ life_NN

furnished_VVN with_IN all_DT things_NNS they_PP demanded_VVD ,_, he_PP would_MD escape_VV from_IN their_PP$

them_PP through_IN the_DT blinds_NNS of_IN its_PP$ door_NN ,_, till_IN all_DT was_VBD over_RP ._SENT 

It_PP was_VBD a_DT sight_NN to_TO see_VV Queequeg_NP seated_VVN over_RP against_IN Tashtego_NP ,_, opposing_VVG 
his_PP$ filed_VVN teeth_NNS to_TO the_DT Indian_NP 's_POS :_: crosswise_RB to_TO them_PP ,_, Daggoo_NP seated_VVD on_RP

the_DT low_JJ carlines_NNS ;_: at_IN every_DT motion_NN of_IN his_PP$ colossal_JJ limbs_NNS ,_, making_VVG the_DT 
low_JJ cabin_NN framework_NN to_TO shake_VV ,_, as_RB when_WRB an_DT African_JJ elephant_NN goes_VVZ 
passenger_NN in_IN a_DT ship_NN ._SENT But_CC for_IN all_PDT this_DT ,_, the_DT great_JJ negro_NN was_VBD 
wonderfully_RB abstemious_JJ ,_, not_RB to_TO say_VV dainty_JJ ._SENT It_PP seemed_VVD hardly_RB possible_JJ 
that_DT by_IN such_JJ comparatively_RB small_JJ mouthfuls_NNS he_PP could_MD keep_VV up_RP the_DT 
vitality_NN diffused_VVD through_IN so_RB broad_JJ ,_, baronial_JJ ,_, and_CC superb_JJ a_DT person_NN ._SENT 
But_CC ,_, doubtless_RB ,_, this_DT noble_JJ savage_NN fed_VVN strong_JJ and_CC drank_VVD deep_RB of_IN the_DT 
abounding_VVG element_NN of_IN air_NN ;_: and_CC through_IN his_PP$ dilated_VVN nostrils_NNS snuffed_VVN in_IN 
the_DT sublime_JJ life_NN of_IN the_DT worlds_NNS ._SENT Not_RB by_IN beef_NN or_CC by_IN bread_NN ,_, are_VBP giants_NNS 
made_VVN or_CC nourished_VVN ._SENT But_CC Queequeg_NP ,_, he_PP had_VHD a_DT mortal_JJ ,_, barbaric_JJ smack_NN of_IN 
the_DT lip_NN in_IN eating--an_JJ ugly_JJ sound_NN enough--so_NN much_RB so_RB ,_, that_IN/that the_DT 
trembling_VVG Dough-Boy_NP almost_RB looked_VVD to_TO see_VV whether_IN any_DT marks_NNS of_IN teeth_NNS 
lurked_VVN in_IN his_PP$ own_JJ lean_JJ arms_NNS ._SENT And_CC when_WRB he_PP would_MD hear_VV Tashtego_NP singing_NN 
out_RB for_IN him_PP to_TO produce_VV himself_PP ,_, that_IN/that his_PP$ bones_NNS might_MD be_VB picked_VVN ,_, the_DT 
simple-witted_JJ steward_NN all_RB but_CC shattered_VVD the_DT crockery_NN hanging_VVG round_NN 
him_PP in_IN the_DT pantry_NN ,_, by_IN his_PP$ sudden_JJ fits_NNS of_IN the_DT palsy_NN ._SENT Nor_CC did_VVD the_DT 
whetstone_NN which_WDT the_DT harpooneers_NNS carried_VVN in_IN their_PP$ pockets_NNS ,_, for_IN their_PP$ 
lances_NNS and_CC other_JJ weapons_NNS ;_: and_CC with_IN which_WDT whetstones_NNS ,_, at_IN dinner_NN ,_, they_PP 
would_MD ostentatiously_RB sharpen_VV their_PP$ knives_NNS ;_: that_DT grating_JJ sound_NN did_VVD not_RB 
at_IN all_DT tend_VVP to_TO tranquillize_VV poor_JJ Dough-Boy_NP ._SENT How_WRB could_MD he_PP forget_VV that_DT 
in_IN his_PP$ Island_NP days_NNS ,_, Queequeg_NP ,_, for_IN one_CD ,_, must_MD certainly_RB have_VH been_VBN 
guilty_JJ of_IN some_DT murderous_JJ ,_, convivial_JJ indiscretions_NNS ._SENT Alas_UH !_SENT Dough-Boy_NP !_SENT 
hard_JJ fares_NNS the_DT white_JJ waiter_NN who_WP waits_VVZ upon_IN cannibals_NNS ._SENT Not_RB a_DT napkin_NN 
should_MD he_PP carry_VV on_IN his_PP$ arm_NN ,_, but_CC a_DT buckler_NN ._SENT In_IN good_JJ time_NN ,_, though_RB ,_, to_TO 
his_PP$ great_JJ delight_NN ,_, the_DT three_CD salt-sea_NN warriors_NNS would_MD rise_VV and_CC depart_VV ;_: 
to_TO his_PP$ credulous_JJ ,_, fable-mongering_JJ ears_NNS ,_, all_PDT their_PP$ martial_JJ bones_NNS 
jingling_VVG in_IN them_PP at_IN every_DT step_NN ,_, like_IN Moorish_JJ scimetars_NNS in_IN scabbards_NNS ._SENT 

But_CC ,_, though_IN these_DT barbarians_NNS dined_VVN in_IN the_DT cabin_NN ,_, and_CC nominally_RB lived_VVN 
there_RB ;_: still_RB ,_, being_JJ anything_NN but_CC sedentary_JJ in_IN their_PP$ habits_NNS ,_, they_PP were_VBD 
scarcely_RB ever_RB in_IN it_PP except_IN at_IN mealtimes_NNS ,_, and_CC just_RB before_RB 
sleeping-time_NN ,_, when_WRB they_PP passed_VVD through_IN it_PP to_TO their_PP$ own_JJ peculiar_NN 
quarters_NNS ._SENT 

In_IN this_DT one_CD matter_NN ,_, Ahab_NP seemed_VVD no_DT exception_NN to_TO most_JJS American_JJ whale_NN 
captains_NNS ,_, who_WP ,_, as_IN a_DT set_NN ,_, rather_RB incline_VV to_TO the_DT opinion_NN that_IN/that by_IN rights_NNS 
the_DT ship_NN 's_POS cabin_NN belongs_VVZ to_TO them_PP ;_: and_CC that_IN/that it_PP is_VBZ by_IN courtesy_NN alone_RB 
that_DT anybody_NN else_RB is_VBZ ,_, at_IN any_DT time_NN ,_, permitted_VVN there_RB ._SENT So_RB that_IN/that ,_, in_IN real_JJ 
truth_NN ,_, the_DT mates_NNS and_CC harpooneers_NNS of_IN the_DT Pequod_NN might_MD more_RBR properly_RB be_VB 
said_VVD to_TO have_VH lived_VVN out_RP of_IN the_DT cabin_NN than_IN in_IN it_PP ._SENT For_IN when_WRB they_PP did_VVD 
enter_VV it_PP ,_, it_PP was_VBD something_NN as_IN a_DT street-door_NN enters_VVZ a_DT house_NN ;_: turning_VVG 
inwards_NN for_IN a_DT moment_NN ,_, only_RB to_TO be_VB turned_VVN out_IN the_DT next_JJ ;_: and_CC ,_, as_IN a_DT 
permanent_JJ thing_NN ,_, residing_VVG in_IN the_DT open_JJ air_NN ._SENT Nor_CC did_VVD they_PP lose_VVP much_RB 
hereby_RB ;_: in_IN the_DT cabin_NN was_VBD no_DT companionship_NN ;_: socially_RB ,_, Ahab_NP was_VBD 
inaccessible_JJ ._SENT Though_IN nominally_RB included_VVN in_IN the_DT census_NN of_IN 
Christendom_NP ,_, he_PP was_VBD still_RB an_DT alien_NN to_TO it_PP ._SENT He_PP lived_VVD in_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, as_RB 
the_DT last_JJ of_IN the_DT Grisly_NP Bears_NPS lived_VVD in_IN settled_JJ Missouri_NP ._SENT And_CC as_RB when_WRB 
Spring_NP and_CC Summer_NP had_VHD departed_VVN ,_, that_IN/that wild_JJ Logan_NP of_IN the_DT woods_NNS ,_, burying_VVG 
himself_PP in_IN the_DT hollow_NN of_IN a_DT tree_NN ,_, lived_VVD out_RP the_DT winter_NN there_RB ,_, sucking_JJ 
his_PP$ own_JJ paws_NNS ;_: so_RB ,_, in_IN his_PP$ inclement_JJ ,_, howling_VVG old_JJ age_NN ,_, Ahab_NP 's_POS soul_NN ,_, 
shut_VVN up_RP in_IN the_DT caved_VVN trunk_NN of_IN his_PP$ body_NN ,_, there_RB fed_VVN upon_IN the_DT sullen_JJ 
paws_NNS of_IN its_PP$ gloom_NN !_SENT 



CHAPTER_NN 35_CD 

The_DT Mast-Head_NN ._SENT 


It_PP was_VBD during_IN the_DT more_RBR pleasant_JJ weather_NN ,_, that_WDT in_IN due_JJ rotation_NN with_IN 
the_DT other_JJ seamen_NNS my_PP$ first_JJ mast-head_NN came_VVD round_NN ._SENT 

In_IN most_JJS American_JJ whalemen_NNS the_DT mast-heads_NNS are_VBP manned_VVN almost_RB 
simultaneously_RB with_IN the_DT vessel_NN 's_VBZ leaving_VVG her_PP$ port_NN ;_: even_RB though_IN she_PP 
may_MD have_VH fifteen_CD thousand_CD miles_NNS ,_, and_CC more_JJR ,_, to_TO sail_VV ere_IN reaching_VVG her_PP 
proper_JJ cruising_VVG ground_NN ._SENT And_CC if_IN ,_, after_IN a_DT three_CD ,_, four_CD ,_, or_CC five_CD years_NNS '_POS 
voyage_VV she_PP is_VBZ drawing_VVG nigh_JJ home_NN with_IN anything_NN empty_JJ in_IN her--say_NN ,_, an_DT 
empty_JJ vial_NN even--then_NN ,_, her_PP$ mast-heads_NNS are_VBP kept_VVN manned_VVN to_TO the_DT last_JJ ;_: 
and_CC not_RB till_IN her_PP$ skysail-poles_NNS sail_VVP in_IN among_IN the_DT spires_NNS of_IN the_DT port_NN ,_, 
does_VVZ she_PP altogether_RB relinquish_VV the_DT hope_NN of_IN capturing_VVG one_CD whale_NN more_RBR ._SENT 

Now_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT business_NN of_IN standing_VVG mast-heads_NNS ,_, ashore_RB or_CC afloat_RB ,_, is_VBZ a_DT 
very_RB ancient_JJ and_CC interesting_JJ one_CD ,_, let_VV us_PP in_IN some_DT measure_NN expatiate_VV 
here_RB ._SENT I_PP take_VVP it_PP ,_, that_IN/that the_DT earliest_JJS standers_NNS of_IN mast-heads_NNS were_VBD the_DT 
old_JJ Egyptians_NNS ;_: because_IN ,_, in_IN all_PDT my_PP$ researches_NNS ,_, I_PP find_VVP none_NN prior_RB to_TO 
them_PP ._SENT For_IN though_IN their_PP$ progenitors_NNS ,_, the_DT builders_NNS of_IN Babel_NP ,_, must_MD 
doubtless_RB ,_, by_IN their_PP$ tower_NN ,_, have_VHP intended_VVN to_TO rear_VV the_DT loftiest_JJS 
mast-head_NN in_IN all_DT Asia_NP ,_, or_CC Africa_NP either_RB ;_: yet_CC (_( ere_IN the_DT final_JJ truck_NN was_VBD 
put_VVN to_TO it_PP )_) as_IN that_DT great_JJ stone_NN mast_NN of_IN theirs_PP may_MD be_VB said_VVN to_TO have_VH 
gone_VVN by_IN the_DT board_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT dread_NN gale_NN of_IN God_NP 's_POS wrath_NN ;_: therefore_RB ,_, we_PP 
cannot_MD give_VV these_DT Babel_NP builders_NNS priority_NN over_IN the_DT Egyptians_NNS ._SENT And_CC 
that_IN/that the_DT Egyptians_NNS were_VBD a_DT nation_NN of_IN mast-head_NN standers_NNS ,_, is_VBZ an_DT 
assertion_NN based_VVN upon_IN the_DT general_JJ belief_NN among_IN archaeologists_NNS ,_, that_RB 
the_DT first_JJ pyramids_NNS were_VBD founded_VVN for_IN astronomical_JJ purposes_NNS :_: a_DT theory_NN 
singularly_RB supported_VVN by_IN the_DT peculiar_JJ stair-like_JJ formation_NN of_IN all_DT four_CD 
sides_NNS of_IN those_DT edifices_NNS ;_: whereby_WRB ,_, with_IN prodigious_JJ long_JJ upliftings_NNS of_IN 
their_PP$ legs_NNS ,_, those_DT old_JJ astronomers_NNS were_VBD wont_JJ to_TO mount_VV to_TO the_DT apex_NN ,_, and_NP 
sing_VV out_RP for_IN new_JJ stars_NNS ;_: even_RB as_IN the_DT look-outs_NNS of_IN a_DT modern_JJ ship_NN sing_NN 
out_RB for_IN a_DT sail_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT whale_NN just_RB bearing_VVG in_IN sight_NN ._SENT In_IN Saint_NP Stylites_NP ,_, 
the_DT famous_JJ Christian_JJ hermit_NN of_IN old_JJ times_NNS ,_, who_WP built_VVD him_PP a_DT lofty_JJ stone_NN 
pillar_NN in_IN the_DT desert_NN and_CC spent_VVD the_DT whole_JJ latter_JJ portion_NN of_IN his_PP$ life_NN 
on_IN its_PP$ summit_NN ,_, hoisting_VVG his_PP$ food_NN from_IN the_DT ground_NN with_IN a_DT tackle_NN ;_: in_IN 
him_PP we_PP have_VHP a_DT remarkable_JJ instance_NN of_IN a_DT dauntless_JJ 
stander-of-mast-heads_NNS ;_: who_WP was_VBD not_RB to_TO be_VB driven_VVN from_IN his_PP$ place_NN by_IN 
fogs_NNS or_CC frosts_NNS ,_, rain_NN ,_, hail_NN ,_, or_CC sleet_NN ;_: but_CC valiantly_RB facing_VVG everything_NN 
out_RB to_TO the_DT last_JJ ,_, literally_RB died_VVD at_IN his_PP$ post_NN ._SENT Of_IN modern_JJ 
standers-of-mast-heads_NNS we_PP have_VHP but_CC a_DT lifeless_JJ set_NN ;_: mere_JJ stone_NN ,_, iron_NN ,_, 
and_CC bronze_NN men_NNS ;_: who_WP ,_, though_IN well_RB capable_JJ of_IN facing_VVG out_RP a_DT stiff_JJ gale_NN ,_, 
are_VBP still_RB entirely_RB incompetent_JJ to_TO the_DT business_NN of_IN singing_VVG out_RP upon_IN 
discovering_VVG any_DT strange_JJ sight_NN ._SENT There_EX is_VBZ Napoleon_NP ;_: who_WP ,_, upon_IN the_DT top_NN 
of_IN the_DT column_NN of_IN Vendome_NP ,_, stands_VVZ with_IN arms_NNS folded_VVN ,_, some_DT one_CD hundred_CD 
and_CC fifty_CD feet_NNS in_IN the_DT air_NN ;_: careless_JJ ,_, now_RB ,_, who_WP rules_VVZ the_DT decks_NNS below_RB ;_: 
whether_IN Louis_NP Philippe_NP ,_, Louis_NP Blanc_NP ,_, or_CC Louis_NP the_DT Devil_NP ._SENT Great_NP 
Washington_NP ,_, too_RB ,_, stands_VVZ high_RB aloft_RB on_IN his_PP$ towering_JJ main-mast_NN in_IN 
Baltimore_NP ,_, and_CC like_IN one_CD of_IN Hercules_NP '_POS pillars_NNS ,_, his_PP$ column_NN marks_NNS that_RB 
point_NN of_IN human_JJ grandeur_NN beyond_IN which_WDT few_JJ mortals_NNS will_MD go_VV ._SENT Admiral_NN 
Nelson_NP ,_, also_RB ,_, on_IN a_DT capstan_NN of_IN gun-metal_NN ,_, stands_VVZ his_PP$ mast-head_NN in_RP 
Trafalgar_NP Square_NP ;_: and_CC ever_RB when_WRB most_JJS obscured_VVN by_IN that_DT London_NP smoke_NN ,_, 
token_JJ is_VBZ yet_RB given_VVN that_IN/that a_DT hidden_JJ hero_NN is_VBZ there_RB ;_: for_IN where_WRB there_EX is_VBZ 
smoke_NN ,_, must_MD be_VB fire_NN ._SENT But_CC neither_DT great_JJ Washington_NP ,_, nor_CC Napoleon_NP ,_, nor_CC 
Nelson_NP ,_, will_MD answer_VV a_DT single_JJ hail_NN from_IN below_RB ,_, however_RB madly_RB invoked_VVN 
to_TO befriend_VV by_IN their_PP$ counsels_NNS the_DT distracted_VVN decks_NNS upon_IN which_WDT they_PP 
gaze_NN ;_: however_RB it_PP may_MD be_VB surmised_VVN ,_, that_IN/that their_PP$ spirits_NNS penetrate_VV 
through_IN the_DT thick_JJ haze_NN of_IN the_DT future_NN ,_, and_CC descry_VV what_WP shoals_VVZ and_CC what_WP 
rocks_NNS must_MD be_VB shunned_VVN ._SENT 

It_PP may_MD seem_VV unwarrantable_JJ to_TO couple_NN in_IN any_DT respect_NN the_DT mast-head_NN 
standers_NNS of_IN the_DT land_NN with_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT sea_NN ;_: but_CC that_IN/that in_IN truth_NN it_PP is_VBZ 
not_RB so_RB ,_, is_VBZ plainly_RB evinced_VVN by_IN an_DT item_NN for_IN which_WDT Obed_NP Macy_NP ,_, the_DT sole_NN 
historian_NN of_IN Nantucket_NP ,_, stands_VVZ accountable_JJ ._SENT The_DT worthy_JJ Obed_NP tells_VVZ 
us_PP ,_, that_IN/that in_IN the_DT early_JJ times_NNS of_IN the_DT whale_NN fishery_NN ,_, ere_IN ships_NNS were_VBD 
regularly_RB launched_VVN in_IN pursuit_NN of_IN the_DT game_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS of_IN that_DT island_NN 
erected_VVN lofty_JJ spars_NNS along_IN the_DT sea-coast_NN ,_, to_TO which_WDT the_DT look-outs_NNS 
ascended_VVN by_IN means_NNS of_IN nailed_VVN cleats_NNS ,_, something_NN as_IN fowls_NNS go_VVP upstairs_RB in_IN 
a_DT hen-house_NN ._SENT A_DT few_JJ years_NNS ago_RB this_DT same_JJ plan_NN was_VBD adopted_VVN by_IN the_DT Bay_NP 
whalemen_NNS of_IN New_NP Zealand_NP ,_, who_WP ,_, upon_IN descrying_VVG the_DT game_NN ,_, gave_VVD notice_VV to_TO 
the_DT ready-manned_JJ boats_NNS nigh_IN the_DT beach_NN ._SENT But_CC this_DT custom_NN has_VHZ now_RB 
become_VVN obsolete_JJ ;_: turn_VV we_PP then_RB to_TO the_DT one_CD proper_JJ mast-head_NN ,_, that_WDT of_IN a_DT 
whale-ship_NN at_IN sea_NN ._SENT The_DT three_CD mast-heads_NNS are_VBP kept_VVN manned_VVN from_IN 
sun-rise_NN to_TO sun-set_NN ;_: the_DT seamen_NNS taking_VVG their_PP$ regular_JJ turns_NNS (_( as_IN at_IN the_DT 
helm_NN )_) ,_, and_CC relieving_VVG each_DT other_JJ every_DT two_CD hours_NNS ._SENT In_IN the_DT serene_JJ 
weather_NN of_IN the_DT tropics_NNS it_PP is_VBZ exceedingly_RB pleasant_JJ the_DT mast-head_NN ;_: nay_RB ,_, 
to_TO a_DT dreamy_JJ meditative_JJ man_NN it_PP is_VBZ delightful_JJ ._SENT There_RB you_PP stand_VVP ,_, a_DT 
hundred_CD feet_NNS above_IN the_DT silent_JJ decks_NNS ,_, striding_VVG along_IN the_DT deep_JJ ,_, as_RB if_IN 
the_DT masts_NNS were_VBD gigantic_JJ stilts_NNS ,_, while_IN beneath_IN you_PP and_CC between_IN your_PP$ 
legs_NNS ,_, as_IN it_PP were_VBD ,_, swim_VVP the_DT hugest_JJS monsters_NNS of_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, even_RB as_IN ships_NNS 
once_RB sailed_VVN between_IN the_DT boots_NNS of_IN the_DT famous_JJ Colossus_NN at_IN old_JJ Rhodes_NPS ._SENT 
There_RB you_PP stand_VVP ,_, lost_VVD in_IN the_DT infinite_JJ series_NN of_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, with_IN nothing_NN 
ruffled_VVN but_CC the_DT waves_NNS ._SENT The_DT tranced_VVN ship_NN indolently_RB rolls_VVZ ;_: the_DT drowsy_JJ

CHAPTER_NN 36_CD

(_( ENTER_VV AHAB_NP :_: THEN_RB ,_, ALL_NP )_)

"_`` Sir_NP !_SENT "_'' said_VVD the_DT mate_NN ,_, astonished_VVN at_IN an_DT order_NN seldom_RB or_CC never_RB given_VVN on_RP

"_`` Send_VV everybody_NN aft_JJ ,_, "_'' repeated_VVD Ahab_NP ._SENT "_`` Mast-heads_NNS ,_, there_RB !_SENT come_VV down_RB !_SENT "_'' 

When_WRB the_DT entire_JJ ship_NN 's_POS company_NN were_VBD assembled_VVN ,_, and_CC with_IN curious_JJ and_NP

Moby_NP Dick_NP ._SENT

CHAPTER_NN 42_CD 

The_DT Whiteness_NN of_IN The_DT Whale_NP ._SENT 


What_WP the_DT white_JJ whale_NN was_VBD to_TO Ahab_NP ,_, has_VHZ been_VBN hinted_VVN ;_: what_WP ,_, at_IN times_NNS ,_, he_PP 
was_VBD to_TO me_PP ,_, as_RB yet_RB remains_VVZ unsaid_VVN ._SENT 

Aside_RB from_IN those_DT more_JJR obvious_JJ considerations_NNS touching_VVG Moby_NP Dick_NP ,_, 
which_WDT could_MD not_RB but_CC occasionally_RB awaken_VV in_IN any_DT man_NN 's_POS soul_NN some_DT alarm_NN ,_, 
there_EX was_VBD another_DT thought_NN ,_, or_CC rather_RB vague_JJ ,_, nameless_JJ horror_NN

It_PP was_VBD the_DT whiteness_NN of_IN the_DT whale_NN that_IN/that above_IN all_DT things_NNS appalled_VVD me_PP ._SENT 
But_CC how_WRB can_MD I_PP hope_VVP to_TO explain_VV myself_PP here_RB ;_: and_CC yet_RB ,_, in_IN some_DT dim_JJ ,_, 
random_JJ way_NN ,_, explain_VV myself_PP I_PP must_MD ,_, else_RB all_PDT these_DT chapters_NNS might_MD be_VB 
naught_RB ._SENT 

Though_RB in_IN many_JJ natural_JJ objects_NNS ,_, whiteness_NN refiningly_RB enhances_VVZ beauty_NN ,_,

recognised_VVN a_DT certain_JJ royal_JJ preeminence_NN in_IN this_DT hue_NN ;_: even_RB the_DT 
barbaric_JJ ,_, grand_JJ old_JJ kings_NNS of_IN Pegu_NP placing_VVG the_DT title_NN "_`` Lord_NP of_IN the_DT 
White_NP Elephants_NP "_'' above_IN all_PDT their_PP$ other_JJ magniloquent_JJ ascriptions_NNS of_IN 
dominion_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT modern_JJ kings_NNS of_IN Siam_NP unfurling_VVG the_DT same_JJ snow-white_JJ

the_DT same_JJ imperial_JJ hue_NN ;_: and_CC though_IN this_DT pre-eminence_NN in_IN it_PP applies_VVZ to_TO 
the_DT human_JJ race_NN itself_PP ,_, giving_VVG the_DT white_JJ man_NN ideal_NN mastership_NN over_RB 
every_DT dusky_JJ tribe_NN ;_: and_CC though_RB ,_, besides_RB ,_, all_PDT this_DT ,_, whiteness_NN has_VHZ been_VBN 
even_RB made_VVN significant_JJ of_IN gladness_NN ,_, for_IN among_IN the_DT Romans_NNS a_DT white_JJ stone_NN 
marked_VVN a_DT joyful_JJ day_NN ;_: and_CC though_RB in_IN other_JJ mortal_JJ sympathies_NNS and_CC

among_IN the_DT Red_NP Men_NP of_IN America_NP the_DT giving_NN of_IN the_DT white_JJ belt_NN of_IN wampum_NN 
was_VBD the_DT deepest_JJS pledge_NN of_IN honour_NN ;_: though_RB in_IN many_JJ climes_NNS ,_, whiteness_NN 
typifies_VVZ the_DT majesty_NN of_IN Justice_NP in_IN the_DT ermine_NN of_IN the_DT Judge_NP ,_, and_NP 
contributes_VVZ to_TO the_DT daily_JJ state_NN of_IN kings_NNS and_CC queens_NNS drawn_VVN by_IN

august_JJ religions_NNS it_PP has_VHZ been_VBN made_VVN the_DT symbol_NN of_IN the_DT divine_NN 
spotlessness_NN and_CC power_NN ;_: by_IN the_DT Persian_JJ fire_NN worshippers_NNS ,_, the_DT white_NN 
forked_JJ flame_NN being_VBG held_VVN the_DT holiest_JJS on_IN the_DT altar_NN ;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT Greek_JJ

First_NP :_: The_DT mariner_NN ,_, when_WRB drawing_VVG nigh_IN the_DT coasts_NNS of_IN foreign_JJ lands_NNS ,_, if_IN
