CHAPTER_NN 44_CD 

The_DT Chart_NP ._SENT 


Had_VHD you_PP followed_VVD Captain_NP Ahab_NP down_RB into_IN his_PP$ cabin_NN after_IN the_DT squall_NN 
that_IN/that took_VVD place_NN on_IN the_DT night_NN succeeding_VVG that_DT wild_JJ ratification_NN of_IN his_PP$ 
purpose_NN with_IN his_PP$ crew_NN ,_, you_PP would_MD have_VH seen_VVN him_PP go_VVP to_TO a_DT locker_NN in_IN the_DT 
transom_NN ,_, and_CC bringing_VVG out_RP a_DT large_JJ wrinkled_VVN roll_NN of_IN yellowish_JJ sea_NN 
charts_NNS ,_, spread_VVD them_PP before_IN him_PP on_IN his_PP$ screwed-down_JJ table_NN ._SENT Then_RB 
seating_VVG himself_PP before_IN it_PP ,_, you_PP would_MD have_VH seen_VVN him_PP intently_RB study_VVP the_DT 
various_JJ lines_NNS and_CC shadings_NNS which_WDT there_RB met_VVD his_PP$ eye_NN ;_: and_CC with_IN slow_JJ but_RB 
steady_JJ pencil_NN trace_VV additional_JJ courses_NNS over_IN spaces_NNS that_WDT before_RB were_VBD 
blank_JJ ._SENT At_IN intervals_NNS ,_, he_PP would_MD refer_VV to_TO piles_NNS of_IN old_JJ log-books_NNS beside_RB 
him_PP ,_, wherein_RB were_VBD set_VVN down_RP the_DT seasons_NNS and_CC places_NNS in_IN which_WDT ,_, on_RB 
various_JJ former_JJ voyages_NNS of_IN various_JJ ships_NNS ,_, sperm_NN whales_NNS had_VHD been_VBN 
captured_VVN or_CC seen_VVN ._SENT 

While_IN thus_RB employed_VVN ,_, the_DT heavy_JJ pewter_JJ lamp_NN suspended_VVN in_IN chains_NNS over_RB 
his_PP$ head_NN ,_, continually_RB rocked_VVN with_IN the_DT motion_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN 
ever_RB threw_VVD shifting_VVG gleams_NNS and_CC shadows_NNS of_IN lines_NNS upon_IN his_PP$ wrinkled_VVN 
brow_NN ,_, till_IN it_PP almost_RB seemed_VVD that_IN/that while_IN he_PP himself_PP was_VBD marking_VVG out_RP

also_RB tracing_VVG lines_NNS and_CC courses_NNS upon_IN the_DT deeply_RB marked_VVN chart_NN of_IN his_PP$ 
forehead_NN ._SENT 

But_CC it_PP was_VBD not_RB this_DT night_NN in_IN particular_JJ that_IN/that ,_, in_IN the_DT solitude_NN of_IN his_PP$ 
cabin_NN ,_, Ahab_NP thus_RB pondered_VVD over_RP his_PP$ charts_NNS ._SENT Almost_RB every_DT night_NN they_PP 
were_VBD brought_VVN out_RP ;_: almost_RB every_DT night_NN some_DT pencil_NN marks_NNS were_VBD effaced_VVN ,_, 
and_CC others_NNS were_VBD substituted_VVN ._SENT For_IN with_IN the_DT charts_NNS of_IN all_DT four_CD oceans_NNS 
before_IN him_PP ,_, Ahab_NP was_VBD threading_VVG a_DT maze_NN of_IN currents_NNS and_CC eddies_NNS ,_, with_IN a_DT 
view_NN to_TO the_DT more_RBR certain_JJ accomplishment_NN of_IN that_DT monomaniac_NN thought_VVD of_IN 
his_PP$ soul_NN ._SENT 

Now_RB ,_, to_TO any_DT one_CD not_RB fully_RB acquainted_VVN with_IN the_DT ways_NNS of_IN the_DT leviathans_NNS ,_, 
it_PP might_MD seem_VV an_DT absurdly_RB hopeless_JJ task_NN thus_RB to_TO seek_VV out_RP one_CD solitary_NN 
creature_NN in_IN the_DT unhooped_JJ oceans_NNS of_IN this_DT planet_NN ._SENT But_CC not_RB so_RB did_VVD it_PP 
seem_VV to_TO Ahab_NP ,_, who_WP knew_VVD the_DT sets_NNS of_IN all_DT tides_NNS and_CC currents_NNS ;_: and_CC 
thereby_RB calculating_VVG the_DT driftings_NNS of_IN the_DT sperm_NN whale_NN 's_POS food_NN ;_: and_CC ,_, 
also_RB ,_, calling_VVG to_TO mind_VV the_DT regular_JJ ,_, ascertained_VVD seasons_NNS for_IN hunting_NN 
him_PP in_IN particular_JJ latitudes_NNS ;_: could_MD arrive_VV at_IN reasonable_JJ surmises_NNS ,_, 
almost_RB approaching_VVG to_TO certainties_NNS ,_, concerning_VVG the_DT timeliest_JJS day_NN to_TO be_VB 
upon_IN this_DT or_CC that_DT ground_NN in_IN search_NN of_IN his_PP$ prey_NN ._SENT 

So_RB assured_VVN ,_, indeed_RB ,_, is_VBZ the_DT fact_NN concerning_VVG the_DT periodicalness_NN of_IN the_DT 
sperm_NN whale_NN 's_VBZ resorting_VVG to_TO given_VVN waters_NNS ,_, that_WDT many_JJ hunters_NNS believe_VVP 
that_RB ,_, could_MD he_PP be_VB closely_RB observed_VVN and_CC studied_VVN throughout_IN the_DT world_NN ;_: 
were_VBD the_DT logs_NNS for_IN one_CD voyage_NN of_IN the_DT entire_JJ whale_NN fleet_NN carefully_RB 
collated_VVN ,_, then_RB the_DT migrations_NNS of_IN the_DT sperm_NN whale_NN would_MD be_VB found_VVN to_TO 
correspond_VV in_IN invariability_NN to_TO those_DT of_IN the_DT herring-shoals_NNS or_CC the_DT 
flights_NNS of_IN swallows_NNS ._SENT On_IN this_DT hint_NN ,_, attempts_NNS have_VHP been_VBN made_VVN to_TO 
construct_VV elaborate_VV migratory_JJ charts_NNS of_IN the_DT sperm_NN whale_NN ._SENT *_SYM 


*_SYM Since_IN the_DT above_JJ was_VBD written_VVN ,_, the_DT statement_NN is_VBZ happily_RB borne_VVN out_RP by_IN 
an_DT official_JJ circular_NN ,_, issued_VVN by_IN Lieutenant_NP Maury_NP ,_, of_IN the_DT National_NP 
Observatory_NN ,_, Washington_NP ,_, April_NP 16th_JJ ,_, 1851._CD By_IN that_DT circular_NN ,_, it_PP 
appears_VVZ that_IN/that precisely_RB such_PDT a_DT chart_NN is_VBZ in_IN course_NN of_IN completion_NN ;_: and_CC 
portions_NNS of_IN it_PP are_VBP presented_VVN in_IN the_DT circular_NN ._SENT "_'' This_DT chart_NN divides_VVZ

CHAPTER_NN 45_CD 

The_DT Affidavit_NP ._SENT

Secondly_RB :_: It_PP is_VBZ well_RB known_VVN in_IN the_DT Sperm_NP Whale_NP Fishery_NP ,_, however_RB 
ignorant_JJ the_DT world_NN ashore_RB may_MD be_VB of_IN it_PP ,_, that_IN/that there_EX have_VHP been_VBN several_JJ 
memorable_JJ historical_JJ instances_NNS where_WRB a_DT particular_JJ whale_NN in_IN the_DT ocean_NN 
has_VHZ been_VBN at_IN distant_JJ times_NNS and_CC places_VVZ popularly_RB cognisable_JJ ._SENT Why_WRB such_JJ

First_NP :_: In_IN the_DT year_NN 1820_CD the_DT ship_NN Essex_NP ,_, Captain_NP Pollard_NP ,_, of_IN

"_'' By_IN the_DT thirteenth_NN of_IN May_NP our_PP$ ship_NN was_VBD ready_JJ to_TO sail_VV ,_, and_CC the_DT next_JJ 
day_NN we_PP were_VBD out_RP in_IN the_DT open_JJ sea_NN ,_, on_IN our_PP$ way_NN to_TO Ochotsh_NP ._SENT The_DT weather_NN 
was_VBD very_RB clear_JJ and_CC fine_JJ ,_, but_CC so_RB intolerably_RB cold_JJ that_IN/that we_PP were_VBD obliged_VVN 
to_TO keep_VV on_IN our_PP$ fur_NN clothing_NN ._SENT For_IN some_DT days_NNS we_PP had_VHD very_RB little_JJ wind_NN ;_: 
it_PP was_VBD not_RB till_IN the_DT nineteenth_NN that_IN/that a_DT brisk_JJ gale_NN from_IN the_DT northwest_NN 
sprang_VVD up_RP ._SENT An_DT uncommon_JJ large_JJ whale_NN ,_, the_DT body_NN of_IN which_WDT was_VBD larger_JJR 
than_IN the_DT ship_NN itself_PP ,_, lay_VV almost_RB at_IN the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, but_CC was_VBD 
not_RB perceived_VVN by_IN any_DT one_CD on_IN board_NN till_IN the_DT moment_NN when_WRB the_DT ship_NN ,_, 
which_WDT was_VBD in_IN full_JJ sail_NN ,_, was_VBD almost_RB upon_IN him_PP ,_, so_RB that_IN/that it_PP was_VBD 
impossible_JJ to_TO prevent_VV its_PP$ striking_JJ against_IN him_PP ._SENT We_PP were_VBD thus_RB placed_VVN 
in_IN the_DT most_RBS imminent_JJ danger_NN ,_, as_IN this_DT gigantic_JJ creature_NN ,_, setting_VVG up_RP 
its_PP$ back_NN ,_, raised_VVD the_DT ship_NN three_CD feet_NNS at_IN least_JJS out_RB of_IN the_DT water_NN ._SENT The_DT 
masts_NNS reeled_VVD ,_, and_CC the_DT sails_NNS fell_VVD altogether_RB ,_, while_IN we_PP who_WP were_VBD below_RB 
all_DT sprang_VVD instantly_RB upon_IN the_DT deck_NN ,_, concluding_VVG that_IN/that we_PP had_VHD struck_VVN 
upon_IN some_DT rock_NN ;_: instead_RB of_IN this_DT we_PP saw_VVD the_DT monster_NN sailing_VVG off_RP with_IN 
the_DT utmost_JJ gravity_NN and_CC solemnity_NN ._SENT Captain_NP D'Wolf_NP applied_VVD immediately_RB 
to_TO the_DT pumps_NNS to_TO examine_VV whether_IN or_CC not_RB the_DT vessel_NN had_VHD received_VVN any_DT 
damage_NN from_IN the_DT shock_NN ,_, but_CC we_PP found_VVD that_IN/that very_RB happily_RB it_PP had_VHD escaped_VVN 
entirely_RB uninjured_JJ ._SENT "_'' 

Now_RB ,_, the_DT Captain_NP D'Wolf_NP here_RB alluded_VVD to_TO as_IN commanding_VVG the_DT ship_NN in_IN 
question_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT New_NP Englander_NP ,_, who_WP ,_, after_IN a_DT long_JJ life_NN of_IN unusual_JJ 
adventures_NNS as_IN a_DT sea-captain_NN ,_, this_DT day_NN resides_VVZ in_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN 
Dorchester_NP near_IN Boston_NP ._SENT I_PP have_VHP the_DT honour_NN of_IN being_VBG a_DT nephew_NN of_IN his_PP$ ._SENT 
I_PP have_VHP particularly_RB questioned_VVD him_PP concerning_VVG this_DT passage_NN in_IN 
Langsdorff_NP ._SENT He_PP substantiates_VVZ every_DT word_NN ._SENT The_DT ship_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD by_IN 
no_DT means_VVZ a_DT large_JJ one_CD :_: a_DT Russian_JJ craft_NN built_VVN on_IN the_DT Siberian_JJ coast_NN ,_, 
and_CC purchased_VVN by_IN my_PP$ uncle_NN after_IN bartering_VVG away_RP the_DT vessel_NN in_IN which_WDT he_PP 
sailed_VVN from_IN home_NN ._SENT 

In_IN that_DT up_RB and_CC down_RB manly_JJ book_NN of_IN old-fashioned_JJ adventure_NN ,_, so_RB full_JJ ,_,

CHAPTER_NN 47_CD 

The_DT Mat-Maker_NP ._SENT 


It_PP was_VBD a_DT cloudy_JJ ,_, sultry_JJ afternoon_NN ;_: the_DT seamen_NNS were_VBD lazily_RB lounging_VVG

seemed_VVD resolved_VVN into_IN his_PP$ own_JJ invisible_JJ self_NN ._SENT 

I_PP was_VBD the_DT attendant_NN or_CC page_NN of_IN Queequeg_NP ,_, while_IN busy_JJ at_IN the_DT mat_NN ._SENT As_IN I_PP

first_JJ time_NN finds_VVZ himself_PP pulling_VVG into_IN the_DT charmed_VVN ,_, churned_VVN circle_NN of_IN 
the_DT hunted_JJ sperm_NN whale_NN ._SENT

more_RBR visible_JJ ,_, owing_VVG to_TO the_DT increasing_VVG darkness_NN of_IN the_DT dun_NN

But_CC with_IN Ahab_NP the_DT question_NN assumed_VVD a_DT modified_JJ aspect_NN ._SENT Considering_VVG 
that_DT with_IN two_CD legs_NNS man_NN is_VBZ but_CC a_DT hobbling_VVG wight_NN in_IN all_DT times_NNS of_IN 
danger_NN ;_: considering_VVG that_IN/that the_DT pursuit_NN of_IN whales_NNS is_VBZ always_RB under_IN great_JJ 
and_CC extraordinary_JJ difficulties_NNS ;_: that_IN/that every_DT individual_JJ moment_NN ,_, indeed_RB ,_, 
then_RB comprises_VVZ a_DT peril_NN ;_: under_IN these_DT circumstances_NNS is_VBZ it_PP wise_JJ for_IN any_DT 
maimed_VVN man_NN to_TO enter_VV a_DT whale-boat_NN in_IN the_DT hunt_NN ?_SENT As_IN a_DT general_JJ thing_NN ,_, 
the_DT joint-owners_NNS of_IN the_DT Pequod_NP must_MD have_VH plainly_RB thought_VVN not_RB ._SENT

CHAPTER_NN 51_CD 

The_DT Spirit-Spout_NP ._SENT

guard_NN against_IN the_DT leaping_VVG waves_NNS ,_, each_DT man_NN had_VHD slipped_VVN himself_PP into_IN a_DT 
sort_NN of_IN bowline_NN secured_VVN to_TO the_DT rail_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT he_PP swung_VVD as_RB in_IN a_DT 
loosened_VVN belt_NN ._SENT Few_JJ or_CC no_DT words_NNS were_VBD spoken_VVN ;_: and_CC the_DT silent_JJ ship_NN ,_, as_RB

prevailed_VVN ;_: still_RB in_IN silence_VV the_DT men_NNS swung_VVN in_IN the_DT bowlines_NNS ;_: still_RB

CHAPTER_NN 52_CD 

The_DT Albatross_NP ._SENT 


South-eastward_RB from_IN the_DT Cape_NP ,_, off_IN the_DT distant_JJ Crozetts_NP ,_, a_DT good_JJ

(_( Albatross_NN )_) by_IN name_NN ._SENT As_IN she_PP slowly_RB drew_VVD nigh_RB ,_, from_IN my_PP$ lofty_JJ perch_NN at_IN

"_`` Ship_NN ahoy_NN !_SENT Have_VHP ye_NN seen_VVN the_DT White_NP Whale_NP ?_SENT "_''

is_VBZ elevated_VVN in_IN that_DT odd_JJ fashion_NN ,_, he_PP has_VHZ no_DT proper_JJ foundation_NN for_IN his_PP$ 
superior_JJ altitude_NN ._SENT Hence_RB ,_, I_PP conclude_VVP ,_, that_IN/that in_IN boasting_VVG himself_PP to_TO be_VB

There_EX is_VBZ another_DT little_JJ item_NN about_IN Gamming_NP which_WDT must_MD not_RB be_VB

CHAPTER_NN 54_CD 

The_DT Town-Ho_NP 's_POS Story_NN ._SENT 


(_( AS_IN TOLD_NP AT_NP THE_NP GOLDEN_NP INN_NP )_) 


The_DT Cape_NP of_IN Good_NP Hope_NP ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT watery_JJ region_NN round_NN about_RB there_RB ,_,

some_DT really_RB landless_JJ latitude_NN ,_, that_IN/that her_PP$ captain_NN begins_VVZ to_TO feel_VV a_DT

flowery_JJ Nile_NP ,_, he_PP indolently_RB floats_VVZ ,_, openly_RB toying_VVG with_IN his_PP$

deck_NN ._SENT But_CC ashore_RB ,_, all_PDT this_DT effeminacy_NN is_VBZ dashed_VVN ._SENT The_DT brigandish_NN 
guise_NN which_WDT the_DT Canaller_NP so_RB proudly_RB sports_NNS ;_: his_PP$ slouched_VVN and_NP 
gaily-ribboned_JJ hat_NN betoken_VV his_PP$ grand_JJ features_NNS ._SENT A_DT terror_NN to_TO the_DT 
smiling_VVG innocence_NN of_IN the_DT villages_NNS through_IN which_WDT he_PP floats_VVZ ;_: his_PP$ swart_JJ 
visage_NN and_CC bold_JJ swagger_NN are_VBP not_RB unshunned_VVN in_IN cities_NNS ._SENT Once_RB a_DT vagabond_NN 
on_IN his_PP$ own_JJ canal_NN ,_, I_PP have_VHP received_VVN good_JJ turns_NNS from_IN one_CD of_IN these_DT 
Canallers_NNS ;_: I_PP thank_VVP him_PP heartily_RB ;_: would_MD fain_RB be_VB not_RB ungrateful_JJ ;_: but_CC it_PP 
is_VBZ often_RB one_CD of_IN the_DT prime_JJ redeeming_JJ qualities_NNS of_IN your_PP$ man_NN of_IN 
violence_NN ,_, that_WDT at_IN times_NNS he_PP has_VHZ as_RB stiff_RB an_DT arm_NN to_TO back_VV a_DT poor_JJ 
stranger_NN in_IN a_DT strait_NN ,_, as_RB to_TO plunder_VV a_DT wealthy_JJ one_CD ._SENT In_IN sum_NN ,_, 
gentlemen_NNS ,_, what_WP the_DT wildness_NN of_IN this_DT canal_NN life_NN is_VBZ ,_, is_VBZ emphatically_RB 
evinced_VVN by_IN this_DT ;_: that_IN/that our_PP$ wild_JJ whale-fishery_NN contains_VVZ so_RB many_JJ of_IN its_PP$ 
most_RBS finished_JJ graduates_NNS ,_, and_CC that_DT scarce_JJ any_DT race_NN of_IN mankind_NN ,_, except_VV 
Sydney_NP men_NNS ,_, are_VBP so_RB much_RB distrusted_VVN by_IN our_PP$ whaling_NN captains_NNS ._SENT Nor_CC does_VVZ 
it_PP at_IN all_PDT diminish_VV the_DT curiousness_NN of_IN this_DT matter_NN ,_, that_IN/that to_TO many_JJ 
thousands_NNS of_IN our_PP$ rural_JJ boys_NNS and_CC young_JJ men_NNS born_VVN along_IN its_PP$ line_NN ,_, the_DT 
probationary_JJ life_NN of_IN the_DT Grand_NP Canal_NP furnishes_VVZ the_DT sole_JJ transition_NN 
between_IN quietly_RB reaping_VVG in_IN a_DT Christian_JJ corn-field_NN ,_, and_CC recklessly_RB 
ploughing_VVG the_DT waters_NNS of_IN the_DT most_RBS barbaric_JJ seas_NNS ._SENT 

"_'' '_'' I_PP see_VVP !_SENT I_PP see_VVP !_SENT '_'' impetuously_RB exclaimed_VVD Don_NP Pedro_NP ,_, spilling_VVG his_PP$

one_CD Lima_NP ._SENT I_PP had_VHD thought_VVN ,_, now_RB ,_, that_IN/that at_IN your_PP$ temperate_JJ North_NP the_DT 
generations_NNS were_VBD cold_JJ and_CC holy_JJ as_IN the_DT hills.--But_NN the_DT story_NN ._SENT '_'' 

"_'' I_PP left_VVD off_RP ,_, gentlemen_NNS ,_, where_WRB the_DT Lakeman_NP shook_VVD the_DT backstay_NN ._SENT 
Hardly_RB had_VHD he_PP done_VVN so_RB ,_, when_WRB he_PP was_VBD surrounded_VVN by_IN the_DT three_CD junior_NN

succeeded_VVN in_IN gaining_VVG the_DT forecastle_NN deck_NN ,_, where_WRB ,_, hastily_RB slewing_VVG 
about_IN three_CD or_CC four_CD large_JJ casks_NNS in_IN a_DT line_NN with_IN the_DT windlass_NN ,_, these_DT

"_'' '_'' Come_VVN out_RP of_IN that_DT ,_, ye_NN pirates_NNS !_SENT '_'' roared_VVD the_DT captain_NN ,_, now_RB menacing_VVG

'_'' Come_VVN out_RP of_IN that_DT ,_, ye_NN cut-throats_NNS !_SENT '_'' 

"_'' Steelkilt_NP leaped_VVD on_IN the_DT barricade_NN ,_, and_CC striding_VVG up_RP and_CC down_RP there_RB ,_,

"_'' '_'' Sink_NP the_DT ship_NN ?_SENT '_'' cried_VVD Steelkilt_NP ._SENT '_'' Aye_NP ,_, let_VVD her_PP$ sink_NN ._SENT Not_RB a_DT man_NN of_IN

What_WP say_VVP ye_NN ,_, men_NNS ?_SENT '_'' turning_VVG to_TO his_PP$ comrades_NNS ._SENT A_DT fierce_JJ cheer_NN was_VBD their_PP$

"_`` The_DT Lakeman_NP now_RB patrolled_VVD the_DT barricade_NN ,_, all_PDT the_DT while_NN keeping_VVG his_PP$

"_'' '_'' Turn_NP to_TO !_SENT '_'' roared_VVD the_DT Captain_NP ._SENT 

"_'' Steelkilt_NP glanced_VVD round_VV him_PP a_DT moment_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB said_VVD :_: --'I_NNS tell_VVP you_PP 
what_WP it_PP is_VBZ now_RB ,_, Captain_NP ,_, rather_RB than_IN kill_NN ye_NN ,_, and_CC be_VB hung_VVN for_IN such_PDT a_DT

"_'' '_'' Down_IN into_IN the_DT forecastle_NN then_RB ,_, down_RB with_IN ye_NN ,_, I_PP 'll_MD keep_VV ye_NN there_RB

"_'' '_'' Shall_NP we_PP ?_SENT '_'' cried_VVD the_DT ringleader_NN to_TO his_PP$ men_NNS ._SENT Most_JJS of_IN them_PP were_VBD

"_'' As_IN the_DT Lakeman_NP 's_POS bare_JJ head_NN was_VBD just_RB level_NN with_IN the_DT planks_NNS ,_, the_DT

"_'' All_DT night_NN a_DT wide-awake_JJ watch_NN was_VBD kept_VVN by_IN all_PDT the_DT officers_NNS ,_, forward_RB

"_'' At_IN sunrise_NN the_DT Captain_NP went_VVD forward_RB ,_, and_CC knocking_VVG on_IN the_DT deck_NN ,_,

confused_JJ wrangling_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB a_DT scuffling_VVG was_VBD heard_VVN ,_, as_IN the_DT customary_JJ

"_'' '_'' Oh_UH certainly_RB ,_, '_'' the_DT Captain_NP ,_, and_CC the_DT key_NN clicked_VVD ._SENT 

"_`` It_PP was_VBD at_IN this_DT point_NN ,_, gentlemen_NNS ,_, that_WDT enraged_VVD by_IN the_DT defection_NN of_IN

"_'' Upon_IN hearing_VVG the_DT frantic_JJ project_NN of_IN their_PP$ leader_NN ,_, each_DT in_IN his_PP$ own_JJ

and_CC when_WRB their_PP$ leader_NN fell_VVD into_IN a_DT doze_NN ,_, verbally_RB opened_VVD their_PP$ souls_NNS 
to_TO each_DT other_JJ in_IN three_CD sentences_NNS ;_: and_CC bound_VVN the_DT sleeper_NN with_IN cords_NNS ,_, 
and_CC gagged_VVN him_PP with_IN cords_NNS ;_: and_CC shrieked_VVD out_RP for_IN the_DT Captain_NP at_IN

"_'' Thinking_VVG murder_NN at_IN hand_NN ,_, and_CC smelling_VVG in_IN the_DT dark_NN for_IN the_DT blood_NN ,_, he_PP 
and_CC all_PDT his_PP$ armed_JJ mates_NNS and_CC harpooneers_NNS rushed_VVN for_IN the_DT forecastle_NN ._SENT 
In_IN a_DT few_JJ minutes_NNS the_DT scuttle_NN was_VBD opened_VVN ,_, and_CC ,_, bound_JJ hand_NN and_CC foot_NN ,_, 
the_DT still_RB struggling_JJ ringleader_NN was_VBD shoved_VVN up_RP into_IN the_DT air_NN by_IN his_PP$ 
perfidious_JJ allies_NNS ,_, who_WP at_IN once_RB claimed_VVN the_DT honour_NN of_IN securing_VVG a_DT man_NN 
who_WP had_VHD been_VBN fully_RB ripe_JJ for_IN murder_NN ._SENT But_CC all_PDT these_DT were_VBD collared_VVN ,_, and_NP 
dragged_VVN along_IN the_DT deck_NN like_IN dead_JJ cattle_NNS ;_: and_CC ,_, side_NN by_IN side_NN ,_, were_VBD 
seized_VVN up_RP into_IN the_DT mizzen_JJ rigging_NN ,_, like_IN three_CD quarters_NNS of_IN meat_NN ,_, and_NP 
there_RB they_PP hung_VVD till_IN morning_NN ._SENT '_'' Damn_JJ ye_NN ,_, '_'' cried_VVD the_DT Captain_NP ,_, pacing_VVG 
to_TO and_CC fro_RB before_IN them_PP ,_, '_'' the_DT vultures_NNS would_MD not_RB touch_VV ye_NN ,_, ye_NN 
villains_NNS !_SENT '_'' 

"_'' At_IN sunrise_NN he_PP summoned_VVD all_DT hands_NNS ;_: and_CC separating_VVG those_DT who_WP had_VHD 
rebelled_VVN from_IN those_DT who_WP had_VHD taken_VVN no_DT part_NN in_IN the_DT mutiny_NN ,_, he_PP told_VVD the_DT 
former_JJ that_IN/that he_PP had_VHD a_DT good_JJ mind_NN to_TO flog_VV them_PP all_DT round--thought_NN ,_, upon_RB 
the_DT whole_NN ,_, he_PP would_MD do_VV so--he_NN ought_MD to--justice_NN demanded_VVD it_PP ;_: but_CC for_IN 
the_DT present_NN ,_, considering_VVG their_PP$ timely_JJ surrender_NN ,_, he_PP would_MD let_VV them_PP go_VV 
with_IN a_DT reprimand_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PP accordingly_RB administered_VVD in_IN the_DT vernacular_NN ._SENT 

"_'' '_'' But_CC as_RB for_IN you_PP ,_, ye_NN carrion_NN rogues_NNS ,_, '_'' turning_VVG to_TO the_DT three_CD men_NNS in_IN the_DT 
rigging--'for_NN you_PP ,_, I_PP mean_VVP to_TO mince_VV ye_NN up_RP for_IN the_DT try-pots_NNS ;_: '_'' and_CC ,_, 
seizing_VVG a_DT rope_NN ,_, he_PP applied_VVD it_PP with_IN all_PDT his_PP$ might_NN to_TO the_DT backs_NNS of_IN the_DT 
two_CD traitors_NNS ,_, till_IN they_PP yelled_VVD no_RB more_JJR ,_, but_CC lifelessly_RB hung_VVD their_PP$ 
heads_NNS sideways_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT two_CD crucified_VVN thieves_NNS are_VBP drawn_VVN ._SENT 

"_'' '_'' My_PP$ wrist_NN is_VBZ sprained_VVN with_IN ye_NN !_SENT '_'' he_PP cried_VVD ,_, at_IN last_JJ ;_: '_'' but_CC there_EX is_VBZ 
still_RB rope_NN enough_RB left_VVD for_IN you_PP ,_, my_PP$ fine_JJ bantam_NN ,_, that_WDT would_MD n't_RB give_VV 
up_RB ._SENT Take_VV that_DT gag_NN from_IN his_PP$ mouth_NN ,_, and_CC let_VV us_PP hear_VV what_WP he_PP can_MD say_VV 
for_IN himself_PP ._SENT '_'' 

"_'' For_IN a_DT moment_NN the_DT exhausted_VVN mutineer_NN made_VVD a_DT tremulous_JJ motion_NN of_IN his_PP$

sort_NN of_IN hiss_NN ,_, '_'' What_WP I_PP say_VVP is_VBZ this--and_JJ mind_VV it_PP well--if_NN you_PP flog_VVP me_PP ,_, 
I_PP murder_VVP you_PP !_SENT '_'' 

"_'' '_'' Say_VV ye_NN so_RB ?_SENT then_RB see_VV how_WRB ye_NN frighten_VV me'--and_NN the_DT Captain_NP drew_VVD off_RP 
with_IN the_DT rope_NN to_TO strike_VV ._SENT 

"_'' '_'' Best_RBS not_RB ,_, '_'' hissed_VVD the_DT Lakeman_NP ._SENT 

"_'' '_'' But_CC I_PP must_MD ,_, '_'' --and_NN the_DT rope_NN was_VBD once_RB more_RBR drawn_VVN back_RB for_IN the_DT stroke_NN ._SENT 

"_'' Steelkilt_NP here_RB hissed_VVD out_RP something_NN ,_, inaudible_JJ to_TO all_DT but_CC the_DT

But_CC as_IN the_DT junior_JJ mates_NNS were_VBD hurrying_VVG to_TO execute_VV the_DT order_NN ,_, a_DT pale_NN 
man_UH ,_, with_IN a_DT bandaged_VVN head_NN ,_, arrested_VVN them--Radney_NP the_DT chief_JJ mate_NN ._SENT 
Ever_RB since_IN the_DT blow_NN ,_, he_PP had_VHD lain_VVN in_IN his_PP$ berth_NN ;_: but_CC that_DT morning_NN ,_, 
hearing_VVG the_DT tumult_NN on_IN the_DT deck_NN ,_, he_PP had_VHD crept_VVN out_RP ,_, and_CC thus_RB far_RB had_VHD 
watched_VVN the_DT whole_JJ scene_NN ._SENT Such_JJ was_VBD the_DT state_NN of_IN his_PP$ mouth_NN ,_, that_WDT he_PP 
could_MD hardly_RB speak_VV ;_: but_CC mumbling_VVG something_NN about_IN his_PP$ being_VBG willing_JJ

rope_NN and_CC advanced_VVD to_TO his_PP$ pinioned_VVN foe_NN ._SENT 

"_'' '_'' You_PP are_VBP a_DT coward_NN !_SENT '_'' hissed_VVD the_DT Lakeman_NP ._SENT 

"_'' '_'' So_RB I_PP am_VBP ,_, but_CC take_VV that_DT ._SENT '_'' The_DT mate_NN was_VBD in_IN the_DT very_JJ act_NN of_IN striking_JJ ,_, 
when_WRB another_DT hiss_NN stayed_VVD his_PP$ uplifted_VVN arm_NN ._SENT He_PP paused_VVD :_: and_CC then_RB

iron_NN pumps_NNS clanged_VVD as_RB before_RB ._SENT 

"_'' Just_RB after_IN dark_NN that_DT day_NN ,_, when_WRB one_PP watch_VVP had_VHD retired_VVN below_RB ,_, a_DT clamor_NN

"_'' But_CC ,_, gentlemen_NNS ,_, a_DT fool_NN saved_VVD the_DT would-be_JJ murderer_NN from_IN the_DT bloody_JJ

"_'' '_'' The_DT chicha_NN !_SENT the_DT chicha_NN !_SENT '_'' cried_VVD Don_NP Pedro_NP ;_: '_'' our_PP$ vigorous_JJ friend_NN looks_VVZ

"_'' No_DT need_NN ,_, gentlemen_NNS ;_: one_CD moment_NN ,_, and_CC I_PP proceed.--Now_VVP ,_, gentlemen_NNS ,_, so_RB

The_DT mutineer_NN was_VBD the_DT bowsman_NN of_IN the_DT mate_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB fast_RB to_TO a_DT fish_NN ,_, it_PP

Moreover_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT four_CD boats_NNS were_VBD lowered_VVN ,_, the_DT mate_NN 's_VHZ got_VVN the_DT start_NN ;_: 
and_CC none_NN howled_VVN more_RBR fiercely_RB with_IN delight_NN than_IN did_VVD Steelkilt_NP ,_, as_IN he_PP

and_CC ,_, spear_VVP in_IN hand_NN ,_, Radney_NP sprang_VVD to_TO the_DT bow_NN ._SENT He_PP was_VBD always_RB a_DT

and_CC was_VBD dashed_VVN aside_RP by_IN the_DT swell_NN ,_, while_IN Radney_NP was_VBD tossed_VVN over_RP into_IN 
the_DT sea_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ flank_NN of_IN the_DT whale_NN ._SENT He_PP struck_VVD out_RP through_IN the_DT

rushed_VVN round_NN in_IN a_DT sudden_JJ maelstrom_NN ;_: seized_VVD the_DT swimmer_NN between_IN his_PP$ 
jaws_NNS ;_: and_CC rearing_VVG high_RB up_RB with_IN him_PP ,_, plunged_VVD headlong_RB again_RB ,_, and_CC went_VVD 
down_RB ._SENT 

"_'' Meantime_RB ,_, at_IN the_DT first_JJ tap_NN of_IN the_DT boat_NN 's_POS bottom_NN ,_, the_DT Lakeman_NP had_VHD

downward_RB jerking_VVG of_IN the_DT boat_NN ,_, quickly_RB brought_VVD his_PP$ knife_NN to_TO the_DT line_NN ._SENT 
He_PP cut_VVD it_PP ;_: and_CC the_DT whale_NN was_VBD free_JJ ._SENT But_CC ,_, at_IN some_DT distance_NN ,_, Moby_NP Dick_NP 
rose_VVD again_RB ,_, with_IN some_DT tatters_NNS of_IN Radney_NP 's_POS red_JJ woollen_JJ shirt_NN ,_, caught_VVD 
in_IN the_DT teeth_NNS that_WDT had_VHD destroyed_VVN him_PP ._SENT All_DT four_CD boats_NNS gave_VVD chase_JJ 
again_RB ;_: but_CC the_DT whale_NN eluded_VVD them_PP ,_, and_CC finally_RB wholly_RB disappeared_VVN ._SENT 

"_'' In_IN good_JJ time_NN ,_, the_DT Town-Ho_NP reached_VVD her_PP$ port--a_NN savage_NN ,_, solitary_JJ 
place--where_RB no_DT civilized_JJ creature_NN resided_VVD ._SENT There_RB ,_, headed_VVN by_IN the_DT 
Lakeman_NP ,_, all_RB but_CC five_CD or_CC six_CD of_IN the_DT foremastmen_NNS deliberately_RB 
deserted_VVN among_IN the_DT palms_NNS ;_: eventually_RB ,_, as_IN it_PP turned_VVD out_RP ,_, seizing_VVG a_DT 
large_JJ double_JJ war-canoe_NN of_IN the_DT savages_NNS ,_, and_CC setting_VVG sail_NN for_IN some_DT 
other_JJ harbor_NN ._SENT 

"_'' The_DT ship_NN 's_POS company_NN being_VBG reduced_VVN to_TO but_CC a_DT handful_NN ,_, the_DT captain_NN 
called_VVN upon_IN the_DT Islanders_NP to_TO assist_VV him_PP in_IN the_DT laborious_JJ business_NN of_IN

vigilance_NN over_IN their_PP$ dangerous_JJ allies_NNS was_VBD this_DT small_JJ band_NN of_IN whites_NNS 
necessitated_VVN ,_, both_CC by_IN night_NN and_CC by_IN day_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB extreme_JJ was_VBD the_DT hard_JJ 
work_VV they_PP underwent_VVD ,_, that_IN/that upon_IN the_DT vessel_NN being_VBG ready_RB again_RB for_IN sea_NN ,_, 
they_PP were_VBD in_IN such_PDT a_DT weakened_JJ condition_NN that_IN/that the_DT captain_NN durst_VVD not_RB put_VV 
off_RB with_IN them_PP in_IN so_RB heavy_JJ a_DT vessel_NN ._SENT After_IN taking_VVG counsel_NN with_IN his_PP$ 
officers_NNS ,_, he_PP anchored_VVD the_DT ship_NN as_IN far_RB off_RB shore_VV as_RB possible_JJ ;_: loaded_VVD 
and_CC ran_VVD out_RP his_PP$ two_CD cannon_NN from_IN the_DT bows_NNS ;_: stacked_VVD his_PP$ muskets_NNS on_IN the_DT 
poop_NN ;_: and_CC warning_VVG the_DT Islanders_NP not_RB to_TO approach_VV the_DT ship_NN at_IN their_PP$ 
peril_NN ,_, took_VVD one_CD man_NN with_IN him_PP ,_, and_CC setting_VVG the_DT sail_NN of_IN his_PP$ best_JJS 
whale-boat_NN ,_, steered_VVD straight_RB before_IN the_DT wind_NN for_IN Tahiti_NP ,_, five_CD hundred_CD 
miles_NNS distant_JJ ,_, to_TO procure_VV a_DT reinforcement_NN to_TO his_PP$ crew_NN ._SENT 

"_'' On_IN the_DT fourth_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT sail_NN ,_, a_DT large_JJ canoe_NN was_VBD descried_VVN ,_, which_WDT 
seemed_VVN to_TO have_VH touched_VVN at_IN a_DT low_JJ isle_NN of_IN corals_NNS ._SENT He_PP steered_VVD away_RP from_IN 
it_PP ;_: but_CC the_DT savage_JJ craft_NN bore_VVD down_RP on_IN him_PP ;_: and_CC soon_RB the_DT voice_NN of_IN 
Steelkilt_NP hailed_VVD him_PP to_TO heave_VV to_TO ,_, or_CC he_PP would_MD run_VV him_PP under_IN water_NN ._SENT 
The_DT captain_NN presented_VVD a_DT pistol_NN ._SENT With_IN one_CD foot_NN on_IN each_DT prow_NN of_IN the_DT

paint_NN ._SENT

she_PP breaches_VVZ !_SENT right_RB ahead_RB !_SENT The_DT White_NP Whale_NP ,_, the_DT White_NP Whale_NP !_SENT "_'' 

Upon_IN this_DT ,_, the_DT seamen_NNS rushed_VVD to_TO the_DT yard-arms_NNS ,_, as_RB in_IN swarming-time_NN 
the_DT bees_NNS rush_VVP to_TO the_DT boughs_NNS ._SENT Bare-headed_JJ in_IN the_DT sultry_JJ sun_NN ,_, Ahab_NP 
stood_VVN on_IN the_DT bowsprit_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN one_CD hand_NN pushed_VVN far_RB behind_IN in_IN 
readiness_NN to_TO wave_VV his_PP$ orders_NNS to_TO the_DT helmsman_NN ,_, cast_VVD his_PP$ eager_JJ glance_NN 
in_IN the_DT direction_NN indicated_VVD aloft_RB by_IN the_DT outstretched_VVN motionless_JJ arm_NN 
of_IN Daggoo_NP ._SENT 

Whether_IN the_DT flitting_VVG attendance_NN of_IN the_DT one_CD still_RB and_CC solitary_JJ jet_NN had_VHD 
gradually_RB worked_VVN upon_IN Ahab_NP ,_, so_RB that_IN/that he_PP was_VBD now_RB prepared_VVN to_TO connect_VV

particular_JJ whale_NN he_PP pursued_VVD ;_: however_RB this_DT was_VBD ,_, or_CC whether_IN his_PP$

did_VVD he_PP distinctly_RB perceive_VVP the_DT white_JJ mass_NN ,_, than_IN with_IN a_DT quick_JJ 
intensity_NN he_PP instantly_RB gave_VVD orders_NNS for_IN lowering_VVG ._SENT 

The_DT four_CD boats_NNS were_VBD soon_RB on_IN the_DT water_NN ;_: Ahab_NP 's_POS in_IN advance_NN ,_, and_CC all_RB 
swiftly_RB pulling_VVG towards_IN their_PP$ prey_NN ._SENT Soon_RB it_PP went_VVD down_RP ,_, and_CC while_IN ,_, 
with_IN oars_NNS suspended_VVN ,_, we_PP were_VBD awaiting_VVG its_PP$ reappearance_NN ,_, lo_NP !_SENT in_IN the_DT 
same_JJ spot_NN where_WRB it_PP sank_VVD ,_, once_RB more_RBR it_PP slowly_RB rose_VVD ._SENT Almost_RB forgetting_VVG 
for_IN the_DT moment_NN all_DT thoughts_NNS of_IN Moby_NP Dick_NP ,_, we_PP now_RB gazed_VVD at_IN the_DT most_JJS 
wondrous_JJ phenomenon_NN which_WDT the_DT secret_JJ seas_NNS have_VHP hitherto_RB revealed_VVN to_TO 
mankind_NN ._SENT A_DT vast_JJ pulpy_JJ mass_NN ,_, furlongs_NNS in_IN length_NN and_CC breadth_NN ,_, of_IN a_DT 
glancing_VVG cream-colour_NN ,_, lay_VVD floating_VVG on_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, innumerable_JJ long_RB

reach_VV ._SENT No_DT perceptible_JJ face_NN or_CC front_NN did_VVD it_PP have_VHP ;_: no_RB conceivable_JJ 
token_JJ of_IN either_DT sensation_NN or_CC instinct_NN ;_: but_CC undulated_VVD there_RB on_IN the_DT 
billows_NNS ,_, an_DT unearthly_JJ ,_, formless_JJ ,_, chance-like_JJ apparition_NN of_IN life_NN ._SENT 

As_RB with_IN a_DT low_JJ sucking_JJ sound_NN it_PP slowly_RB disappeared_VVD again_RB ,_, Starbuck_NP 
still_RB gazing_VVG at_IN the_DT agitated_VVN waters_NNS where_WRB it_PP had_VHD sunk_VVN ,_, with_IN a_DT wild_JJ 
voice_NN exclaimed--_NN "_`` Almost_RB rather_RB had_VHD I_PP seen_VVN Moby_NP Dick_NP and_CC fought_VVD him_PP ,_, 
than_IN to_TO have_VH seen_VVN thee_NP ,_, thou_NN white_JJ ghost_NN !_SENT "_'' 

"_'' What_WP was_VBD it_PP ,_, Sir_NP ?_SENT "_'' said_VVD Flask_NP ._SENT 

"_`` The_DT great_JJ live_JJ squid_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, they_PP say_VVP ,_, few_JJ whale-ships_NNS ever_RB beheld_VVN ,_, 
and_CC returned_VVN to_TO their_PP$ ports_NNS to_TO tell_VV of_IN it_PP ._SENT "_'' 

But_CC Ahab_NP said_VVD nothing_NN ;_: turning_VVG his_PP$ boat_NN ,_, he_PP sailed_VVD back_RB to_TO the_DT 
vessel_NN ;_: the_DT rest_NN as_IN silently_RB following_VVG ._SENT 

Whatever_WDT superstitions_NNS the_DT sperm_NN whalemen_NNS in_IN general_JJ have_VHP connected_VVN 
with_IN the_DT sight_NN of_IN this_DT object_NN ,_, certain_JJ it_PP is_VBZ ,_, that_IN/that a_DT glimpse_NN of_IN it_PP 
being_VBG so_RB very_RB unusual_JJ ,_, that_DT circumstance_NN has_VHZ gone_VVN far_RB to_TO invest_VV it_PP 
with_IN portentousness_NN ._SENT So_RB rarely_RB is_VBZ it_PP beheld_VVD ,_, that_IN/that though_IN one_CD and_CC all_RB 
of_IN them_PP declare_VVP it_PP to_TO be_VB the_DT largest_JJS animated_JJ thing_NN in_IN the_DT ocean_NN ,_, yet_RB 
very_RB few_JJ of_IN them_PP have_VHP any_DT but_CC the_DT most_RBS vague_JJ ideas_NNS concerning_VVG its_PP$ 
true_JJ nature_NN and_CC form_NN ;_: notwithstanding_RB ,_, they_PP believe_VVP it_PP to_TO furnish_VV to_TO 
the_DT sperm_NN whale_VV his_PP$ only_JJ food_NN ._SENT For_IN though_IN other_JJ species_NNS of_IN whales_NNS 
find_VV their_PP$ food_NN above_IN water_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD be_VB seen_VVN by_IN man_NN in_IN the_DT act_NN of_IN 
feeding_NN ,_, the_DT spermaceti_NN whale_NN obtains_VVZ his_PP$ whole_JJ food_NN in_IN unknown_JJ zones_NNS 
below_IN the_DT surface_NN ;_: and_CC only_RB by_IN inference_NN is_VBZ it_PP that_IN/that any_DT one_CD can_MD tell_VV 
of_IN what_WP ,_, precisely_RB ,_, that_DT food_NN consists_VVZ ._SENT At_IN times_NNS ,_, when_WRB closely_RB 
pursued_VVN ,_, he_PP will_MD disgorge_VV what_WP are_VBP supposed_VVN to_TO be_VB the_DT detached_JJ arms_NNS 
of_IN the_DT squid_NN ;_: some_DT of_IN them_PP thus_RB exhibited_VVD exceeding_VVG twenty_CD and_CC thirty_CD 
feet_NNS in_IN length_NN ._SENT They_PP fancy_VVP that_IN/that the_DT monster_NN to_TO which_WDT these_DT arms_NNS 
belonged_VVD ordinarily_RB clings_NNS by_IN them_PP to_TO the_DT bed_NN of_IN the_DT ocean_NN ;_: and_CC that_DT 
the_DT sperm_NN whale_NN ,_, unlike_IN other_JJ species_NNS ,_, is_VBZ supplied_VVN with_IN teeth_NNS in_IN 
order_NN to_TO attack_VV and_CC tear_VV it_PP ._SENT 

There_EX seems_VVZ some_DT ground_NN to_TO imagine_VV that_IN/that the_DT great_JJ Kraken_NN of_IN Bishop_NP 
Pontoppodan_NP may_MD ultimately_RB resolve_VV itself_PP into_IN Squid_NP ._SENT The_DT manner_NN in_IN 
which_WDT the_DT Bishop_NP describes_VVZ it_PP ,_, as_IN alternately_RB rising_VVG and_CC sinking_VVG ,_, 
with_IN some_DT other_JJ particulars_NNS he_PP narrates_VVZ ,_, in_IN all_PDT this_DT the_DT two_CD 
correspond_VV ._SENT But_CC much_JJ abatement_NN is_VBZ necessary_JJ with_IN respect_NN to_TO the_DT 
incredible_JJ bulk_NN he_PP assigns_VVZ it_PP ._SENT 

By_IN some_DT naturalists_NNS who_WP have_VHP vaguely_RB heard_VVN rumors_NNS of_IN the_DT mysterious_JJ

CHAPTER_NN 60_CD 

The_DT Line_NP ._SENT 


With_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT whaling_NN scene_NN shortly_RB to_TO be_VB described_VVN ,_, as_RB well_RB 
as_RB for_IN the_DT better_JJR understanding_NN of_IN all_DT similar_JJ scenes_NNS elsewhere_RB 
presented_VVN ,_, I_PP have_VHP here_RB to_TO speak_VV of_IN the_DT magical_JJ ,_, sometimes_RB horrible_JJ 
whale-line_NN ._SENT 

The_DT line_NN originally_RB used_VVN in_IN the_DT fishery_NN was_VBD of_IN the_DT best_JJS hemp_NN ,_, 
slightly_RB vapoured_JJ with_IN tar_NN ,_, not_RB impregnated_VVN with_IN it_PP ,_, as_RB in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN 
ordinary_JJ ropes_NNS ;_: for_IN while_IN tar_NN ,_, as_RB ordinarily_RB used_VVN ,_, makes_VVZ the_DT hemp_NN 
more_RBR pliable_JJ to_TO the_DT rope-maker_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB renders_VVZ the_DT rope_NN itself_PP more_RBR 
convenient_JJ to_TO the_DT sailor_NN for_IN common_JJ ship_NN use_NN ;_: yet_RB ,_, not_RB only_RB would_MD the_DT 
ordinary_JJ quantity_NN too_RB much_RB stiffen_VV the_DT whale-line_NN for_IN the_DT close_NN 
coiling_VVG to_TO which_WDT it_PP must_MD be_VB subjected_VVN ;_: but_CC as_IN most_JJS seamen_NNS are_VBP 
beginning_VVG to_TO learn_VV ,_, tar_NN in_IN general_NN by_IN no_DT means_NN adds_VVZ to_TO the_DT rope_NN 's_POS 
durability_NN or_CC strength_NN ,_, however_RB much_RB it_PP may_MD give_VV it_PP compactness_NN and_CC 
gloss_NN ._SENT 

Of_IN late_JJ years_NNS the_DT Manilla_NN rope_NN has_VHZ in_IN the_DT American_JJ fishery_NN almost_RB 
entirely_RB superseded_VVN hemp_NN as_IN a_DT material_NN for_IN whale-lines_NNS ;_: for_IN ,_, though_RB 
not_RB so_RB durable_JJ as_IN hemp_NN ,_, it_PP is_VBZ stronger_JJR ,_, and_CC far_RB more_RBR soft_JJ and_CC 
elastic_NN ;_: and_CC I_PP will_MD add_VV (_( since_IN there_EX is_VBZ an_DT aesthetics_NN in_IN all_DT things_NNS )_) ,_, 
is_VBZ much_RB more_RBR handsome_JJ and_CC becoming_VVG to_TO the_DT boat_NN ,_, than_IN hemp_NN ._SENT Hemp_NP is_VBZ a_DT 
dusky_JJ ,_, dark_JJ fellow_NN ,_, a_DT sort_NN of_IN Indian_JJ ;_: but_CC Manilla_NN is_VBZ as_IN a_DT 
golden-haired_VVN Circassian_JJ to_TO behold_VV ._SENT 

The_DT whale-line_NN is_VBZ only_RB two-thirds_JJ of_IN an_DT inch_NN in_IN thickness_NN ._SENT At_IN first_JJ 
sight_NN ,_, you_PP would_MD not_RB think_VV it_PP so_RB strong_JJ as_IN it_PP really_RB is_VBZ ._SENT By_IN 
experiment_VV its_PP$ one_CD and_CC fifty_CD yarns_NNS will_MD each_RB suspend_VV a_DT weight_NN of_IN one_CD 
hundred_CD and_CC twenty_CD pounds_NNS ;_: so_RB that_IN/that the_DT whole_JJ rope_NN will_MD bear_VV a_DT strain_NN 
nearly_RB equal_JJ to_TO three_CD tons_NNS ._SENT In_IN length_NN ,_, the_DT common_JJ sperm_NN whale-line_NN 
measures_NNS something_NN over_IN two_CD hundred_CD fathoms_NNS ._SENT Towards_IN the_DT stern_JJ of_IN 
the_DT boat_NN it_PP is_VBZ spirally_RB coiled_VVN away_RB in_IN the_DT tub_NN ,_, not_RB like_IN the_DT 
worm-pipe_NN of_IN a_DT still_RB though_RB ,_, but_CC so_RB as_RB to_TO form_VV one_CD round_NN ,_, 
cheese-shaped_JJ mass_NN of_IN densely_RB bedded_VVN "_'' sheaves_NNS ,_, "_'' or_CC layers_VVZ of_IN 
concentric_JJ spiralizations_NNS ,_, without_IN any_DT hollow_NN but_CC the_DT "_`` heart_NN ,_, "_'' or_CC 
minute_JJ vertical_JJ tube_NN formed_VVN at_IN the_DT axis_NN of_IN the_DT cheese_NN ._SENT As_IN the_DT least_JJS 
tangle_NN or_CC kink_NN in_IN the_DT coiling_VVG would_MD ,_, in_IN running_VVG out_RP ,_, infallibly_RB take_VV 
somebody_NN 's_POS arm_NN ,_, leg_NN ,_, or_CC entire_JJ body_NN off_RB ,_, the_DT utmost_JJ precaution_NN is_VBZ 
used_VVN in_IN stowing_VVG the_DT line_NN in_IN its_PP$ tub_NN ._SENT Some_DT harpooneers_NNS will_MD consume_VV 
almost_RB an_DT entire_JJ morning_NN in_IN this_DT business_NN ,_, carrying_VVG the_DT line_NN high_NN 
aloft_RB and_CC then_RB reeving_VVG it_PP downwards_RB through_IN a_DT block_NN towards_IN the_DT tub_NN ,_, 
so_RB as_RB in_IN the_DT act_NN of_IN coiling_VVG to_TO free_VV it_PP from_IN all_DT possible_JJ wrinkles_NNS and_CC 
twists_NNS ._SENT 

In_IN the_DT English_NP boats_NNS two_CD tubs_NNS are_VBP used_VVN instead_RB of_IN one_CD ;_: the_DT same_JJ line_NN 
being_VBG continuously_RB coiled_VVN in_IN both_DT tubs_NNS ._SENT There_EX is_VBZ some_DT advantage_NN in_IN 
this_DT ;_: because_IN these_DT twin-tubs_NNS being_VBG so_RB small_JJ they_PP fit_VVP more_RBR readily_RB 
into_IN the_DT boat_NN ,_, and_CC do_VVP not_RB strain_VV it_PP so_RB much_JJ ;_: whereas_IN ,_, the_DT American_NP 
tub_NN ,_, nearly_RB three_CD feet_NNS in_IN diameter_NN and_CC of_IN proportionate_JJ depth_NN ,_, makes_VVZ 
a_DT rather_RB bulky_JJ freight_NN for_IN a_DT craft_NN whose_WP$ planks_NNS are_VBP but_CC one_CD half-inch_JJ 
in_IN thickness_NN ;_: for_IN the_DT bottom_NN of_IN the_DT whale-boat_NN is_VBZ like_IN critical_JJ ice_NN ,_, 
which_WDT will_MD bear_VV up_RP a_DT considerable_JJ distributed_VVN weight_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB very_RB 
much_RB of_IN a_DT concentrated_JJ one_CD ._SENT When_WRB the_DT painted_JJ canvas_NN cover_NN is_VBZ clapped_VVN 
on_IN the_DT American_JJ line-tub_NN ,_, the_DT boat_NN looks_VVZ as_RB if_IN it_PP were_VBD pulling_VVG off_RP 
with_IN a_DT prodigious_JJ great_JJ wedding-cake_NN to_TO present_VV to_TO the_DT whales_NNS ._SENT 

Both_DT ends_NNS of_IN the_DT line_NN are_VBP exposed_VVN ;_: the_DT lower_JJR end_NN terminating_VVG in_IN an_DT 
eye-splice_NNS or_CC loop_NN coming_VVG up_RP from_IN the_DT bottom_NN against_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT 
tub_NN ,_, and_CC hanging_VVG over_RP its_PP$ edge_NN completely_RB disengaged_VVN from_IN everything_NN ._SENT 
This_DT arrangement_NN of_IN the_DT lower_JJR end_NN is_VBZ necessary_JJ on_IN two_CD accounts_NNS ._SENT 
First_NP :_: In_IN order_NN to_TO facilitate_VV the_DT fastening_NN to_TO it_PP of_IN an_DT additional_JJ 
line_NN from_IN a_DT neighboring_JJ boat_NN ,_, in_IN case_NN the_DT stricken_JJ whale_NN should_MD sound_VV 
so_RB deep_JJ as_RB to_TO threaten_VV to_TO carry_VV off_RP the_DT entire_JJ line_NN originally_RB 
attached_VVN to_TO the_DT harpoon_NN ._SENT In_IN these_DT instances_NNS ,_, the_DT whale_NN of_IN course_NN is_VBZ 
shifted_VVN like_IN a_DT mug_NN of_IN ale_NN ,_, as_IN it_PP were_VBD ,_, from_IN the_DT one_CD boat_NN to_TO the_DT 
other_JJ ;_: though_IN the_DT first_JJ boat_NN always_RB hovers_VVZ at_IN hand_NN to_TO assist_VV its_PP$ 
consort_VV ._SENT Second_NN :_: This_DT arrangement_NN is_VBZ indispensable_JJ for_IN common_JJ 
safety_NN 's_POS sake_NN ;_: for_IN were_VBD the_DT lower_JJR end_NN of_IN the_DT line_NN in_IN any_DT way_NN attached_VVD 
to_TO the_DT boat_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD the_DT whale_NN then_RB to_TO run_VV the_DT line_NN out_RP to_TO the_DT end_NN 
almost_RB in_IN a_DT single_JJ ,_, smoking_NN minute_NN as_IN he_PP sometimes_RB does_VVZ ,_, he_PP would_MD not_RB 
stop_VV there_RB ,_, for_IN the_DT doomed_JJ boat_NN would_MD infallibly_RB be_VB dragged_VVN down_RP 
after_IN him_PP into_IN the_DT profundity_NN of_IN the_DT sea_NN ;_: and_CC in_IN that_DT case_NN no_RB 
town-crier_NN would_MD ever_RB find_VV her_PP again_RB ._SENT 

Before_IN lowering_VVG the_DT boat_NN for_IN the_DT chase_NN ,_, the_DT upper_JJ end_NN of_IN the_DT line_NN is_VBZ 
taken_VVN aft_JJ from_IN the_DT tub_NN ,_, and_CC passing_VVG round_NN the_DT loggerhead_NN there_RB ,_, is_VBZ 
again_RB carried_VVN forward_RB the_DT entire_JJ length_NN of_IN the_DT boat_NN ,_, resting_VVG 
crosswise_RB upon_IN the_DT loom_NN or_CC handle_VV of_IN every_DT man_NN 's_POS oar_NN ,_, so_IN that_WDT it_PP jogs_VVZ 
against_IN his_PP$ wrist_NN in_IN rowing_NN ;_: and_CC also_RB passing_VVG between_IN the_DT men_NNS ,_, as_RB 
they_PP alternately_RB sit_VVP at_IN the_DT opposite_JJ gunwales_NNS ,_, to_TO the_DT leaded_JJ chocks_NNS 
or_CC grooves_NNS in_IN the_DT extreme_JJ pointed_JJ prow_NN of_IN the_DT boat_NN ,_, where_WRB a_DT wooden_JJ 
pin_VV or_CC skewer_VV the_DT size_NN of_IN a_DT common_JJ quill_NN ,_, prevents_VVZ it_PP from_IN slipping_VVG 
out_RB ._SENT From_IN the_DT chocks_NNS it_PP hangs_VVZ in_IN a_DT slight_JJ festoon_NN over_IN the_DT bows_NNS ,_, and_NP 
is_VBZ then_RB passed_VVN inside_IN the_DT boat_NN again_RB ;_: and_CC some_DT ten_CD or_CC twenty_CD fathoms_NNS 
(_( called_VVN box-line_NN )_) being_VBG coiled_VVN upon_IN the_DT box_NN in_IN the_DT bows_NNS ,_, it_PP continues_VVZ 
its_PP$ way_NN to_TO the_DT gunwale_NN still_RB a_DT little_RB further_RBR aft_JJ ,_, and_CC is_VBZ then_RB 
attached_VVN to_TO the_DT short-warp--the_NN rope_NN which_WDT is_VBZ immediately_RB connected_VVN 
with_IN the_DT harpoon_NN ;_: but_CC previous_JJ to_TO that_DT connexion_NN ,_, the_DT short-warp_NN goes_VVZ 
through_IN sundry_JJ mystifications_NNS too_RB tedious_JJ to_TO detail_NN ._SENT 

Thus_RB the_DT whale-line_NN folds_VVZ the_DT whole_JJ boat_NN in_IN its_PP$ complicated_JJ coils_NNS ,_, 
twisting_VVG and_CC writhing_VVG around_IN it_PP in_IN almost_RB every_DT direction_NN ._SENT All_PDT the_DT 
oarsmen_NNS are_VBP involved_VVN in_IN its_PP$ perilous_JJ contortions_NNS ;_: so_IN that_WDT to_TO the_DT 
timid_JJ eye_NN of_IN the_DT landsman_NN ,_, they_PP seem_VVP as_IN Indian_JJ jugglers_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT 
deadliest_JJS snakes_NNS sportively_RB festooning_VVG their_PP$ limbs_NNS ._SENT Nor_CC can_MD any_DT son_NN 
of_IN mortal_JJ woman_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN ,_, seat_VV himself_PP amid_IN those_DT hempen_JJ 
intricacies_NNS ,_, and_CC while_IN straining_VVG his_PP$ utmost_NN at_IN the_DT oar_NN ,_, bethink_VV him_PP 
that_DT at_IN any_DT unknown_JJ instant_NN the_DT harpoon_NN may_MD be_VB darted_VVN ,_, and_CC all_PDT these_DT 
horrible_JJ contortions_NNS be_VB put_VVN in_IN play_NN like_IN ringed_JJ lightnings_NNS ;_: he_PP cannot_MD 
be_VB thus_RB circumstanced_JJ without_IN a_DT shudder_NN that_WDT makes_VVZ the_DT very_JJ marrow_NN in_IN 
his_PP$ bones_NNS to_TO quiver_VV in_IN him_PP like_VVP a_DT shaken_JJ jelly_NN ._SENT Yet_RB habit--strange_NN 
thing_NN !_SENT what_WP cannot_MD habit_VV accomplish_VV ?_SENT --Gayer_NN sallies_NNS ,_, more_RBR merry_JJ 
mirth_NN ,_, better_JJR jokes_NNS ,_, and_CC brighter_JJR repartees_NNS ,_, you_PP never_RB heard_VVD over_RP 
your_PP$ mahogany_NN ,_, than_IN you_PP will_MD hear_VV over_IN the_DT half-inch_JJ white_JJ cedar_NN of_IN 
the_DT whale-boat_NN ,_, when_WRB thus_RB hung_VVN in_IN hangman_NN 's_POS nooses_NNS ;_: and_CC ,_, like_IN the_DT six_CD 
burghers_NNS of_IN Calais_NP before_IN King_NP Edward_NP ,_, the_DT six_CD men_NNS composing_VVG the_DT crew_NN 
pull_VV into_IN the_DT jaws_NNS of_IN death_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT halter_NN around_IN every_DT neck_NN ,_, as_IN you_PP 
may_MD say_VV ._SENT 

Perhaps_RB a_DT very_RB little_JJ thought_NN will_MD now_RB enable_VV you_PP to_TO account_VV for_IN 
those_DT repeated_JJ whaling_NN disasters--some_NN few_JJ of_IN which_WDT are_VBP casually_RB 
chronicled--of_JJ this_DT man_NN or_CC that_DT man_NN being_VBG taken_VVN out_RP of_IN the_DT boat_NN by_IN 
the_DT line_NN ,_, and_CC lost_VVD ._SENT For_IN ,_, when_WRB the_DT line_NN is_VBZ darting_VVG out_RP ,_, to_TO be_VB seated_VVN 
then_RB in_IN the_DT boat_NN ,_, is_VBZ like_IN being_VBG seated_VVN in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN the_DT manifold_NN 
whizzings_NNS of_IN a_DT steam-engine_NN in_IN full_JJ play_NN ,_, when_WRB every_DT flying_VVG beam_NN ,_, and_NP 
shaft_NN ,_, and_CC wheel_NN ,_, is_VBZ grazing_VVG you_PP ._SENT It_PP is_VBZ worse_JJR ;_: for_IN you_PP cannot_MD sit_VV 
motionless_JJ in_IN the_DT heart_NN of_IN these_DT perils_NNS ,_, because_IN the_DT boat_NN is_VBZ rocking_VVG 
like_IN a_DT cradle_NN ,_, and_CC you_PP are_VBP pitched_VVN one_CD way_NN and_CC the_DT other_JJ ,_, without_IN the_DT 
slightest_JJS warning_NN ;_: and_CC only_RB by_IN a_DT certain_JJ self-adjusting_VVG buoyancy_NN and_CC 
simultaneousness_NN of_IN volition_NN and_CC action_NN ,_, can_MD you_PP escape_VV being_VBG made_VVN a_DT 
Mazeppa_NP of_IN ,_, and_CC run_VV away_RP with_IN where_WRB the_DT all-seeing_JJ sun_NN himself_PP could_MD 
never_RB pierce_VV you_PP out_RP ._SENT 

Again_RB :_: as_IN the_DT profound_JJ calm_NN which_WDT only_RB apparently_RB precedes_VVZ and_CC 
prophesies_VVZ of_IN the_DT storm_NN ,_, is_VBZ perhaps_RB more_RBR awful_JJ than_IN the_DT storm_NN itself_PP ;_: 
for_IN ,_, indeed_RB ,_, the_DT calm_NN is_VBZ but_CC the_DT wrapper_NN and_CC envelope_NN of_IN the_DT storm_NN ;_: 
and_CC contains_VVZ it_PP in_IN itself_PP ,_, as_IN the_DT seemingly_RB harmless_JJ rifle_NN holds_VVZ the_DT 
fatal_JJ powder_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT ball_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT explosion_NN ;_: so_RB the_DT graceful_JJ repose_NN 
of_IN the_DT line_NN ,_, as_IN it_PP silently_RB serpentines_NNS about_IN the_DT oarsmen_NNS before_RB 
being_VBG brought_VVN into_IN actual_JJ play--this_NNS is_VBZ a_DT thing_NN which_WDT carries_VVZ more_JJR of_IN 
true_JJ terror_NN than_IN any_DT other_JJ aspect_NN of_IN this_DT dangerous_JJ affair_NN ._SENT But_CC why_WRB 
say_VV more_RBR ?_SENT All_DT men_NNS live_VVP enveloped_VVN in_IN whale-lines_NNS ._SENT All_DT are_VBP born_VVN with_IN 
halters_NNS round_VVP their_PP$ necks_NNS ;_: but_CC it_PP is_VBZ only_RB when_WRB caught_VVN in_IN the_DT swift_JJ ,_,

respirations_NNS ._SENT At_IN last_JJ ,_, gush_VVP after_RB gush_VV of_IN clotted_VVN red_JJ gore_NN ,_, as_RB if_IN it_PP

falling_VVG back_RB again_RB ,_, ran_VVD dripping_VVG down_RP his_PP$ motionless_JJ flanks_NNS into_IN 
the_DT sea_NN ._SENT His_PP$ heart_NN had_VHD burst_VVN !_SENT 

"_`` He_PP 's_VBZ dead_JJ ,_, Mr._NP Stubb_NP ,_, "_'' said_VVD Daggoo_NP ._SENT 

"_`` Yes_UH ;_: both_CC pipes_NNS smoked_VVD out_RP !_SENT "_'' and_CC withdrawing_VVG his_PP$ own_JJ from_IN his_PP$ mouth_NN ,_, 
Stubb_NP scattered_VVD the_DT dead_JJ ashes_NNS over_IN the_DT water_NN ;_: and_CC ,_, for_IN a_DT moment_NN ,_, 
stood_VVD thoughtfully_RB eyeing_VVG the_DT vast_JJ corpse_NN he_PP had_VHD made_VVN ._SENT 



CHAPTER_NN 62_CD 

The_DT Dart_NP ._SENT 


A_DT word_NN concerning_VVG an_DT incident_NN in_IN the_DT last_JJ chapter_NN ._SENT 

According_VVG to_TO the_DT invariable_JJ usage_NN of_IN the_DT fishery_NN ,_, the_DT whale-boat_NN 
pushes_VVZ off_RP from_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT headsman_NN or_CC whale-killer_NN as_RB 
temporary_JJ steersman_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT harpooneer_NN or_CC whale-fastener_NN pulling_VVG the_DT 
foremost_JJ oar_NN ,_, the_DT one_CD known_VVN as_IN the_DT harpooneer-oar_NN ._SENT Now_RB it_PP needs_VVZ a_DT 
strong_JJ ,_, nervous_JJ arm_NN to_TO strike_VV the_DT first_JJ iron_NN into_IN the_DT fish_NN ;_: for_IN 
often_RB ,_, in_IN what_WP is_VBZ called_VVN a_DT long_JJ dart_NN ,_, the_DT heavy_JJ implement_NN has_VHZ to_TO be_VB 
flung_VVN to_TO the_DT distance_NN of_IN twenty_CD or_CC thirty_CD feet_NNS ._SENT But_CC however_RB 
prolonged_JJ and_CC exhausting_VVG the_DT chase_NN ,_, the_DT harpooneer_NN is_VBZ expected_VVN to_TO 
pull_VV his_PP$ oar_NN meanwhile_RB to_TO the_DT uttermost_NN ;_: indeed_RB ,_, he_PP is_VBZ expected_VVN to_TO 
set_VV an_DT example_NN of_IN superhuman_JJ activity_NN to_TO the_DT rest_NN ,_, not_RB only_RB by_IN 
incredible_JJ rowing_NN ,_, but_CC by_IN repeated_JJ loud_JJ and_CC intrepid_JJ exclamations_NNS ;_: 
and_CC what_WP it_PP is_VBZ to_TO keep_VV shouting_VVG at_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN one_CD 's_POS compass_NN ,_, while_NN 
all_PDT the_DT other_JJ muscles_NNS are_VBP strained_VVN and_CC half_DT started--what_NN that_WDT is_VBZ 
none_NN know_VVP but_CC those_DT who_WP have_VHP tried_VVN it_PP ._SENT For_IN one_CD ,_, I_PP cannot_MD bawl_VV very_RB 
heartily_RB and_CC work_VV very_RB recklessly_RB at_IN one_CD and_CC the_DT same_JJ time_NN ._SENT In_IN this_DT 
straining_NN ,_, bawling_VVG state_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, with_IN his_PP$ back_NN to_TO the_DT fish_NN ,_, all_DT at_IN 
once_IN the_DT exhausted_VVN harpooneer_NN hears_VVZ the_DT exciting_JJ cry--_NN "_'' Stand_VVP up_RP ,_, and_NP 
give_VV it_PP to_TO him_PP !_SENT "_`` He_PP now_RB has_VHZ to_TO drop_VV and_CC secure_VV his_PP$ oar_NN ,_, turn_NN round_NN 
on_IN his_PP$ centre_NN half_NN way_NN ,_, seize_VV his_PP$ harpoon_NN from_IN the_DT crotch_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN 
what_WP little_JJ strength_NN may_MD remain_VV ,_, he_PP essays_VVZ to_TO pitch_VV it_PP somehow_RB into_IN 
the_DT whale_NN ._SENT No_DT wonder_NN ,_, taking_VVG the_DT whole_JJ fleet_NN of_IN whalemen_NNS in_IN a_DT body_NN ,_, 
that_IN/that out_RB of_IN fifty_CD fair_JJ chances_NNS for_IN a_DT dart_NN ,_, not_RB five_CD are_VBP successful_JJ ;_: 
no_DT wonder_VVP that_IN/that so_RB many_JJ hapless_JJ harpooneers_NNS are_VBP madly_RB cursed_VVN and_CC 
disrated_VVN ;_: no_DT wonder_NN that_IN/that some_DT of_IN them_PP actually_RB burst_VVP their_PP$ 
blood-vessels_NNS in_IN the_DT boat_NN ;_: no_DT wonder_NN that_IN/that some_DT sperm_NN whalemen_NNS are_VBP 
absent_VV four_CD years_NNS with_IN four_CD barrels_NNS ;_: no_DT wonder_NN that_IN/that to_TO many_JJ ship_NN 
owners_NNS ,_, whaling_NN is_VBZ but_CC a_DT losing_VVG concern_NN ;_: for_IN it_PP is_VBZ the_DT harpooneer_NN 
that_IN/that makes_VVZ the_DT voyage_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN you_PP take_VVP the_DT breath_NN out_RP of_IN his_PP$ body_NN how_WRB 
can_MD you_PP expect_VV to_TO find_VV it_PP there_RB when_WRB most_JJS wanted_VVD !_SENT 

Again_RB ,_, if_IN the_DT dart_NN be_VB successful_JJ ,_, then_RB at_IN the_DT second_JJ critical_JJ 
instant_NN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ ,_, when_WRB the_DT whale_NN starts_VVZ to_TO run_VV ,_, the_DT boatheader_NP and_NP 
harpooneer_NN likewise_RB start_VV to_TO running_VVG fore_NN and_CC aft_JJ ,_, to_TO the_DT imminent_JJ 
jeopardy_NN of_IN themselves_PP and_CC every_DT one_CD else_RB ._SENT It_PP is_VBZ then_RB they_PP change_VVP 
places_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT headsman_NN ,_, the_DT chief_JJ officer_NN of_IN the_DT little_JJ craft_NN ,_, 
takes_VVZ his_PP$ proper_JJ station_NN in_IN the_DT bows_NNS of_IN the_DT boat_NN ._SENT 

Now_RB ,_, I_PP care_VVP not_RB who_WP maintains_VVZ the_DT contrary_NN ,_, but_CC all_PDT this_DT is_VBZ both_DT 
foolish_JJ and_CC unnecessary_JJ ._SENT The_DT headsman_NN should_MD stay_VV in_IN the_DT bows_NNS from_IN 
first_JJ to_TO last_VV ;_: he_PP should_MD both_CC dart_VV the_DT harpoon_NN and_CC the_DT lance_NN ,_, and_CC no_RB 
rowing_NN whatever_WDT should_MD be_VB expected_VVN of_IN him_PP ,_, except_IN under_IN circumstances_NNS 
obvious_JJ to_TO any_DT fisherman_NN ._SENT I_PP know_VVP that_IN/that this_DT would_MD sometimes_RB involve_VV a_DT 
slight_JJ loss_NN of_IN speed_NN in_IN the_DT chase_NN ;_: but_CC long_JJ experience_NN in_IN various_JJ 
whalemen_NNS of_IN more_JJR than_IN one_CD nation_NN has_VHZ convinced_VVN me_PP that_IN/that in_IN the_DT vast_JJ 
majority_NN of_IN failures_NNS in_IN the_DT fishery_NN ,_, it_PP has_VHZ not_RB by_IN any_DT means_NN been_VBN so_RB 
much_RB the_DT speed_NN of_IN the_DT whale_NN as_IN the_DT before_RB described_VVN exhaustion_NN of_IN the_DT 
harpooneer_NN that_WDT has_VHZ caused_VVN them_PP ._SENT 

To_TO insure_VV the_DT greatest_JJS efficiency_NN in_IN the_DT dart_NN ,_, the_DT harpooneers_NNS of_IN 
this_DT world_NN must_MD start_VV to_TO their_PP$ feet_NNS from_IN out_RB of_IN idleness_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB 
from_IN out_RB of_IN toil_NN ._SENT 



CHAPTER_NN 63_CD 

The_DT Crotch_NP ._SENT 


Out_RB of_IN the_DT trunk_NN ,_, the_DT branches_NNS grow_VVP ;_: out_RB of_IN them_PP ,_, the_DT twigs_NNS ._SENT So_RB ,_, in_RB 
productive_JJ subjects_NNS ,_, grow_VV the_DT chapters_NNS ._SENT 

The_DT crotch_NN alluded_VVD to_TO on_IN a_DT previous_JJ page_NN deserves_VVZ independent_JJ 
mention_NN ._SENT It_PP is_VBZ a_DT notched_VVN stick_NN of_IN a_DT peculiar_JJ form_NN ,_, some_DT two_CD feet_NNS in_IN 
length_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ perpendicularly_RB inserted_VVN into_IN the_DT starboard_JJ gunwale_NN 
near_IN the_DT bow_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN furnishing_VVG a_DT rest_NN for_IN the_DT wooden_JJ 
extremity_NN of_IN the_DT harpoon_NN ,_, whose_WP$ other_JJ naked_JJ ,_, barbed_JJ end_NN slopingly_RB 
projects_NNS from_IN the_DT prow_NN ._SENT Thereby_RB the_DT weapon_NN is_VBZ instantly_RB at_IN hand_VV to_TO 
its_PP$ hurler_NN ,_, who_WP snatches_VVZ it_PP up_RP as_RB readily_RB from_IN its_PP$ rest_NN as_IN a_DT

two_CD harpoons_NNS reposing_VVG in_IN the_DT crotch_NN ,_, respectively_RB called_VVD the_DT first_JJ 
and_CC second_JJ irons_NNS ._SENT 

But_CC these_DT two_CD harpoons_NNS ,_, each_DT by_IN its_PP$ own_JJ cord_NN ,_, are_VBP both_CC connected_VVN with_IN 
the_DT line_NN ;_: the_DT object_NN being_VBG this_DT :_: to_TO dart_VV them_PP both_CC ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, one_CD 
instantly_RB after_IN the_DT other_JJ into_IN the_DT same_JJ whale_NN ;_: so_RB that_DT if_IN ,_, in_IN the_DT 
coming_VVG drag_NN ,_, one_PP should_MD draw_VV out_RP ,_, the_DT other_JJ may_MD still_RB retain_VV a_DT hold_NN ._SENT 
It_PP is_VBZ a_DT doubling_NN of_IN the_DT chances_NNS ._SENT But_CC it_PP very_RB often_RB happens_VVZ that_DT

upon_IN receiving_VVG the_DT first_JJ iron_NN ,_, it_PP becomes_VVZ impossible_JJ for_IN the_DT 
harpooneer_NN ,_, however_RB lightning-like_JJ in_IN his_PP$ movements_NNS ,_, to_TO pitch_VV the_DT 
second_JJ iron_NN into_IN him_PP ._SENT Nevertheless_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT second_JJ iron_NN is_VBZ already_RB 
connected_VVN with_IN the_DT line_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT line_NN is_VBZ running_VVG ,_, hence_RB that_DT weapon_NN 
must_MD ,_, at_IN all_DT events_NNS ,_, be_VB anticipatingly_RB tossed_VVN out_RP of_IN the_DT boat_NN ,_,

all_DT hands_NNS ._SENT Tumbled_VVN into_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, it_PP accordingly_RB is_VBZ in_IN such_JJ cases_NNS ;_: 
the_DT spare_JJ coils_NNS of_IN box_NN line_NN (_( mentioned_VVN in_IN a_DT preceding_JJ chapter_NN )_) making_VVG 
this_DT feat_NN ,_, in_IN most_JJS instances_NNS ,_, prudently_RB practicable_JJ ._SENT But_CC this_DT 
critical_JJ act_NN is_VBZ not_RB always_RB unattended_JJ with_IN the_DT saddest_JJS and_CC most_RBS fatal_JJ 
casualties_NNS ._SENT 

Furthermore_RB :_: you_PP must_MD know_VV that_IN/that when_WRB the_DT second_JJ iron_NN is_VBZ thrown_VVN 
overboard_RB ,_, it_PP thenceforth_RB becomes_VVZ a_DT dangling_JJ ,_, sharp-edged_JJ terror_NN ,_, 
skittishly_RB curvetting_VVG about_IN both_DT boat_NN and_CC whale_NN ,_, entangling_VVG the_DT 
lines_NNS ,_, or_CC cutting_VVG them_PP ,_, and_CC making_VVG a_DT prodigious_JJ sensation_NN in_IN all_DT 
directions_NNS ._SENT Nor_CC ,_, in_IN general_NN ,_, is_VBZ it_PP possible_JJ to_TO secure_VV it_PP again_RB until_IN 
the_DT whale_NN is_VBZ fairly_RB captured_VVN and_CC a_DT corpse_NN ._SENT 

Consider_VV ,_, now_RB ,_, how_WRB it_PP must_MD be_VB in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN four_CD boats_NNS all_RB engaging_VVG 
one_CD unusually_RB strong_JJ ,_, active_JJ ,_, and_CC knowing_VVG whale_NN ;_: when_WRB owing_VVG to_TO these_DT

such_PDT an_DT audacious_JJ enterprise_NN ,_, eight_CD or_CC ten_CD loose_JJ second_JJ irons_NNS may_MD be_VB

CHAPTER_NN 64_CD 

Stubb_NP 's_POS Supper_NP ._SENT 


Stubb_NP 's_POS whale_NN had_VHD been_VBN killed_VVN some_DT distance_NN from_IN the_DT ship_NN ._SENT It_PP was_VBD a_DT 
calm_NN ;_: so_RB ,_, forming_VVG a_DT tandem_NN of_IN three_CD boats_NNS ,_, we_PP commenced_VVD the_DT slow_JJ

*_SYM A_DT little_JJ item_NN may_MD as_RB well_RB be_VB related_VVN here_RB ._SENT The_DT strongest_JJS and_CC most_JJS 
reliable_JJ hold_NN which_WDT the_DT ship_NN has_VHZ upon_IN the_DT whale_NN when_WRB moored_VVN 
alongside_RB ,_, is_VBZ by_IN the_DT flukes_NNS or_CC tail_NN ;_: and_CC as_RB from_IN its_PP$ greater_JJR density_NN

the_DT boat_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO put_VV the_DT chain_NN round_NN it_PP ._SENT But_CC this_DT difficulty_NN is_VBZ 
ingeniously_RB overcome_VVN :_: a_DT small_JJ ,_, strong_JJ line_NN is_VBZ prepared_VVN with_IN a_DT wooden_JJ

If_IN moody_JJ Ahab_NP was_VBD now_RB all_DT quiescence_NN ,_, at_IN least_JJS so_RB far_RB as_RB could_MD be_VB

"_'' A_DT steak_NN ,_, a_DT steak_NN ,_, ere_IN I_PP sleep_VVP !_SENT You_PP ,_, Daggoo_NP !_SENT overboard_RB you_PP go_VVP ,_, and_NP 
cut_VV me_PP one_CD from_IN his_PP$ small_JJ !_SENT "_'' 

Here_RB be_VB it_PP known_VVN ,_, that_IN/that though_IN these_DT wild_JJ fishermen_NNS do_VVP not_RB ,_, as_IN a_DT 
general_JJ thing_NN ,_, and_CC according_VVG to_TO the_DT great_JJ military_JJ maxim_NN ,_, make_VVP the_DT

of_IN these_DT Nantucketers_NP who_WP have_VHP a_DT genuine_JJ relish_NN for_IN that_DT particular_JJ 
part_NN of_IN the_DT Sperm_NP Whale_NP designated_VVN by_IN Stubb_NP ;_: comprising_VVG the_DT tapering_VVG 
extremity_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN ._SENT 

About_IN midnight_NN that_IN/that steak_NN was_VBD cut_VVN and_CC cooked_VVN ;_: and_CC lighted_VVN by_IN two_CD 
lanterns_NNS of_IN sperm_NN oil_NN ,_, Stubb_NP stoutly_RB stood_VVD up_RP to_TO his_PP$ spermaceti_NN 
supper_NN at_IN the_DT capstan-head_NN ,_, as_RB if_IN that_DT capstan_NN were_VBD a_DT sideboard_NN ._SENT Nor_CC 
was_VBD Stubb_NP the_DT only_JJ banqueter_NN on_IN whale_NN 's_POS flesh_NN that_IN/that night_NN ._SENT Mingling_VVG 
their_PP$ mumblings_NNS with_IN his_PP$ own_JJ mastications_NNS ,_, thousands_NNS on_IN thousands_NNS of_IN 
sharks_NNS ,_, swarming_VVG round_NN the_DT dead_JJ leviathan_NN ,_, smackingly_RB feasted_VVN on_IN its_PP$ 
fatness_NN ._SENT The_DT few_JJ sleepers_NNS below_IN in_IN their_PP$ bunks_NNS were_VBD often_RB startled_VVN 
by_IN the_DT sharp_JJ slapping_NN of_IN their_PP$ tails_NNS against_IN the_DT hull_NN ,_, within_IN a_DT few_JJ 
inches_NNS of_IN the_DT sleepers_NNS '_POS hearts_NNS ._SENT Peering_VVG over_IN the_DT side_NN you_PP could_MD just_RB 
see_VV them_PP (_( as_RB before_IN you_PP heard_VVD them_PP )_) wallowing_VVG in_IN the_DT sullen_JJ ,_, black_JJ 
waters_NNS ,_, and_CC turning_VVG over_RP on_IN their_PP$ backs_NNS as_IN they_PP scooped_VVD out_RB huge_JJ 
globular_JJ pieces_NNS of_IN the_DT whale_NN of_IN the_DT bigness_NN of_IN a_DT human_JJ head_NN ._SENT This_DT 
particular_JJ feat_NN of_IN the_DT shark_NN seems_VVZ all_DT but_CC miraculous_JJ ._SENT How_WRB at_IN such_JJ

The_DT Shark_NP Massacre_NP ._SENT

CHAPTER_NN 67_CD 

Cutting_VVG In_IN ._SENT 


It_PP was_VBD a_DT Saturday_NP night_NN ,_, and_CC such_PDT a_DT Sabbath_NN as_RB followed_VVN !_SENT Ex_JJ officio_NN 
professors_NNS of_IN Sabbath_NN breaking_NN are_VBP all_DT whalemen_NNS ._SENT The_DT ivory_JJ Pequod_NP 
was_VBD turned_VVN into_IN what_WP seemed_VVD a_DT shamble_NN ;_: every_DT sailor_NN a_DT butcher_NN ._SENT You_PP 
would_MD have_VH thought_VVN we_PP were_VBD offering_VVG up_RP ten_CD thousand_CD red_JJ oxen_NNS to_TO the_DT

In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN ,_, the_DT enormous_JJ cutting_NN tackles_NNS ,_, among_IN other_JJ 
ponderous_JJ things_NNS comprising_VVG a_DT cluster_NN of_IN blocks_NNS generally_RB painted_VVN

of_IN the_DT hawser-like_JJ rope_NN winding_VVG through_IN these_DT intricacies_NNS ,_, was_VBD then_RB

The_DT Funeral_NP ._SENT

There_EX 's_VBZ a_DT most_RBS doleful_JJ and_CC most_JJS mocking_VVG funeral_NN !_SENT The_DT sea-vultures_NNS 
all_DT in_IN pious_JJ mourning_NN ,_, the_DT air-sharks_NNS all_RB punctiliously_RB in_IN black_JJ or_CC

ween_VV ,_, if_IN peradventure_NN he_PP had_VHD needed_VVN it_PP ;_: but_CC upon_IN the_DT banquet_NN of_IN his_PP$

CHAPTER_NN 70_CD 

The_DT Sphynx_NN ._SENT

CHAPTER_NN 71_CD 

The_DT Jeroboam_NP 's_POS Story_NN ._SENT

out_RB ._SENT So_RB strongly_RB did_VVD he_PP work_VV upon_RP his_PP$ disciples_NNS among_IN the_DT crew_NN ,_, that_RB 
at_IN last_JJ in_IN a_DT body_NN they_PP went_VVD to_TO the_DT captain_NN and_CC told_VVD him_PP if_IN Gabriel_NP 
was_VBD sent_VVN from_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, not_RB a_DT man_NN of_IN them_PP would_MD remain_VV ._SENT He_PP was_VBD

Gabriel_NP to_TO be_VB any_DT way_NN maltreated_VVD ,_, say_VVP or_CC do_VVP what_WP he_PP would_MD ;_: so_IN that_WDT it_PP 
came_VVD to_TO pass_VV that_IN/that Gabriel_NP had_VHD the_DT complete_JJ freedom_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ._SENT The_DT 
consequence_NN of_IN all_PDT this_DT was_VBD ,_, that_IN/that the_DT archangel_NN cared_VVD little_RB or_CC 
nothing_NN for_IN the_DT captain_NN and_CC mates_NNS ;_: and_CC since_IN the_DT epidemic_NN had_VHD broken_VVN 
out_RB ,_, he_PP carried_VVD a_DT higher_JJR hand_NN than_IN ever_RB ;_: declaring_VVG that_IN/that the_DT plague_NN ,_,

It_PP is_VBZ well_RB to_TO parenthesize_VV here_RB ,_, that_IN/that of_IN the_DT fatal_JJ accidents_NNS in_IN the_DT 
Sperm-Whale_NN Fishery_NN ,_, this_DT kind_NN is_VBZ perhaps_RB almost_RB as_RB frequent_JJ as_IN any_DT ._SENT

Ahab_NP stolidly_RB turned_VVD aside_RP ;_: then_RB said_VVD to_TO Mayhew_NP ,_, "_'' Captain_NP ,_, I_PP have_VHP

Every_DT whale-ship_NN takes_VVZ out_RP a_DT goodly_JJ number_NN of_IN letters_NNS for_IN various_JJ 
ships_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ delivery_NN to_TO the_DT persons_NNS to_TO whom_WP they_PP may_MD be_VB addressed_VVN ,_,

Thus_RB ,_, most_JJS letters_NNS never_RB reach_VVP their_PP$ mark_NN ;_: and_CC many_JJ are_VBP only_JJ

Soon_RB Starbuck_NP returned_VVD with_IN a_DT letter_NN in_IN his_PP$ hand_NN ._SENT It_PP was_VBD sorely_RB

"_`` Can'st_VVP not_RB read_VV it_PP ?_SENT "_'' cried_VVD Ahab_NP ._SENT "_`` Give_VV it_PP me_PP ,_, man_UH ._SENT Aye_RB ,_, aye_RB ,_, it_PP 's_VBZ

"_'' Curses_NNS throttle_VVP thee_NP !_SENT "_'' yelled_VVD Ahab_NP ._SENT "_'' Captain_NP Mayhew_NP ,_, stand_NN by_IN now_RB 
to_TO receive_VV it_PP "_'' ;_: and_CC taking_VVG the_DT fatal_JJ missive_NN from_IN Starbuck_NP 's_POS hands_NNS ,_,

rapidly_RB shot_VVN away_RB from_IN the_DT Pequod_NP ._SENT

CHAPTER_NN 72_CD 

The_DT Monkey-Rope_NP ._SENT 


In_IN the_DT tumultuous_JJ business_NN of_IN cutting-in_NN and_CC attending_VVG to_TO a_DT whale_NN ,_, 
there_EX is_VBZ much_RB running_VVG backwards_RB and_CC forwards_RB among_IN the_DT crew_NN ._SENT Now_RB 
hands_NNS are_VBP wanted_VVN here_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB again_RB hands_NNS are_VBP wanted_VVN there_RB ._SENT There_RB 
is_VBZ no_RB staying_VVG in_IN any_DT one_CD place_NN ;_: for_IN at_IN one_CD and_CC the_DT same_JJ time_NN 
everything_NN has_VHZ to_TO be_VB done_VVN everywhere_RB ._SENT It_PP is_VBZ much_RB the_DT same_JJ with_IN him_PP 
who_WP endeavors_VVZ the_DT description_NN of_IN the_DT scene_NN ._SENT We_PP must_MD now_RB retrace_VV our_PP$ 
way_RB a_DT little_JJ ._SENT It_PP was_VBD mentioned_VVN that_IN/that upon_IN first_JJ breaking_VVG ground_NN in_IN 
the_DT whale_NN 's_POS back_NN ,_, the_DT blubber-hook_NN was_VBD inserted_VVN into_IN the_DT original_JJ 
hole_VVP there_RB cut_VV by_IN the_DT spades_NNS of_IN the_DT mates_NNS ._SENT But_CC how_WRB did_VVD so_RB clumsy_JJ and_CC 
weighty_JJ a_DT mass_NN as_IN that_DT same_JJ hook_NN get_VV fixed_VVN in_IN that_DT hole_NN ?_SENT It_PP was_VBD 
inserted_VVN there_RB by_IN my_PP$ particular_JJ friend_NN Queequeg_NP ,_, whose_WP$ duty_NN it_PP was_VBD ,_, 
as_IN harpooneer_NN ,_, to_TO descend_VV upon_IN the_DT monster_NN 's_POS back_NN for_IN the_DT special_JJ 
purpose_NN referred_VVD to_TO ._SENT But_CC in_IN very_RB many_JJ cases_NNS ,_, circumstances_NNS require_VVP 
that_IN/that the_DT harpooneer_NN shall_MD remain_VV on_IN the_DT whale_NN till_IN the_DT whole_JJ tensing_VVG 
or_CC stripping_VVG operation_NN is_VBZ concluded_VVN ._SENT The_DT whale_NN ,_, be_VB it_PP observed_VVD ,_, lies_VVZ 
almost_RB entirely_RB submerged_VVN ,_, excepting_VVG the_DT immediate_JJ parts_NNS operated_VVD 
upon_RB ._SENT So_RB down_RB there_RB ,_, some_DT ten_CD feet_NNS below_IN the_DT level_NN of_IN the_DT deck_NN ,_, the_DT 
poor_JJ harpooneer_NN flounders_NNS about_RB ,_, half_NN on_IN the_DT whale_NN and_CC half_NN in_IN the_DT 
water_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT vast_JJ mass_NN revolves_VVZ like_IN a_DT tread-mill_NN beneath_IN him_PP ._SENT On_RB 
the_DT occasion_NN in_IN question_NN ,_, Queequeg_NP figured_VVD in_IN the_DT Highland_NP costume--a_NN 
shirt_NN and_CC socks--in_NN which_WDT to_TO my_PP$ eyes_NNS ,_, at_IN least_JJS ,_, he_PP appeared_VVD to_TO 
uncommon_JJ advantage_NN ;_: and_CC no_DT one_CD had_VHD a_DT better_JJR chance_NN to_TO observe_VV him_PP ,_, as_RB 
will_MD presently_RB be_VB seen_VVN ._SENT 

Being_VBG the_DT savage_NN 's_POS bowsman_NN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ ,_, the_DT person_NN who_WP pulled_VVD the_DT 
bow-oar_NN in_IN his_PP$ boat_NN (_( the_DT second_JJ one_CD from_IN forward_RB )_) ,_, it_PP was_VBD my_PP$ cheerful_JJ 
duty_NN to_TO attend_VV upon_IN him_PP while_IN taking_VVG that_DT hard-scrabble_NN scramble_VVP upon_RP 
the_DT dead_JJ whale_NN 's_POS back_NN ._SENT You_PP have_VHP seen_VVN Italian_JJ organ-boys_NNS holding_VVG a_DT 
dancing-ape_NN by_IN a_DT long_JJ cord_NN ._SENT Just_RB so_RB ,_, from_IN the_DT ship_NN 's_POS steep_JJ side_NN ,_, did_VVD 
I_PP hold_VVP Queequeg_NP down_RB there_RB in_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, by_IN what_WP is_VBZ technically_RB called_VVN 
in_IN the_DT fishery_NN a_DT monkey-rope_NN ,_, attached_VVN to_TO a_DT strong_JJ strip_NN of_IN canvas_NN 
belted_VVN round_NN his_PP$ waist_NN ._SENT 

It_PP was_VBD a_DT humorously_RB perilous_JJ business_NN for_IN both_DT of_IN us_PP ._SENT For_IN ,_, before_IN we_PP 
proceed_VV further_RBR ,_, it_PP must_MD be_VB said_VVN that_IN/that the_DT monkey-rope_NN was_VBD fast_RB at_IN 
both_CC ends_NNS ;_: fast_RB to_TO Queequeg_NP 's_POS broad_JJ canvas_NN belt_NN ,_, and_CC fast_RB to_TO my_PP$ 
narrow_JJ leather_NN one_CD ._SENT So_RB that_IN/that for_IN better_RBR or_CC for_IN worse_JJR ,_, we_PP two_CD ,_, for_IN the_DT 
time_NN ,_, were_VBD wedded_VVN ;_: and_CC should_MD poor_JJ Queequeg_NP sink_NN to_TO rise_VV no_DT more_JJR ,_, 
then_RB both_DT usage_NN and_CC honour_NN demanded_VVD ,_, that_IN/that instead_RB of_IN cutting_VVG the_DT cord_NN ,_, 
it_PP should_MD drag_VV me_PP down_RP in_IN his_PP$ wake_NN ._SENT So_RB ,_, then_RB ,_, an_DT elongated_VVN Siamese_NN 
ligature_NN united_VVD us_PP ._SENT Queequeg_NP was_VBD my_PP$ own_JJ inseparable_JJ twin_JJ brother_NN ;_: 
nor_CC could_MD I_PP any_DT way_NN get_VV rid_JJ of_IN the_DT dangerous_JJ liabilities_NNS which_WDT the_DT 
hempen_JJ bond_NN entailed_VVD ._SENT 

So_RB strongly_RB and_CC metaphysically_RB did_VVD I_PP conceive_VV of_IN my_PP$ situation_NN then_RB ,_, 
that_DT while_NN earnestly_RB watching_VVG his_PP$ motions_NNS ,_, I_PP seemed_VVD distinctly_RB to_TO 
perceive_VV that_IN/that my_PP$ own_JJ individuality_NN was_VBD now_RB merged_VVN in_IN a_DT joint_JJ stock_NN 
company_NN of_IN two_CD ;_: that_IN/that my_PP$ free_JJ will_NN had_VHD received_VVN a_DT mortal_JJ wound_NN ;_: and_CC 
that_IN/that another_DT 's_VBZ mistake_NN or_CC misfortune_NN might_MD plunge_VV innocent_JJ me_PP into_IN 
unmerited_JJ disaster_NN and_CC death_NN ._SENT Therefore_RB ,_, I_PP saw_VVD that_IN/that here_RB was_VBD a_DT sort_NN 
of_IN interregnum_NN in_IN Providence_NP ;_: for_IN its_PP$ even-handed_JJ equity_NN never_RB could_MD 
have_VHP so_RB gross_JJ an_DT injustice_NN ._SENT And_CC yet_RB still_RB further_RBR pondering--while_JJ I_PP 
jerked_VVN him_PP now_RB and_CC then_RB from_IN between_IN the_DT whale_NN and_CC ship_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD 
threaten_VVP to_TO jam_VV him--still_RB further_RBR pondering_VVG ,_, I_PP say_VVP ,_, I_PP saw_VVD that_IN/that this_DT

breathes_VVZ ;_: only_RB ,_, in_IN most_JJS cases_NNS ,_, he_PP ,_, one_CD way_NN or_CC other_JJ ,_, has_VHZ this_DT Siamese_NN 
connexion_NN with_IN a_DT plurality_NN of_IN other_JJ mortals_NNS ._SENT If_IN your_PP$ banker_NN breaks_VVZ ,_,

*_SYM The_DT monkey-rope_NN is_VBZ found_VVN in_IN all_DT whalers_NNS ;_: but_CC it_PP was_VBD only_RB in_IN the_DT

"_`` Why_WRB not_RB ?_SENT

"_`` Sink_VV him_PP !_SENT I_PP never_RB look_VVP at_IN him_PP at_IN all_DT ;_: but_CC if_IN ever_RB I_PP get_VVP a_DT chance_NN of_IN

of_IN both_DT hands--_NN "_`` Aye_NP ,_, will_MD I_PP !_SENT Flask_NN ,_, I_PP take_VVP that_DT Fedallah_NP to_TO be_VB the_DT

CHAPTER_NN 74_CD 

The_DT Sperm_NP Whale_NP 's_POS Head--Contrasted_NP View_NP ._SENT 


Here_RB ,_, now_RB ,_, are_VBP two_CD great_JJ whales_NNS ,_, laying_VVG their_PP$ heads_NNS together_RB ;_: let_VV us_PP 
join_VV them_PP ,_, and_CC lay_VVD together_RB our_PP$ own_JJ ._SENT 

Of_IN the_DT grand_JJ order_NN of_IN folio_JJ leviathans_NNS ,_, the_DT Sperm_NP Whale_NP and_CC the_DT Right_NP 
Whale_NNS are_VBP by_IN far_RB the_DT most_RBS noteworthy_JJ ._SENT They_PP are_VBP the_DT only_JJ whales_NNS 
regularly_RB hunted_VVN by_IN man_NN ._SENT To_TO the_DT Nantucketer_NP ,_, they_PP present_VVP the_DT two_CD 
extremes_NNS of_IN all_PDT the_DT known_VVN varieties_NNS of_IN the_DT whale_NN ._SENT As_IN the_DT external_JJ 
difference_NN between_IN them_PP is_VBZ mainly_RB observable_JJ in_IN their_PP$ heads_NNS ;_: and_CC as_IN a_DT 
head_NN of_IN each_DT is_VBZ this_DT moment_NN hanging_VVG from_IN the_DT Pequod_NP 's_POS side_NN ;_: and_CC as_IN we_PP 
may_MD freely_RB go_VV from_IN one_CD to_TO the_DT other_JJ ,_, by_IN merely_RB stepping_VVG across_IN the_DT 
deck_NN :_: --where_RB ,_, I_PP should_MD like_VV to_TO know_VV ,_, will_MD you_PP obtain_VV a_DT better_JJR chance_NN 
to_TO study_VV practical_JJ cetology_NN than_IN here_RB ?_SENT 

In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN ,_, you_PP are_VBP struck_VVN by_IN the_DT general_JJ contrast_NN between_IN 
these_DT heads_NNS ._SENT Both_DT are_VBP massive_JJ enough_RB in_IN all_DT conscience_NN ;_: but_CC there_RB 
is_VBZ a_DT certain_JJ mathematical_JJ symmetry_NN in_IN the_DT Sperm_NP Whale_NP 's_VBZ which_WDT the_DT 
Right_RB Whale_NP 's_POS sadly_RB lacks_VVZ ._SENT There_EX is_VBZ more_JJR character_NN in_IN the_DT Sperm_NP 
Whale_NN 's_POS head_NN ._SENT As_IN you_PP behold_VVP it_PP ,_, you_PP involuntarily_RB yield_VV the_DT immense_NN 
superiority_NN to_TO him_PP ,_, in_IN point_NN of_IN pervading_VVG dignity_NN ._SENT In_IN the_DT present_NN 
instance_NN ,_, too_RB ,_, this_DT dignity_NN is_VBZ heightened_VVN by_IN the_DT pepper_NN and_CC salt_NN 
colour_NN of_IN his_PP$ head_NN at_IN the_DT summit_NN ,_, giving_VVG token_JJ of_IN advanced_JJ age_NN and_CC 
large_JJ experience_NN ._SENT In_IN short_JJ ,_, he_PP is_VBZ what_WP the_DT fishermen_NNS technically_RB 
call_VV a_DT "_`` grey-headed_JJ whale_NN ._SENT "_'' 

Let_VV us_PP now_RB note_VVP what_WP is_VBZ least_RBS dissimilar_JJ in_IN these_DT heads--namely_NN ,_, the_DT 
two_CD most_RBS important_JJ organs_NNS ,_, the_DT eye_NN and_CC the_DT ear_NN ._SENT Far_RB back_RB on_IN the_DT side_NN 
of_IN the_DT head_NN ,_, and_CC low_RB down_RB ,_, near_IN the_DT angle_NN of_IN either_DT whale_NN 's_POS jaw_NN ,_, if_IN 
you_PP narrowly_RB search_VVP ,_, you_PP will_MD at_IN last_JJ see_VVP a_DT lashless_JJ eye_NN ,_, which_WDT you_PP 
would_MD fancy_VV to_TO be_VB a_DT young_JJ colt_NN 's_POS eye_NN ;_: so_RB out_RB of_IN all_DT proportion_NN is_VBZ it_PP 
to_TO the_DT magnitude_NN of_IN the_DT head_NN ._SENT 

Now_RB ,_, from_IN this_DT peculiar_JJ sideway_NN position_NN of_IN the_DT whale_NN 's_POS eyes_NNS ,_, it_PP is_VBZ 
plain_RB that_IN/that he_PP can_MD never_RB see_VV an_DT object_NN which_WDT is_VBZ exactly_RB ahead_RB ,_, no_RB more_JJR 
than_IN he_PP can_MD one_PP exactly_RB astern_RB ._SENT In_IN a_DT word_NN ,_, the_DT position_NN of_IN the_DT 
whale_NN 's_POS eyes_NNS corresponds_VVZ to_TO that_DT of_IN a_DT man_NN 's_POS ears_NNS ;_: and_CC you_PP may_MD fancy_VV ,_, 
for_IN yourself_PP ,_, how_WRB it_PP would_MD fare_VV with_IN you_PP ,_, did_VVD you_PP sideways_JJ survey_NN 
objects_NNS through_IN your_PP$ ears_NNS ._SENT You_PP would_MD find_VV that_IN/that you_PP could_MD only_RB 
command_VV some_DT thirty_CD degrees_NNS of_IN vision_NN in_IN advance_NN of_IN the_DT straight_JJ 
side-line_NN of_IN sight_NN ;_: and_CC about_RB thirty_CD more_JJR behind_IN it_PP ._SENT If_IN your_PP$ 
bitterest_JJS foe_NN were_VBD walking_VVG straight_RB towards_IN you_PP ,_, with_IN dagger_NN uplifted_VVD 
in_IN broad_JJ day_NN ,_, you_PP would_MD not_RB be_VB able_JJ to_TO see_VV him_PP ,_, any_DT more_JJR than_IN if_IN he_PP 
were_VBD stealing_VVG upon_IN you_PP from_IN behind_RB ._SENT In_IN a_DT word_NN ,_, you_PP would_MD have_VH two_CD 
backs_NNS ,_, so_RB to_TO speak_VV ;_: but_CC ,_, at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, also_RB ,_, two_CD fronts_NNS (_( side_NN 
fronts_NNS )_) :_: for_IN what_WP is_VBZ it_PP that_DT makes_VVZ the_DT front_NN of_IN a_DT man--what_NN ,_, indeed_RB ,_, 
but_CC his_PP$ eyes_NNS ?_SENT 

Moreover_RB ,_, while_IN in_IN most_JJS other_JJ animals_NNS that_IN/that I_PP can_MD now_RB think_VV of_IN ,_, the_DT 
eyes_NNS are_VBP so_RB planted_VVN as_RB imperceptibly_RB to_TO blend_VV their_PP$ visual_JJ power_NN ,_, so_RB 
as_RB to_TO produce_VV one_CD picture_NN and_CC not_RB two_CD to_TO the_DT brain_NN ;_: the_DT peculiar_NN 
position_NN of_IN the_DT whale_NN 's_POS eyes_NNS ,_, effectually_RB divided_VVN as_IN they_PP are_VBP by_IN many_JJ 
cubic_JJ feet_NNS of_IN solid_JJ head_NN ,_, which_WDT towers_NNS between_IN them_PP like_VVP a_DT great_JJ 
mountain_NN separating_VVG two_CD lakes_NNS in_IN valleys_NNS ;_: this_DT ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, must_MD 
wholly_RB separate_JJ the_DT impressions_NNS which_WDT each_DT independent_JJ organ_NN imparts_VVZ ._SENT 
The_DT whale_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, must_MD see_VV one_CD distinct_JJ picture_NN on_IN this_DT side_NN ,_, 
and_CC another_DT distinct_JJ picture_NN on_IN that_DT side_NN ;_: while_IN all_DT between_RB must_MD be_VB 
profound_JJ darkness_NN and_CC nothingness_NN to_TO him_PP ._SENT Man_NN may_MD ,_, in_IN effect_NN ,_, be_VB 
said_VVD to_TO look_VV out_RP on_IN the_DT world_NN from_IN a_DT sentry-box_NN with_IN two_CD joined_VVD 
sashes_NNS for_IN his_PP$ window_NN ._SENT But_CC with_IN the_DT whale_NN ,_, these_DT two_CD sashes_NNS are_VBP 
separately_RB inserted_VVN ,_, making_VVG two_CD distinct_JJ windows_NNS ,_, but_CC sadly_RB impairing_VVG 
the_DT view_NN ._SENT This_DT peculiarity_NN of_IN the_DT whale_NN 's_POS eyes_NNS is_VBZ a_DT thing_NN always_RB to_TO 
be_VB borne_VVN in_IN mind_NN in_IN the_DT fishery_NN ;_: and_CC to_TO be_VB remembered_VVN by_IN the_DT reader_NN 
in_IN some_DT subsequent_JJ scenes_NNS ._SENT 

A_DT curious_JJ and_CC most_RBS puzzling_JJ question_NN might_MD be_VB started_VVN concerning_VVG this_DT

CHAPTER_NN 75_CD 

The_DT Right_NP Whale_NP 's_POS Head--Contrasted_NP View_NP ._SENT

*_SYM This_DT reminds_VVZ us_PP that_IN/that the_DT Right_NP Whale_NP really_RB has_VHZ a_DT sort_NN of_IN whisker_NN ,_,

"_'' blinds_NNS ,_, "_'' or_CC whatever_WDT you_PP please_VVP ,_, furnish_VVP to_TO the_DT ladies_NNS their_PP$ busks_NNS

forehead_NN 's_POS middle_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, in_IN man_NN ,_, is_VBZ Lavater_NP 's_POS mark_NN of_IN genius_NN ._SENT

With_IN one_CD intent_NN all_RB the_DT combined_JJ rival_JJ boats_NNS were_VBD pointed_VVN for_IN this_DT

CHAPTER_NN 82_CD 

The_DT Honour_NP and_CC Glory_NP of_IN Whaling_NP ._SENT 


There_EX are_VBP some_DT enterprises_NNS in_IN which_WDT a_DT careful_JJ disorderliness_NN is_VBZ the_DT 
true_JJ method_NN ._SENT 

The_DT more_JJR I_PP dive_VVP into_IN this_DT matter_NN of_IN whaling_NN ,_, and_CC push_VV my_PP$ researches_NNS 
up_RB to_TO the_DT very_JJ spring-head_NN of_IN it_PP so_RB much_RB the_DT more_JJR am_VBP I_PP impressed_VVN with_IN 
its_PP$ great_JJ honourableness_NN and_CC antiquity_NN ;_: and_CC especially_RB when_WRB I_PP find_VVP so_RB

emblazoned_VVN a_DT fraternity_NN ._SENT 

The_DT gallant_JJ Perseus_NP ,_, a_DT son_NN of_IN Jupiter_NP ,_, was_VBD the_DT first_JJ whaleman_NN ;_: and_CC to_TO 
the_DT eternal_JJ honour_NN of_IN our_PP$ calling_NN be_VB it_PP said_VVD ,_, that_IN/that the_DT first_JJ whale_NN 
attacked_VVN by_IN our_PP$ brotherhood_NN was_VBD not_RB killed_VVN with_IN any_DT sordid_JJ intent_NN ._SENT 
Those_DT were_VBD the_DT knightly_JJ days_NNS of_IN our_PP$ profession_NN ,_, when_WRB we_PP only_RB bore_VVD 
arms_NNS to_TO succor_VV the_DT distressed_JJ ,_, and_CC not_RB to_TO fill_VV men_NNS 's_POS lamp-feeders_NNS ._SENT 
Every_DT one_CD knows_VVZ the_DT fine_JJ story_NN of_IN Perseus_NP and_CC Andromeda_NP ;_: how_WRB the_DT 
lovely_JJ Andromeda_NP ,_, the_DT daughter_NN of_IN a_DT king_NN ,_, was_VBD tied_VVN to_TO a_DT rock_NN on_IN the_DT

monster_NN ,_, and_CC delivered_VVN and_CC married_VVN the_DT maid_NN ._SENT It_PP was_VBD an_DT admirable_JJ 
artistic_JJ exploit_NN ,_, rarely_RB achieved_VVN by_IN the_DT best_JJS harpooneers_NNS of_IN the_DT 
present_JJ day_NN ;_: inasmuch_RB as_IN this_DT Leviathan_NP was_VBD slain_VVN at_IN the_DT very_RB first_JJ 
dart_NN ._SENT And_CC let_VV no_DT man_NN doubt_VVP this_DT Arkite_NP story_NN ;_: for_IN in_IN the_DT ancient_JJ 
Joppa_NP ,_, now_RB Jaffa_NP ,_, on_IN the_DT Syrian_JJ coast_NN ,_, in_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT Pagan_NP temples_NNS ,_,

city_NN 's_POS legends_NNS and_CC all_PDT the_DT inhabitants_NNS asserted_VVD to_TO be_VB the_DT identical_JJ 
bones_NNS of_IN the_DT monster_NN that_IN/that Perseus_NP slew_VVD ._SENT When_WRB the_DT Romans_NNS took_VVD Joppa_NP ,_, 
the_DT same_JJ skeleton_NN was_VBD carried_VVN to_TO Italy_NP in_IN triumph_NN ._SENT What_WP seems_VVZ most_JJS 
singular_JJ and_CC suggestively_RB important_JJ in_IN this_DT story_NN ,_, is_VBZ this_DT :_: it_PP was_VBD 
from_IN Joppa_NP that_IN/that Jonah_NP set_VVD sail_NN ._SENT 

Akin_JJ to_TO the_DT adventure_NN of_IN Perseus_NP and_CC Andromeda--indeed_NP ,_, by_IN some_DT 
supposed_VVN to_TO be_VB indirectly_RB derived_VVN from_IN it--is_NNS that_IN/that famous_JJ story_NN of_IN 
St._NP George_NP and_CC the_DT Dragon_NP ;_: which_WDT dragon_NN I_PP maintain_VVP to_TO have_VH been_VBN a_DT 
whale_NN ;_: for_IN in_IN many_JJ old_JJ chronicles_NNS whales_NNS and_CC dragons_NNS are_VBP strangely_RB 
jumbled_VVN together_RB ,_, and_CC often_RB stand_VV for_IN each_DT other_JJ ._SENT "_`` Thou_NN art_NN as_IN a_DT 
lion_NN of_IN the_DT waters_NNS ,_, and_CC as_IN a_DT dragon_NN of_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, "_'' saith_VVZ Ezekiel_NP ;_: 
hereby_RB ,_, plainly_RB meaning_VVG a_DT whale_NN ;_: in_IN truth_NN ,_, some_DT versions_NNS of_IN the_DT Bible_NN 
use_VV that_DT word_NN itself_PP ._SENT Besides_RB ,_, it_PP would_MD much_RB subtract_VV from_IN the_DT glory_NN 
of_IN the_DT exploit_NN had_VHD St._NP George_NP but_CC encountered_VVD a_DT crawling_VVG reptile_NN of_IN 
the_DT land_NN ,_, instead_RB of_IN doing_VVG battle_NN with_IN the_DT great_JJ monster_NN of_IN the_DT deep_JJ ._SENT 
Any_DT man_NN may_MD kill_VV a_DT snake_NN ,_, but_CC only_RB a_DT Perseus_NP ,_, a_DT St._NP George_NP ,_, a_DT 
Coffin_NN ,_, have_VHP the_DT heart_NN in_IN them_PP to_TO march_VV boldly_RB up_RB to_TO a_DT whale_NN ._SENT
