CHAPTER_NN 84_CD 

Pitchpoling_NP ._SENT 


To_TO make_VV them_PP run_VV easily_RB and_CC swiftly_RB ,_, the_DT axles_NNS of_IN carriages_NNS are_VBP 
anointed_VVN ;_: and_CC for_IN much_RB the_DT same_JJ purpose_NN ,_, some_DT whalers_NNS perform_VVP an_DT 
analogous_JJ operation_NN upon_IN their_PP$ boat_NN ;_: they_PP grease_VVP the_DT bottom_NN ._SENT Nor_CC is_VBZ 
it_PP to_TO be_VB doubted_VVN that_IN/that as_IN such_PDT a_DT procedure_NN can_MD do_VV no_DT harm_NN ,_, it_PP may_MD 
possibly_RB be_VB of_IN no_DT contemptible_JJ advantage_NN ;_: considering_VVG that_IN/that oil_NN and_NP 
water_NN are_VBP hostile_JJ ;_: that_DT oil_NN is_VBZ a_DT sliding_VVG thing_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN/that the_DT object_NN 
in_IN view_NN is_VBZ to_TO make_VV the_DT boat_NN slide_NN bravely_RB ._SENT Queequeg_NP believed_VVD 
strongly_RB in_IN anointing_VVG his_PP$ boat_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD morning_NN not_RB long_RB after_IN the_DT 
German_JJ ship_NN Jungfrau_NP disappeared_VVD ,_, took_VVD more_JJR than_IN customary_JJ pains_NNS in_IN 
that_DT occupation_NN ;_: crawling_VVG under_IN its_PP$ bottom_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PP hung_VVD over_IN the_DT 
side_NN ,_, and_CC rubbing_VVG in_IN the_DT unctuousness_NN as_RB though_IN diligently_RB seeking_VVG to_TO 
insure_VV a_DT crop_NN of_IN hair_NN from_IN the_DT craft_NN 's_POS bald_JJ keel_NN ._SENT He_PP seemed_VVD to_TO be_VB 
working_VVG in_IN obedience_NN to_TO some_DT particular_JJ presentiment_NN ._SENT Nor_CC did_VVD it_PP 
remain_VV unwarranted_JJ by_IN the_DT event_NN ._SENT 

Towards_IN noon_NN whales_NNS were_VBD raised_VVN ;_: but_CC so_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT ship_NN sailed_VVD down_RP 
to_TO them_PP ,_, they_PP turned_VVD and_CC fled_VVD with_IN swift_JJ precipitancy_NN ;_: a_DT disordered_VVN 
flight_NN ,_, as_RB of_IN Cleopatra_NP 's_POS barges_NNS from_IN Actium_NP ._SENT 

Nevertheless_RB ,_, the_DT boats_NNS pursued_VVD ,_, and_CC Stubb_NP 's_POS was_VBD foremost_JJ ._SENT By_IN great_JJ 
exertion_NN ,_, Tashtego_NP at_IN last_JJ succeeded_VVN in_IN planting_VVG one_CD iron_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT 
stricken_JJ whale_NN ,_, without_IN at_IN all_DT sounding_NN ,_, still_RB continued_VVD his_PP$ 
horizontal_JJ flight_NN ,_, with_IN added_VVN fleetness_NN ._SENT Such_JJ unintermitted_JJ 
strainings_NNS upon_IN the_DT planted_VVN iron_NN must_MD sooner_RBR or_CC later_RBR inevitably_RB 
extract_VV it_PP ._SENT It_PP became_VVD imperative_JJ to_TO lance_VV the_DT flying_VVG whale_NN ,_, or_CC be_VB 
content_JJ to_TO lose_VV him_PP ._SENT But_CC to_TO haul_VV the_DT boat_NN up_RB to_TO his_PP$ flank_NN was_VBD 
impossible_JJ ,_, he_PP swam_VVD so_RB fast_JJ and_CC furious_JJ ._SENT What_WP then_RB remained_VVD ?_SENT 

Of_IN all_PDT the_DT wondrous_JJ devices_NNS and_CC dexterities_NNS ,_, the_DT sleights_NNS of_IN hand_NN and_CC 
countless_JJ subtleties_NNS ,_, to_TO which_WDT the_DT veteran_JJ whaleman_NN is_VBZ so_RB often_RB 
forced_VVN ,_, none_NN exceed_VVP that_IN/that fine_JJ manoeuvre_NN with_IN the_DT lance_NN called_VVD 
pitchpoling_NN ._SENT Small_JJ sword_NN ,_, or_CC broad_JJ sword_NN ,_, in_IN all_PDT its_PP$ exercises_NNS 
boasts_VVZ nothing_NN like_IN it_PP ._SENT It_PP is_VBZ only_RB indispensable_JJ with_IN an_DT inveterate_JJ 
running_VVG whale_NN ;_: its_PP$ grand_JJ fact_NN and_CC feature_NN is_VBZ the_DT wonderful_JJ distance_NN 
to_TO which_WDT the_DT long_JJ lance_NN is_VBZ accurately_RB darted_VVN from_IN a_DT violently_RB 
rocking_VVG ,_, jerking_VVG boat_NN ,_, under_IN extreme_JJ headway_NN ._SENT Steel_NN and_CC wood_NN 
included_VVN ,_, the_DT entire_JJ spear_NN is_VBZ some_DT ten_NN or_CC twelve_NN feet_NNS in_IN length_NN ;_: the_DT 
staff_NN is_VBZ much_RB slighter_JJR than_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT harpoon_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB of_IN a_DT 
lighter_JJR material--pine_NN ._SENT It_PP is_VBZ furnished_VVN with_IN a_DT small_JJ rope_NN called_VVD a_DT 
warp_NN ,_, of_IN considerable_JJ length_NN ,_, by_IN which_WDT it_PP can_MD be_VB hauled_VVN back_RB to_TO the_DT 
hand_NN after_IN darting_VVG ._SENT 

But_CC before_IN going_VVG further_JJR ,_, it_PP is_VBZ important_JJ to_TO mention_VV here_RB ,_, that_RB 
though_IN the_DT harpoon_NN may_MD be_VB pitchpoled_VVN in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN with_IN the_DT lance_NN ,_, 
yet_RB it_PP is_VBZ seldom_RB done_VVN ;_: and_CC when_WRB done_VVN ,_, is_VBZ still_RB less_RBR frequently_RB 
successful_JJ ,_, on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT greater_JJR weight_NN and_CC inferior_JJ length_NN of_IN 
the_DT harpoon_NN as_IN compared_VVN with_IN the_DT lance_NN ,_, which_WDT in_IN effect_NN become_VVN 
serious_JJ drawbacks_NNS ._SENT As_IN a_DT general_JJ thing_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, you_PP must_MD first_RB 
get_VV fast_RB to_TO a_DT whale_NN ,_, before_IN any_DT pitchpoling_NN comes_VVZ into_IN play_NN ._SENT 

Look_VV now_RB at_IN Stubb_NP ;_: a_DT man_NN who_WP from_IN his_PP$ humorous_JJ ,_, deliberate_JJ coolness_NN 
and_CC equanimity_NN in_IN the_DT direst_JJS emergencies_NNS ,_, was_VBD specially_RB qualified_VVN to_TO 
excel_VV in_IN pitchpoling_NN ._SENT Look_VV at_IN him_PP ;_: he_PP stands_VVZ upright_RB in_IN the_DT tossed_VVN 
bow_NN of_IN the_DT flying_VVG boat_NN ;_: wrapt_NNS in_IN fleecy_JJ foam_NN ,_, the_DT towing_VVG whale_NN is_VBZ 
forty_NN feet_NNS ahead_RB ._SENT Handling_VVG the_DT long_JJ lance_NN lightly_RB ,_, glancing_VVG twice_RB or_CC 
thrice_RB along_IN its_PP$ length_NN to_TO see_VV if_IN it_PP be_VB exactly_RB straight_JJ ,_, Stubb_NP

"_'' That_WDT drove_VVD the_DT spigot_NN out_RP of_IN him_PP !_SENT "_'' cried_VVD Stubb_NP ._SENT "_'' '_'' Tis_NP July_NP 's_POS 
immortal_JJ Fourth_JJ ;_: all_DT fountains_NNS must_MD run_VV wine_NN today_NN !_SENT Would_MD now_RB ,_, it_PP

CHAPTER_NN 85_CD 

The_DT Fountain_NP ._SENT 


That_DT for_IN six_CD thousand_CD years--and_NN no_DT one_CD knows_VVZ how_WRB many_JJ millions_NNS of_IN 
ages_NNS before--the_VVP great_JJ whales_NNS should_MD have_VH been_VBN spouting_VVG all_DT over_IN the_DT 
sea_NN ,_, and_CC sprinkling_VVG and_CC mistifying_VVG the_DT gardens_NNS of_IN the_DT deep_JJ ,_, as_RB with_IN 
so_IN many_JJ sprinkling_NN or_CC mistifying_VVG pots_NNS ;_: and_CC that_IN/that for_IN some_DT centuries_NNS 
back_RB ,_, thousands_NNS of_IN hunters_NNS should_MD have_VH been_VBN close_JJ by_IN the_DT fountain_NN of_IN 
the_DT whale_NN ,_, watching_VVG these_DT sprinklings_NNS and_CC spoutings--that_VV all_PDT this_DT 
should_MD be_VB ,_, and_CC yet_RB ,_, that_IN/that down_RB to_TO this_DT blessed_JJ minute_NN (_( fifteen_CD and_CC a_DT

December_NP ,_, A.D._NP 1851_CD )_) ,_, it_PP should_MD still_RB remain_VV a_DT problem_NN ,_, whether_IN these_DT 
spoutings_NNS are_VBP ,_, after_IN all_DT ,_, really_RB water_NN ,_, or_CC nothing_NN but_CC vapour--this_NN is_VBZ 
surely_RB a_DT noteworthy_JJ thing_NN ._SENT 

Let_VV us_PP ,_, then_RB ,_, look_VVP at_IN this_DT matter_NN ,_, along_RB with_IN some_DT interesting_JJ items_NNS 
contingent_JJ ._SENT Every_DT one_CD knows_VVZ that_IN/that by_IN the_DT peculiar_JJ cunning_NN of_IN their_PP$ 
gills_NNS ,_, the_DT finny_JJ tribes_NNS in_IN general_JJ breathe_VV the_DT air_NN which_WDT at_IN all_DT times_NNS 
is_VBZ combined_VVN with_IN the_DT element_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PP swim_VVP ;_: hence_RB ,_, a_DT herring_NN or_CC 
a_DT cod_NN might_MD live_VV a_DT century_NN ,_, and_CC never_RB once_RB raise_VV its_PP$ head_NN above_IN the_DT

regular_JJ lungs_NNS ,_, like_IN a_DT human_JJ being_NN 's_VBZ ,_, the_DT whale_NN can_MD only_RB live_VV by_IN

connexion_NN with_IN his_PP$ mouth_NN ._SENT No_UH ,_, he_PP breathes_VVZ through_IN his_PP$ spiracle_NN 
alone_RB ;_: and_CC this_DT is_VBZ on_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN his_PP$ head_NN ._SENT

the_DT blood_NN imparts_VVZ to_TO the_DT blood_NN its_PP$ vivifying_VVG principle_NN ,_, I_PP do_VVP not_RB

different_JJ ;_: but_CC in_IN any_DT one_CD they_PP are_VBP alike_RB ._SENT Now_RB ,_, why_WRB should_MD the_DT whale_NN

In_IN man_NN ,_, breathing_NN is_VBZ incessantly_RB going_VVG on--one_NN breath_NN only_RB serving_VVG 
for_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD pulsations_NNS ;_: so_RB that_DT whatever_JJ other_JJ business_NN he_PP has_VHZ

undisputed_JJ fact_NN that_IN/that he_PP is_VBZ never_RB found_VVN on_IN soundings_NNS ,_, or_CC near_JJ shores_NNS ;_: 
all_DT other_JJ whales_NNS sometimes_RB are_VBP ._SENT He_PP is_VBZ both_DT ponderous_JJ and_CC profound_JJ ._SENT

CHAPTER_NN 86_CD 

The_DT Tail_NP ._SENT 


Other_JJ poets_NNS have_VHP warbled_VVN the_DT praises_NNS of_IN the_DT soft_JJ eye_NN of_IN the_DT antelope_NNS ,_,

The_DT entire_JJ member_NN seems_VVZ a_DT dense_JJ webbed_JJ bed_NN of_IN welded_VVN sinews_NNS ;_: but_CC cut_NN

curious_JJ similitude_NN ;_: among_IN these_DT is_VBZ the_DT spout_NN ._SENT It_PP is_VBZ well_RB known_VVN that_DT

The_DT more_JJR I_PP consider_VVP this_DT mighty_JJ tail_NN ,_, the_DT more_RBR do_VV I_PP deplore_VV my_PP$

wanting_VVG other_JJ motions_NNS of_IN the_DT whale_NN in_IN his_PP$ general_JJ body_NN ,_, full_JJ of_IN

Dissect_VV him_PP how_WRB I_PP may_MD ,_, then_RB ,_, I_PP but_CC go_VV skin_NN deep_RB ;_: I_PP know_VVP him_PP not_RB ,_, 
and_CC never_RB will_MD ._SENT But_CC if_IN I_PP know_VVP not_RB even_RB the_DT tail_NN of_IN this_DT whale_NN ,_, how_WRB 
understand_VV his_PP$ head_NN ?_SENT much_RB more_RBR ,_, how_WRB comprehend_VV his_PP$ face_NN ,_, when_WRB face_VVP he_PP 
has_VHZ none_NN ?_SENT Thou_NNS shalt_VVP see_VV my_PP$ back_JJ parts_NNS ,_, my_PP$ tail_NN ,_, he_PP seems_VVZ to_TO say_VV ,_, 
but_CC my_PP$ face_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB seen_VVN ._SENT But_CC I_PP cannot_MD completely_RB make_VV out_RP his_PP$ 
back_JJ parts_NNS ;_: and_CC hint_VV what_WP he_PP will_MD about_IN his_PP$ face_NN ,_, I_PP say_VVP again_RB he_PP has_VHZ 
no_DT face_NN ._SENT 



CHAPTER_NN 87_CD 

The_DT Grand_NP Armada_NP ._SENT 


The_DT long_JJ and_CC narrow_JJ peninsula_NN of_IN Malacca_NP ,_, extending_VVG south-eastward_NN 
from_IN the_DT territories_NNS of_IN Birmah_NP ,_, forms_VVZ the_DT most_RBS southerly_JJ point_NN of_IN all_DT 
Asia_NP ._SENT In_IN a_DT continuous_JJ line_NN from_IN that_DT peninsula_NN stretch_NN the_DT long_JJ 
islands_NNS of_IN Sumatra_NP ,_, Java_NP ,_, Bally_NP ,_, and_CC Timor_NP ;_: which_WDT ,_, with_IN many_JJ others_NNS ,_, 
form_VV a_DT vast_JJ mole_NN ,_, or_CC rampart_NN ,_, lengthwise_RB connecting_VVG Asia_NP with_IN 
Australia_NP ,_, and_CC dividing_VVG the_DT long_JJ unbroken_JJ Indian_JJ ocean_NN from_IN the_DT 
thickly_RB studded_VVN oriental_JJ archipelagoes_NNS ._SENT This_DT rampart_NN is_VBZ pierced_VVN by_IN 
several_JJ sally-ports_NNS for_IN the_DT convenience_NN of_IN ships_NNS and_CC whales_NNS ;_: 
conspicuous_JJ among_IN which_WDT are_VBP the_DT straits_NNS of_IN Sunda_NP and_CC Malacca_NP ._SENT By_IN the_DT 
straits_NNS of_IN Sunda_NP ,_, chiefly_RB ,_, vessels_NNS bound_VVN to_TO China_NP from_IN the_DT west_NN ,_, 
emerge_VV into_IN the_DT China_NP seas_NNS ._SENT 

Those_DT narrow_JJ straits_NNS of_IN Sunda_NP divide_VVP Sumatra_NP from_IN Java_NP ;_: and_CC standing_NN 
midway_NN in_IN that_DT vast_JJ rampart_NN of_IN islands_NNS ,_, buttressed_VVN by_IN that_DT bold_JJ green_NN 
promontory_NN ,_, known_VVN to_TO seamen_NNS as_IN Java_NP Head_NP ;_: they_PP not_RB a_DT little_JJ 
correspond_VV to_TO the_DT central_JJ gateway_NN opening_NN into_IN some_DT vast_JJ walled_JJ 
empire_NN :_: and_CC considering_VVG the_DT inexhaustible_JJ wealth_NN of_IN spices_NNS ,_, and_NP 
silks_NNS ,_, and_CC jewels_NNS ,_, and_CC gold_NN ,_, and_CC ivory_NN ,_, with_IN which_WDT the_DT thousand_CD

provision_NN of_IN nature_NN ,_, that_WDT such_JJ treasures_NNS ,_, by_IN the_DT very_JJ formation_NN of_IN 
the_DT land_NN ,_, should_MD at_IN least_JJS bear_VV the_DT appearance_NN ,_, however_RB ineffectual_JJ ,_,

the_DT Straits_NP of_IN Sunda_NP are_VBP unsupplied_JJ with_IN those_DT domineering_VVG fortresses_NNS 
which_WDT guard_NN the_DT entrances_NNS to_TO the_DT Mediterranean_NP ,_, the_DT Baltic_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT

ships_NNS before_IN the_DT wind_NN ,_, which_WDT for_IN centuries_NNS past_JJ ,_, by_IN night_NN and_CC by_IN day_NN ,_, 
have_VHP passed_VVN between_IN the_DT islands_NNS of_IN Sumatra_NP and_CC Java_NP ,_, freighted_VVN with_IN 
the_DT costliest_JJS cargoes_NNS of_IN the_DT east_JJ ._SENT But_CC while_IN they_PP freely_RB waive_VV a_DT 
ceremonial_JJ like_IN this_DT ,_, they_PP do_VVP by_IN no_DT means_NNS renounce_VVP their_PP$ claim_NN to_TO 
more_RBR solid_JJ tribute_NN ._SENT 

Time_NN out_RB of_IN mind_VV the_DT piratical_JJ proas_NNS of_IN the_DT Malays_NNS ,_, lurking_VVG among_IN the_DT 
low_JJ shaded_JJ coves_NNS and_CC islets_NNS of_IN Sumatra_NP ,_, have_VHP sallied_VVN out_RP upon_IN the_DT

With_IN a_DT fair_JJ ,_, fresh_JJ wind_NN ,_, the_DT Pequod_NP was_VBD now_RB drawing_VVG nigh_RB to_TO these_DT 
straits_NNS ;_: Ahab_NP purposing_VVG to_TO pass_VV through_IN them_PP into_IN the_DT Javan_NP sea_NN ,_, and_NP

Nantucketer_NP ,_, in_IN the_DT Pacific_NP ,_, prefers_VVZ to_TO drink_VV before_IN the_DT brackish_JJ

Broad_JJ on_IN both_DT bows_NNS ,_, at_IN the_DT distance_NN of_IN some_DT two_CD or_CC three_CD miles_NNS ,_, and_NP

As_RB if_IN too_RB long_RB lurking_VVG behind_IN the_DT headlands_NNS ,_, till_IN the_DT Pequod_NN should_MD

the_DT three_CD keels_NNS that_WDT were_VBD after_IN them_PP ,_, --though_NN as_IN yet_RB a_DT mile_NN in_IN their_PP$ 
rear_NN ,_, --than_VVD they_PP rallied_VVD again_RB ,_, and_CC forming_VVG in_IN close_JJ ranks_NNS and_CC

Stripped_VVN to_TO our_PP$ shirts_NNS and_CC drawers_NNS ,_, we_PP sprang_VVD to_TO the_DT white-ash_NN ,_, and_NP 
after_IN several_JJ hours_NNS '_'' pulling_VVG were_VBD almost_RB disposed_VVN to_TO renounce_VV the_DT

compact_JJ martial_JJ columns_NNS in_IN which_WDT they_PP had_VHD been_VBN hitherto_RB rapidly_RB and_CC 
steadily_RB swimming_NN ,_, were_VBD now_RB broken_VVN up_RP in_IN one_CD measureless_JJ rout_NN ;_: and_CC 
like_IN King_NP Porus_NP '_POS elephants_NNS in_IN the_DT Indian_JJ battle_NN with_IN Alexander_NP ,_, they_PP 
seemed_VVD going_VVG mad_JJ with_IN consternation_NN ._SENT In_IN all_DT directions_NNS expanding_VVG in_IN

might_MD do_VV well_RB with_IN strawberries_NNS ._SENT When_WRB overflowing_VVG with_IN mutual_JJ 
esteem_NN ,_, the_DT whales_NNS salute_VVP MORE_JJR HOMINUM_NN ._SENT

still_RB engaged_VVN in_IN drugging_VVG the_DT whales_NNS on_IN the_DT frontier_NN of_IN the_DT host_NN ;_: or_CC

of_IN room_NN and_CC some_DT convenient_JJ retreats_NNS were_VBD afforded_VVN them_PP ._SENT But_CC the_DT 
sight_NN of_IN the_DT enraged_JJ drugged_VVN whales_NNS now_RB and_CC then_RB blindly_RB darting_VVG to_TO 
and_CC fro_RB across_IN the_DT circles_NNS ,_, was_VBD nothing_NN to_TO what_WP at_IN last_JJ met_VVN our_PP$ eyes_NNS ._SENT 
It_PP is_VBZ sometimes_RB the_DT custom_NN when_WRB fast_RB to_TO a_DT whale_NN more_RBR than_IN commonly_RB 
powerful_JJ and_CC alert_JJ ,_, to_TO seek_VV to_TO hamstring_VV him_PP ,_, as_IN it_PP were_VBD ,_, by_RB 
sundering_VVG or_CC maiming_VVG his_PP$ gigantic_JJ tail-tendon_NN ._SENT It_PP is_VBZ done_VVN by_IN darting_VVG 
a_DT short-handled_JJ cutting-spade_NN ,_, to_TO which_WDT is_VBZ attached_VVN a_DT rope_NN for_IN 
hauling_VVG it_PP back_RB again_RB ._SENT A_DT whale_NN wounded_VVN (_( as_IN we_PP afterwards_RB learned_VVN )_) in_IN 
this_DT part_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB effectually_RB ,_, as_IN it_PP seemed_VVD ,_, had_VHD broken_VVN away_RP from_IN

revolving_JJ circles_NNS like_IN the_DT lone_JJ mounted_JJ desperado_NN Arnold_NP ,_, at_IN the_DT 
battle_NN of_IN Saratoga_NP ,_, carrying_VVG dismay_NN wherever_WRB he_PP went_VVD ._SENT 

But_CC agonizing_VVG as_IN was_VBD the_DT wound_NN of_IN this_DT whale_NN ,_, and_CC an_DT appalling_JJ 
spectacle_NN enough_RB ,_, any_DT way_NN ;_: yet_RB the_DT peculiar_JJ horror_NN with_IN which_WDT he_PP

the_DT coils_NNS of_IN the_DT harpoon-line_NN round_VV his_PP$ tail_NN ,_, the_DT cutting-spade_NN

with_IN his_PP$ flexible_JJ tail_NN ,_, and_CC tossing_VVG the_DT keen_JJ spade_NN about_IN him_PP ,_, 
wounding_VVG and_CC murdering_VVG his_PP$ own_JJ comrades_NNS ._SENT 

This_DT terrific_JJ object_NN seemed_VVD to_TO recall_VV the_DT whole_JJ herd_NN from_IN their_PP$ 
stationary_JJ fright_NN ._SENT First_RB ,_, the_DT whales_NNS forming_VVG the_DT margin_NN of_IN our_PP$ lake_NN

to_TO heave_VV and_CC swell_VV ;_: the_DT submarine_JJ bridal-chambers_NNS and_CC nurseries_NNS

like_IN to_TO the_DT tumultuous_JJ masses_NNS of_IN block-ice_NN when_WRB the_DT great_JJ river_NN 
Hudson_NP breaks_VVZ up_RP in_IN Spring_NP ,_, the_DT entire_JJ host_NN of_IN whales_NNS came_VVD tumbling_VVG 
upon_IN their_PP$ inner_JJ centre_NN ,_, as_IN if_IN to_TO pile_VV themselves_PP up_RP in_IN one_CD common_NN 
mountain_NN ._SENT Instantly_RB Starbuck_NP and_CC Queequeg_NP changed_VVD places_NNS ;_: Starbuck_NP 
taking_VVG the_DT stern_NN ._SENT 

"_'' Oars_NNS !_SENT Oars_NNS !_SENT "_`` he_PP intensely_RB whispered_VVD ,_, seizing_VVG the_DT helm--_NN "_`` gripe_VV your_PP$ 
oars_NNS ,_, and_CC clutch_VVP your_PP$ souls_NNS ,_, now_RB !_SENT My_NP God_NP ,_, men_NNS ,_, stand_VVP by_IN !_SENT Shove_VV him_PP 
off_RB ,_, you_PP Queequeg--the_VVZ whale_NN there_RB !_SENT --prick_VV him_PP !_SENT --hit_VV him_PP !_SENT Stand_NN 
up--stand_NN up_RB ,_, and_CC stay_VV so_RB !_SENT Spring_NN ,_, men--pull_NN ,_, men_NNS ;_: never_RB mind_VV their_PP$ 
backs--scrape_VV them_PP !_SENT --scrape_NN away_RB !_SENT "_'' 

The_DT boat_NN was_VBD now_RB all_RB but_CC jammed_VVN between_IN two_CD vast_JJ black_JJ bulks_NNS ,_, leaving_VVG 
a_DT narrow_JJ Dardanelles_NP between_IN their_PP$ long_JJ lengths_NNS ._SENT But_CC by_IN desperate_JJ 
endeavor_VV we_PP at_IN last_JJ shot_NN into_IN a_DT temporary_JJ opening_NN ;_: then_RB giving_VVG way_NN 
rapidly_RB ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN earnestly_RB watching_VVG for_IN another_DT outlet_NN ._SENT 
After_IN many_JJ similar_JJ hair-breadth_NN escapes_NNS ,_, we_PP at_IN last_JJ swiftly_RB glided_VVN 
into_IN what_WP had_VHD just_RB been_VBN one_CD of_IN the_DT outer_JJ circles_NNS ,_, but_CC now_RB crossed_VVN by_IN 
random_JJ whales_NNS ,_, all_DT violently_RB making_VVG for_IN one_CD centre_NN ._SENT This_DT lucky_JJ 
salvation_NN was_VBD cheaply_RB purchased_VVN by_IN the_DT loss_NN of_IN Queequeg_NP 's_POS hat_NN ,_, who_WP ,_, 
while_IN standing_NN in_IN the_DT bows_NNS to_TO prick_VV the_DT fugitive_JJ whales_NNS ,_, had_VHD his_PP$ hat_NN 
taken_VVN clean_JJ from_IN his_PP$ head_NN by_IN the_DT air-eddy_NN made_VVN by_IN the_DT sudden_JJ tossing_VVG 
of_IN a_DT pair_NN of_IN broad_JJ flukes_NNS close_JJ by_IN ._SENT 

Riotous_JJ and_CC disordered_VVN as_IN the_DT universal_JJ commotion_NN now_RB was_VBD ,_, it_PP soon_RB 
resolved_VVN itself_PP into_IN what_WP seemed_VVD a_DT systematic_JJ movement_NN ;_: for_IN having_VHG 
clumped_VVN together_RB at_IN last_JJ in_IN one_CD dense_JJ body_NN ,_, they_PP then_RB renewed_VVD their_PP$ 
onward_JJ flight_NN with_IN augmented_JJ fleetness_NN ._SENT Further_JJR pursuit_NN was_VBD useless_JJ ;_: 
but_CC the_DT boats_NNS still_RB lingered_VVN in_IN their_PP$ wake_NN to_TO pick_VV up_RP what_WP drugged_VVN 
whales_NNS might_MD be_VB dropped_VVN astern_RB ,_, and_CC likewise_RB to_TO secure_VV one_CD which_WDT 
Flask_NN had_VHD killed_VVN and_CC waifed_VVN ._SENT The_DT waif_NN is_VBZ a_DT pennoned_JJ pole_NN ,_, two_CD or_CC 
three_CD of_IN which_WDT are_VBP carried_VVN by_IN every_DT boat_NN ;_: and_CC which_WDT ,_, when_WRB additional_JJ 
game_NN is_VBZ at_IN hand_NN ,_, are_VBP inserted_VVN upright_RB into_IN the_DT floating_JJ body_NN of_IN a_DT 
dead_JJ whale_NN ,_, both_CC to_TO mark_VV its_PP$ place_NN on_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB as_RB token_JJ of_IN 
prior_JJ possession_NN ,_, should_MD the_DT boats_NNS of_IN any_DT other_JJ ship_NN draw_NN near_RB ._SENT 

The_DT result_NN of_IN this_DT lowering_VVG was_VBD somewhat_RB illustrative_JJ of_IN that_DT

by_IN some_DT other_JJ craft_NN than_IN the_DT Pequod_NP ._SENT 



CHAPTER_NN 88_CD 

Schools_NP and_CC Schoolmasters_NP ._SENT 


The_DT previous_JJ chapter_NN gave_VVD account_NN of_IN an_DT immense_JJ body_NN or_CC herd_NN of_IN Sperm_NP 
Whales_NNS ,_, and_CC there_EX was_VBD also_RB then_RB given_VVN the_DT probable_JJ cause_NN inducing_VVG 
those_DT vast_JJ aggregations_NNS ._SENT 

Now_RB ,_, though_IN such_JJ great_JJ bodies_NNS are_VBP at_IN times_NNS encountered_VVD ,_, yet_RB ,_, as_RB must_MD 
have_VHP been_VBN seen_VVN ,_, even_RB at_IN the_DT present_JJ day_NN ,_, small_JJ detached_JJ bands_NNS are_VBP 
occasionally_RB observed_VVN ,_, embracing_VVG from_IN twenty_CD to_TO fifty_CD individuals_NNS 
each_DT ._SENT Such_JJ bands_NNS are_VBP known_VVN as_IN schools_NNS ._SENT They_PP generally_RB are_VBP of_IN two_CD 
sorts_NNS ;_: those_DT composed_VVN almost_RB entirely_RB of_IN females_NNS ,_, and_CC those_DT mustering_VVG 
none_NN but_CC young_JJ vigorous_JJ males_NNS ,_, or_CC bulls_NNS ,_, as_IN they_PP are_VBP familiarly_RB 
designated_VVN ._SENT 

In_IN cavalier_JJ attendance_NN upon_IN the_DT school_NN of_IN females_NNS ,_, you_PP invariably_RB see_VVP 
a_DT male_NN of_IN full_JJ grown_JJ magnitude_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB old_JJ ;_: who_WP ,_, upon_IN any_DT alarm_NN ,_, 
evinces_VVZ his_PP$ gallantry_NN by_IN falling_VVG in_IN the_DT rear_NN and_CC covering_VVG the_DT flight_NN 
of_IN his_PP$ ladies_NNS ._SENT In_IN truth_NN ,_, this_DT gentleman_NN is_VBZ a_DT luxurious_JJ Ottoman_NP ,_, 
swimming_VVG about_RB over_IN the_DT watery_JJ world_NN ,_, surroundingly_RB accompanied_VVN by_IN 
all_PDT the_DT solaces_NNS and_CC endearments_NNS of_IN the_DT harem_NN ._SENT The_DT contrast_NN between_IN 
this_DT Ottoman_NP and_CC his_PP$ concubines_NNS is_VBZ striking_JJ ;_: because_IN ,_, while_IN he_PP is_VBZ 
always_RB of_IN the_DT largest_JJS leviathanic_JJ proportions_NNS ,_, the_DT ladies_NNS ,_, even_RB at_IN 
full_JJ growth_NN ,_, are_VBP not_RB more_RBR than_IN one-third_NN of_IN the_DT bulk_NN of_IN an_DT 
average-sized_JJ male_NN ._SENT They_PP are_VBP comparatively_RB delicate_JJ ,_, indeed_RB ;_: I_PP dare_VVP 
say_VV ,_, not_RB to_TO exceed_VV half_PDT a_DT dozen_NN yards_NNS round_VVP the_DT waist_NN ._SENT Nevertheless_RB ,_, 
it_PP cannot_MD be_VB denied_VVN ,_, that_IN/that upon_IN the_DT whole_NN they_PP are_VBP hereditarily_RB 
entitled_VVN to_TO EMBONPOINT_NP ._SENT 

It_PP is_VBZ very_RB curious_JJ to_TO watch_VV this_DT harem_NN and_CC its_PP$ lord_NN in_IN their_PP$ indolent_JJ 
ramblings_NNS ._SENT Like_IN fashionables_NNS ,_, they_PP are_VBP for_IN ever_RB on_IN the_DT move_NN in_IN 
leisurely_JJ search_NN of_IN variety_NN ._SENT You_PP meet_VVP them_PP on_IN the_DT Line_NN in_IN time_NN for_IN 
the_DT full_JJ flower_NN of_IN the_DT Equatorial_NP feeding_NN season_NN ,_, having_VHG just_RB 
returned_VVN ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, from_IN spending_VVG the_DT summer_NN in_IN the_DT Northern_JJ seas_NNS ,_, and_NP 
so_RB cheating_VVG summer_NN of_IN all_DT unpleasant_JJ weariness_NN and_CC warmth_NN ._SENT By_IN the_DT 
time_NN they_PP have_VHP lounged_VVN up_RP and_CC down_RP the_DT promenade_NN of_IN the_DT Equator_NN 
awhile_RB ,_, they_PP start_VVP for_IN the_DT Oriental_JJ waters_NNS in_IN anticipation_NN of_IN the_DT 
cool_JJ season_NN there_RB ,_, and_CC so_RB evade_VV the_DT other_JJ excessive_JJ temperature_NN of_IN 
the_DT year_NN ._SENT 

When_WRB serenely_RB advancing_VVG on_IN one_CD of_IN these_DT journeys_NNS ,_, if_IN any_DT strange_JJ 
suspicious_JJ sights_NNS are_VBP seen_VVN ,_, my_PP$ lord_NN whale_NN keeps_VVZ a_DT wary_JJ eye_NN on_IN his_PP$ 
interesting_JJ family_NN ._SENT Should_MD any_DT unwarrantably_RB pert_JJ young_JJ Leviathan_NP 
coming_VVG that_DT way_NN ,_, presume_VVP to_TO draw_VV confidentially_RB close_JJ to_TO one_CD of_IN the_DT 
ladies_NNS ,_, with_IN what_WP prodigious_JJ fury_NN the_DT Bashaw_NP assails_VVZ him_PP ,_, and_CC chases_NNS 
him_PP away_RB !_SENT High_JJ times_NNS ,_, indeed_RB ,_, if_IN unprincipled_JJ young_JJ rakes_NNS like_IN him_PP 
are_VBP to_TO be_VB permitted_VVN to_TO invade_VV the_DT sanctity_NN of_IN domestic_JJ bliss_NN ;_: though_RB 
do_VVP what_WP the_DT Bashaw_NP will_MD ,_, he_PP cannot_MD keep_VV the_DT most_RBS notorious_JJ Lothario_NN 
out_RB of_IN his_PP$ bed_NN ;_: for_IN ,_, alas_UH !_SENT all_DT fish_NN bed_NN in_IN common_JJ ._SENT As_IN ashore_RB ,_, the_DT 
ladies_NNS often_RB cause_VVP the_DT most_RBS terrible_JJ duels_NNS among_IN their_PP$ rival_NN 
admirers_NNS ;_: just_RB so_RB with_IN the_DT whales_NNS ,_, who_WP sometimes_RB come_VVP to_TO deadly_JJ

sometimes_RB locking_VVG them_PP together_RB ,_, and_CC so_RB striving_VVG for_IN the_DT supremacy_NN 
like_IN elks_NNS that_WDT warringly_RB interweave_VVP their_PP$ antlers_NNS ._SENT Not_RB a_DT few_JJ are_NN 
captured_VVD having_VHG the_DT deep_JJ scars_NNS of_IN these_DT encounters_NNS ,_, --furrowed_JJ heads_NNS ,_, 
broken_VVN teeth_NNS ,_, scolloped_VVN fins_NNS ;_: and_CC in_IN some_DT instances_NNS ,_, wrenched_VVN and_CC

But_CC supposing_VVG the_DT invader_NN of_IN domestic_JJ bliss_NN to_TO betake_VV himself_PP away_RP at_IN 
the_DT first_JJ rush_NN of_IN the_DT harem_NN 's_POS lord_NN ,_, then_RB is_VBZ it_PP very_RB diverting_VVG to_TO

and_CC revels_NNS there_RB awhile_RB ,_, still_RB in_IN tantalizing_VVG vicinity_NN to_TO young_JJ

concubines_NNS ._SENT Granting_VVG other_JJ whales_NNS to_TO be_VB in_IN sight_NN ,_, the_DT fishermen_NNS 
will_MD seldom_RB give_VV chase_NN to_TO one_CD of_IN these_DT Grand_NP Turks_NPS ;_: for_IN these_DT Grand_NP 
Turks_NPS are_VBP too_RB lavish_JJ of_IN their_PP$ strength_NN ,_, and_CC hence_RB their_PP$ unctuousness_NN 
is_VBZ small_JJ ._SENT As_RB for_IN the_DT sons_NNS and_CC the_DT daughters_NNS they_PP beget_VVP ,_, why_WRB ,_, those_DT sons_NNS 
and_CC daughters_NNS must_MD take_VV care_NN of_IN themselves_PP ;_: at_IN least_JJS ,_, with_IN only_RB the_DT 
maternal_JJ help_NN ._SENT For_IN like_IN certain_JJ other_JJ omnivorous_JJ roving_VVG lovers_NNS that_RB 
might_MD be_VB named_VVN ,_, my_PP$ Lord_NP Whale_NP has_VHZ no_DT taste_NN for_IN the_DT nursery_NN ,_, however_RB 
much_RB for_IN the_DT bower_NN ;_: and_CC so_RB ,_, being_VBG a_DT great_JJ traveller_NN ,_, he_PP leaves_VVZ his_PP$ 
anonymous_JJ babies_NNS all_RB over_IN the_DT world_NN ;_: every_DT baby_NN an_DT exotic_JJ ._SENT In_IN good_JJ 
time_NN ,_, nevertheless_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT ardour_NN of_IN youth_NN declines_NNS ;_: as_IN years_NNS and_CC 
dumps_NNS increase_VVP ;_: as_IN reflection_NN lends_VVZ her_PP$ solemn_JJ pauses_NNS ;_: in_IN short_JJ ,_, as_IN a_DT 
general_JJ lassitude_NN overtakes_VVZ the_DT sated_VVN Turk_NN ;_: then_RB a_DT love_NN of_IN ease_NN and_CC 
virtue_NN supplants_VVZ the_DT love_NN for_IN maidens_NNS ;_: our_PP$ Ottoman_NP enters_VVZ upon_IN the_DT 
impotent_JJ ,_, repentant_JJ ,_, admonitory_JJ stage_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, forswears_VVZ ,_, disbands_VVZ 
the_DT harem_NN ,_, and_CC grown_VVN to_TO an_DT exemplary_JJ ,_, sulky_JJ old_JJ soul_NN ,_, goes_VVZ about_RB all_RB 
alone_RB among_IN the_DT meridians_NNS and_CC parallels_NNS saying_VVG his_PP$ prayers_NNS ,_, and_NP 
warning_VVG each_DT young_JJ Leviathan_NP from_IN his_PP$ amorous_JJ errors_NNS ._SENT 

Now_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT harem_NN of_IN whales_NNS is_VBZ called_VVN by_IN the_DT fishermen_NNS a_DT school_NN ,_, so_RB 
is_VBZ the_DT lord_NN and_CC master_NN of_IN that_DT school_NN technically_RB known_VVN as_IN the_DT 
schoolmaster_NN ._SENT It_PP is_VBZ therefore_RB not_RB in_IN strict_JJ character_NN ,_, however_RB 
admirably_RB satirical_JJ ,_, that_IN/that after_IN going_VVG to_TO school_VV himself_PP ,_, he_PP should_MD 
then_RB go_VV abroad_RB inculcating_VVG not_RB what_WP he_PP learned_VVD there_RB ,_, but_CC the_DT folly_NN 
of_IN it_PP ._SENT His_PP$ title_NN ,_, schoolmaster_NN ,_, would_MD very_RB naturally_RB seem_VV derived_VVN 
from_IN the_DT name_NN bestowed_VVN upon_IN the_DT harem_NN itself_PP ,_, but_CC some_DT have_VHP surmised_VVN 
that_IN/that the_DT man_NN who_WP first_RB thus_RB entitled_VVN this_DT sort_NN of_IN Ottoman_JJ whale_NN ,_, must_MD 
have_VHP read_VVN the_DT memoirs_NNS of_IN Vidocq_NP ,_, and_CC informed_VVD himself_PP what_WP sort_NN of_IN a_DT 
country-schoolmaster_NN that_IN/that famous_JJ Frenchman_NN was_VBD in_IN his_PP$ younger_JJR days_NNS ,_, 
and_CC what_WP was_VBD the_DT nature_NN of_IN those_DT occult_JJ lessons_NNS he_PP inculcated_VVD into_IN 
some_DT of_IN his_PP$ pupils_NNS ._SENT 

The_DT same_JJ secludedness_NN and_CC isolation_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT schoolmaster_NN whale_NN 
betakes_VVZ himself_PP in_IN his_PP$ advancing_VVG years_NNS ,_, is_VBZ true_JJ of_IN all_DT aged_VVN Sperm_NN 
Whales_NNS ._SENT Almost_RB universally_RB ,_, a_DT lone_JJ whale--as_NNS a_DT solitary_JJ Leviathan_NP is_VBZ 
called--proves_VVZ an_DT ancient_JJ one_CD ._SENT Like_IN venerable_JJ moss-bearded_JJ Daniel_NP 
Boone_NP ,_, he_PP will_MD have_VH no_RB one_CD near_IN him_PP but_CC Nature_NN herself_PP ;_: and_CC her_PP$ he_PP 
takes_VVZ to_TO wife_NN in_IN the_DT wilderness_NN of_IN waters_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT best_JJS of_IN wives_NNS she_PP 
is_VBZ ,_, though_IN she_PP keeps_VVZ so_RB many_JJ moody_JJ secrets_NNS ._SENT 

The_DT schools_NNS composing_VVG none_NN but_CC young_JJ and_CC vigorous_JJ males_NNS ,_, previously_RB 
mentioned_VVN ,_, offer_VVP a_DT strong_JJ contrast_NN to_TO the_DT harem_NN schools_NNS ._SENT For_IN while_NN 
those_DT female_JJ whales_NNS are_VBP characteristically_RB timid_JJ ,_, the_DT young_JJ males_NNS ,_, or_CC 
forty-barrel-bulls_NNS ,_, as_IN they_PP call_VVP them_PP ,_, are_VBP by_IN far_RB the_DT most_RBS pugnacious_JJ 
of_IN all_DT Leviathans_NP ,_, and_CC proverbially_RB the_DT most_RBS dangerous_JJ to_TO encounter_VV ;_: 
excepting_VVG those_DT wondrous_JJ grey-headed_JJ ,_, grizzled_JJ whales_NNS ,_, sometimes_RB met_VVN ,_, 
and_CC these_DT will_MD fight_VV you_PP like_IN grim_JJ fiends_NNS exasperated_VVN by_IN a_DT penal_JJ 
gout_NN ._SENT 

The_DT Forty-barrel-bull_NP schools_NNS are_VBP larger_JJR than_IN the_DT harem_NN schools_NNS ._SENT 
Like_IN a_DT mob_NN of_IN young_JJ collegians_NNS ,_, they_PP are_VBP full_JJ of_IN fight_NN ,_, fun_NN ,_, and_NP 
wickedness_NN ,_, tumbling_VVG round_NN the_DT world_NN at_IN such_PDT a_DT reckless_JJ ,_, rollicking_VVG 
rate_NN ,_, that_IN/that no_DT prudent_JJ underwriter_NN would_MD insure_VV them_PP any_DT more_JJR than_IN he_PP 
would_MD a_DT riotous_JJ lad_NN at_IN Yale_NP or_CC Harvard_NP ._SENT They_PP soon_RB relinquish_VV this_DT 
turbulence_NN though_RB ,_, and_CC when_WRB about_RB three-fourths_NNS grown_VVN ,_, break_VV up_RP ,_, and_NP 
separately_RB go_VV about_RB in_IN quest_NN of_IN settlements_NNS ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ ,_, harems_NNS ._SENT 

Another_DT point_NN of_IN difference_NN between_IN the_DT male_JJ and_CC female_JJ schools_NNS is_VBZ 
still_RB more_RBR characteristic_JJ of_IN the_DT sexes_NNS ._SENT Say_VV you_PP strike_VV a_DT 
Forty-barrel-bull--poor_NP devil_NN !_SENT all_PDT his_PP$ comrades_NNS quit_VVP him_PP ._SENT But_CC strike_NN 
a_DT member_NN of_IN the_DT harem_NN school_NN ,_, and_CC her_PP$ companions_NNS swim_VVP around_IN her_PP with_IN 
every_DT token_NN of_IN concern_NN ,_, sometimes_RB lingering_VVG so_RB near_IN her_PP and_CC so_RB long_JJ ,_, 
as_IN themselves_PP to_TO fall_VV a_DT prey_NN ._SENT 



CHAPTER_NN 89_CD 

Fast-Fish_NN and_CC Loose-Fish_NN ._SENT 


The_DT allusion_NN to_TO the_DT waif_NN and_CC waif-poles_NNS in_IN the_DT last_JJ chapter_NN but_CC one_CD ,_, 
necessitates_VVZ some_DT account_NN of_IN the_DT laws_NNS and_CC regulations_NNS of_IN the_DT whale_NN 
fishery_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT the_DT waif_NN may_MD be_VB deemed_VVN the_DT grand_JJ symbol_NN and_CC badge_NN ._SENT 

It_PP frequently_RB happens_VVZ that_IN/that when_WRB several_JJ ships_NNS are_VBP cruising_VVG in_IN 
company_NN ,_, a_DT whale_NN may_MD be_VB struck_VVN by_IN one_CD vessel_NN ,_, then_RB escape_VV ,_, and_CC be_VB 
finally_RB killed_VVN and_CC captured_VVN by_IN another_DT vessel_NN ;_: and_CC herein_RB are_VBP 
indirectly_RB comprised_VVN many_JJ minor_JJ contingencies_NNS ,_, all_RB partaking_VVG of_IN this_DT 
one_CD grand_JJ feature_NN ._SENT For_IN example_NN ,_, --after_NN a_DT weary_JJ and_CC perilous_JJ chase_NN 
and_CC capture_VV of_IN a_DT whale_NN ,_, the_DT body_NN may_MD get_VV loose_RB from_IN the_DT ship_NN by_IN 
reason_NN of_IN a_DT violent_JJ storm_NN ;_: and_CC drifting_VVG far_RB away_RB to_TO leeward_RB ,_, be_VB 
retaken_VVN by_IN a_DT second_JJ whaler_NN ,_, who_WP ,_, in_IN a_DT calm_NN ,_, snugly_RB tows_VVZ it_PP alongside_IN ,_, 
without_IN risk_NN of_IN life_NN or_CC line_NN ._SENT Thus_RB the_DT most_RBS vexatious_JJ and_CC violent_JJ 
disputes_NNS would_MD often_RB arise_VV between_IN the_DT fishermen_NNS ,_, were_VBD there_RB not_RB some_RB 
written_VVN or_CC unwritten_JJ ,_, universal_JJ ,_, undisputed_JJ law_NN applicable_JJ to_TO all_DT 
cases_NNS ._SENT 

Perhaps_RB the_DT only_JJ formal_JJ whaling_NN code_NN authorized_VVN by_IN legislative_JJ 
enactment_NN ,_, was_VBD that_IN/that of_IN Holland_NP ._SENT It_PP was_VBD decreed_VVN by_IN the_DT States-General_NP 
in_IN A.D._NP 1695._CD But_CC though_IN no_DT other_JJ nation_NN has_VHZ ever_RB had_VHN any_DT written_VVN 
whaling_VVG law_NN ,_, yet_RB the_DT American_JJ fishermen_NNS have_VH been_VBN their_PP$ own_JJ 
legislators_NNS and_CC lawyers_NNS in_IN this_DT matter_NN ._SENT They_PP have_VHP provided_VVN a_DT system_NN 
which_WDT for_IN terse_JJ comprehensiveness_NN surpasses_VVZ Justinian_NP 's_POS Pandects_NP and_NP 
the_DT By-laws_NP of_IN the_DT Chinese_JJ Society_NP for_IN the_DT Suppression_NN of_IN Meddling_NP 
with_IN other_JJ People_NNS 's_POS Business_NN ._SENT Yes_UH ;_: these_DT laws_NNS might_MD be_VB engraven_VVN on_IN a_DT 
Queen_NP Anne_NP 's_POS forthing_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT barb_NN of_IN a_DT harpoon_NN ,_, and_CC worn_JJ round_NN the_DT 
neck_NN ,_, so_RB small_JJ are_VBP they_PP ._SENT 

I_PP ._SENT A_DT Fast-Fish_NN belongs_VVZ to_TO the_DT party_NN fast_RB to_TO it_PP ._SENT 

II_NP ._SENT A_DT Loose-Fish_NN is_VBZ fair_JJ game_NN for_IN anybody_NN who_WP can_MD soonest_JJS catch_VV it_PP ._SENT 

But_CC what_WP plays_VVZ the_DT mischief_NN with_IN this_DT masterly_JJ code_NN is_VBZ the_DT admirable_JJ 
brevity_NN of_IN it_PP ,_, which_WDT necessitates_VVZ a_DT vast_JJ volume_NN of_IN commentaries_NNS to_TO 
expound_VV it_PP ._SENT 

First_NP :_: What_WP is_VBZ a_DT Fast-Fish_NN ?_SENT Alive_JJ or_CC dead_JJ a_DT fish_NN is_VBZ technically_RB 
fast_RB ,_, when_WRB it_PP is_VBZ connected_VVN with_IN an_DT occupied_JJ ship_NN or_CC boat_NN ,_, by_IN any_DT 
medium_NN at_IN all_DT controllable_JJ by_IN the_DT occupant_NN or_CC occupants_NNS ,_, --a_NN mast_NN ,_, an_DT 
oar_NN ,_, a_DT nine-inch_JJ cable_NN ,_, a_DT telegraph_NN wire_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT strand_NN of_IN cobweb_NN ,_, it_PP 
is_VBZ all_PDT the_DT same_JJ ._SENT Likewise_RB a_DT fish_NN is_VBZ technically_RB fast_JJ when_WRB it_PP bears_VVZ a_DT 
waif_NN ,_, or_CC any_DT other_JJ recognised_VVN symbol_NN of_IN possession_NN ;_: so_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT 
party_NN waifing_VVG it_PP plainly_RB evince_VVP their_PP$ ability_NN at_IN any_DT time_NN to_TO take_VV it_PP 
alongside_RB ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN their_PP$ intention_NN so_RB to_TO do_VV ._SENT 

These_DT are_VBP scientific_JJ commentaries_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT commentaries_NNS of_IN the_DT 
whalemen_NNS themselves_PP sometimes_RB consist_VVP in_IN hard_JJ words_NNS and_CC harder_JJR 
knocks--the_JJ Coke-upon-Littleton_NP of_IN the_DT fist_NN ._SENT True_UH ,_, among_IN the_DT more_RBR 
upright_JJ and_CC honourable_JJ whalemen_NNS allowances_NNS are_VBP always_RB made_VVN for_IN 
peculiar_JJ cases_NNS ,_, where_WRB it_PP would_MD be_VB an_DT outrageous_JJ moral_JJ injustice_NN for_IN 
one_CD party_NN to_TO claim_VV possession_NN of_IN a_DT whale_NN previously_RB chased_VVN or_CC killed_VVN 
by_IN another_DT party_NN ._SENT But_CC others_NNS are_VBP by_IN no_DT means_VVZ so_RB scrupulous_JJ ._SENT 

Some_DT fifty_CD years_NNS ago_RB there_EX was_VBD a_DT curious_JJ case_NN of_IN whale-trover_NN 
litigated_VVN in_IN England_NP ,_, wherein_RB the_DT plaintiffs_NNS set_VVD forth_RB that_IN/that after_IN a_DT 
hard_JJ chase_NN of_IN a_DT whale_NN in_IN the_DT Northern_JJ seas_NNS ;_: and_CC when_WRB indeed_RB they_PP (_( the_DT 
plaintiffs_NNS )_) had_VHD succeeded_VVN in_IN harpooning_VVG the_DT fish_NN ;_: they_PP were_VBD at_IN last_JJ ,_, 
through_IN peril_NN of_IN their_PP$ lives_NNS ,_, obliged_VVN to_TO forsake_VV not_RB only_RB their_PP$ 
lines_NNS ,_, but_CC their_PP$ boat_NN itself_PP ._SENT Ultimately_RB the_DT defendants_NNS (_( the_DT crew_NN of_IN 
another_DT ship_NN )_) came_VVD up_RP with_IN the_DT whale_NN ,_, struck_VVD ,_, killed_VVD ,_, seized_VVD ,_, and_NP 
finally_RB appropriated_VVN it_PP before_IN the_DT very_JJ eyes_NNS of_IN the_DT plaintiffs_NNS ._SENT And_CC 
when_WRB those_DT defendants_NNS were_VBD remonstrated_VVN with_IN ,_, their_PP$ captain_NN snapped_VVD 
his_PP$ fingers_NNS in_IN the_DT plaintiffs_NNS '_POS teeth_NNS ,_, and_CC assured_VVD them_PP that_IN/that by_IN way_NN of_IN 
doxology_NN to_TO the_DT deed_NN he_PP had_VHD done_VVN ,_, he_PP would_MD now_RB retain_VV their_PP$ line_NN ,_, 
harpoons_NNS ,_, and_CC boat_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VHD remained_VVN attached_VVN to_TO the_DT whale_NN at_IN the_DT 
time_NN of_IN the_DT seizure_NN ._SENT Wherefore_RB the_DT plaintiffs_NNS now_RB sued_VVN for_IN the_DT 
recovery_NN of_IN the_DT value_NN of_IN their_PP$ whale_NN ,_, line_NN ,_, harpoons_NNS ,_, and_CC boat_NN ._SENT 

Mr._NP Erskine_NP was_VBD counsel_NN for_IN the_DT defendants_NNS ;_: Lord_NP Ellenborough_NP was_VBD the_DT 
judge_NN ._SENT In_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT defence_NN ,_, the_DT witty_JJ Erskine_NP went_VVD on_RP to_TO

wherein_RB a_DT gentleman_NN ,_, after_IN in_IN vain_JJ trying_VVG to_TO bridle_VV his_PP$ wife_NN 's_POS 
viciousness_NN ,_, had_VHD at_IN last_JJ abandoned_VVD her_PP upon_IN the_DT seas_NNS of_IN life_NN ;_: but_CC in_IN 
the_DT course_NN of_IN years_NNS ,_, repenting_VVG of_IN that_DT step_NN ,_, he_PP instituted_VVD an_DT action_NN 
to_TO recover_VV possession_NN of_IN her_PP ._SENT Erskine_NP was_VBD on_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN ;_: and_CC he_PP 
then_RB supported_VVN it_PP by_IN saying_VVG ,_, that_IN/that though_IN the_DT gentleman_NN had_VHD originally_RB 
harpooned_VVN the_DT lady_NN ,_, and_CC had_VHD once_RB had_VHN her_PP$ fast_JJ ,_, and_CC only_RB by_IN reason_NN of_IN 
the_DT great_JJ stress_NN of_IN her_PP$ plunging_VVG viciousness_NN ,_, had_VHD at_IN last_RB abandoned_VVN 
her_PP$ ;_: yet_RB abandon_VV her_PP he_PP did_VVD ,_, so_IN that_WDT she_PP became_VVD a_DT loose-fish_NN ;_: and_CC 
therefore_RB when_WRB a_DT subsequent_JJ gentleman_NN re-harpooned_VVD her_PP ,_, the_DT lady_NN then_RB 
became_VVD that_IN/that subsequent_JJ gentleman_NN 's_POS property_NN ,_, along_RB with_IN whatever_JJ 
harpoon_NN might_MD have_VH been_VBN found_VVN sticking_VVG in_IN her_PP ._SENT 

Now_RB in_IN the_DT present_JJ case_NN Erskine_NP contended_VVD that_IN/that the_DT examples_NNS of_IN the_DT 
whale_NN and_CC the_DT lady_NN were_VBD reciprocally_RB illustrative_JJ of_IN each_DT other_JJ ._SENT 

These_DT pleadings_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT counter_JJ pleadings_NNS ,_, being_VBG duly_RB heard_VVN ,_, the_DT 
very_RB learned_VVN Judge_NP in_IN set_NN terms_NNS decided_VVD ,_, to_TO wit_VV ,_, --That_NN as_IN for_IN the_DT

controverted_VVN whale_NN ,_, harpoons_NNS ,_, and_CC line_NN ,_, they_PP belonged_VVD to_TO the_DT 
defendants_NNS ;_: the_DT whale_NN ,_, because_IN it_PP was_VBD a_DT Loose-Fish_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT 
final_JJ capture_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT harpoons_NNS and_CC line_NN because_IN when_WRB the_DT fish_NN made_VVD 
off_RB with_IN them_PP ,_, it_PP (_( the_DT fish_NN )_) acquired_VVD a_DT property_NN in_IN those_DT articles_NNS ;_: 
and_CC hence_RB anybody_NN who_WP afterwards_RB took_VVD the_DT fish_NN had_VHD a_DT right_NN to_TO them_PP ._SENT 
Now_RB the_DT defendants_NNS afterwards_RB took_VVD the_DT fish_NN ;_: ergo_RB ,_, the_DT aforesaid_NN 
articles_NNS were_VBD theirs_PP ._SENT 

A_DT common_JJ man_NN looking_VVG at_IN this_DT decision_NN of_IN the_DT very_RB learned_VVN Judge_NP ,_, 
might_MD possibly_RB object_VV to_TO it_PP ._SENT But_CC ploughed_VVD up_RP to_TO the_DT primary_JJ rock_NN of_IN 
the_DT matter_NN ,_, the_DT two_CD great_JJ principles_NNS laid_VVN down_RP in_IN the_DT twin_JJ whaling_NN

Ellenborough_NN in_IN the_DT above_RB cited_VVN case_NN ;_: these_DT two_CD laws_NNS touching_JJ 
Fast-Fish_NN and_CC Loose-Fish_NN ,_, I_PP say_VVP ,_, will_MD ,_, on_IN reflection_NN ,_, be_VB found_VVN the_DT 
fundamentals_NNS of_IN all_DT human_JJ jurisprudence_NN ;_: for_IN notwithstanding_IN its_PP$ 
complicated_JJ tracery_NN of_IN sculpture_NN ,_, the_DT Temple_NP of_IN the_DT Law_NN ,_, like_IN the_DT 
Temple_NP of_IN the_DT Philistines_NNS ,_, has_VHZ but_RB two_CD props_NNS to_TO stand_VV on_RP ._SENT 

Is_VBZ it_PP not_RB a_DT saying_VVG in_IN every_DT one_CD 's_POS mouth_NN ,_, Possession_NP is_VBZ half_NN of_IN the_DT

often_RB possession_NN is_VBZ the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT law_NN ._SENT What_WP are_VBP the_DT sinews_NNS and_CC

possession_NN is_VBZ the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT law_NN ?_SENT What_WP to_TO the_DT rapacious_JJ landlord_NN

What_WP was_VBD America_NP in_IN 1492_CD but_CC a_DT Loose-Fish_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT Columbus_NP struck_VVD

Latin_JJ from_IN the_DT books_NNS of_IN the_DT Laws_NP of_IN England_NP ,_, which_WDT taken_VVN along_RP with_IN

It_PP seems_VVZ that_IN/that some_DT honest_JJ mariners_NNS of_IN Dover_NP ,_, or_CC Sandwich_NP ,_, or_CC some_DT one_CD 
of_IN the_DT Cinque_NP Ports_NP ,_, had_VHD after_IN a_DT hard_JJ chase_NN succeeded_VVN in_IN killing_VVG and_CC

Now_RB when_WRB these_DT poor_JJ sun-burnt_NN mariners_NNS ,_, bare-footed_JJ ,_, and_CC with_IN their_PP$

masters_NNS ,_, is_VBZ a_DT Fast-Fish_NN ._SENT I_PP seize_VVP it_PP as_IN the_DT Lord_NP Warden_NP 's_POS ._SENT "_'' Upon_IN 
this_DT the_DT poor_JJ mariners_NNS in_IN their_PP$ respectful_JJ consternation--so_NN truly_RB

the_DT hard_JJ heart_NN of_IN the_DT learned_VVN gentleman_NN with_IN the_DT copy_NN of_IN Blackstone_NP ._SENT

"_'' But_CC the_DT duke_NN had_VHD nothing_NN to_TO do_VV with_IN taking_VVG this_DT fish_NN ?_SENT "_''

"_`` We_PP have_VHP been_VBN at_IN great_JJ trouble_NN ,_, and_CC peril_NN ,_, and_CC some_DT expense_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ

"_`` It_PP is_VBZ his_PP$ ._SENT "_'' 

In_IN a_DT word_NN ,_, the_DT whale_NN was_VBD seized_VVN and_CC sold_VVN ,_, and_CC his_PP$ Grace_NN the_DT Duke_NP of_IN 
Wellington_NP received_VVD the_DT money_NN ._SENT Thinking_VVG that_IN/that viewed_VVN in_IN some_DT 
particular_JJ lights_NNS ,_, the_DT case_NN might_NN by_IN a_DT bare_JJ possibility_NN in_IN some_DT small_JJ 
degree_NN be_VB deemed_VVN ,_, under_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS ,_, a_DT rather_RB hard_JJ one_CD ,_, an_DT

into_IN full_JJ consideration_NN ._SENT To_TO which_WDT my_PP$ Lord_NP Duke_NP in_IN substance_NN replied_VVD 
(_( both_DT letters_NNS were_VBD published_VVN )_) that_IN/that he_PP had_VHD already_RB done_VVN so_RB ,_, and_NP 
received_VVN the_DT money_NN ,_, and_CC would_MD be_VB obliged_VVN to_TO the_DT reverend_JJ gentleman_NN if_IN 
for_IN the_DT future_NN he_PP (_( the_DT reverend_JJ gentleman_NN )_) would_MD decline_VV meddling_NN 
with_IN other_JJ people_NNS 's_POS business_NN ._SENT Is_VBZ this_DT the_DT still_RB militant_JJ old_JJ man_NN ,_,

It_PP will_MD readily_RB be_VB seen_VVN that_IN/that in_IN this_DT case_NN the_DT alleged_JJ right_NN of_IN the_DT

reason_NN for_IN that_DT ,_, ye_NN lawyers_NNS !_SENT 

In_IN his_PP$ treatise_NN on_IN "_`` Queen-Gold_NP ,_, "_'' or_CC Queen-pinmoney_NN ,_, an_DT old_JJ King_NP 's_POS

indignations_NNS at_IN times_NNS ._SENT

the_DT Guernsey-man_NP had_VHD a_DT little_JJ chat_NN with_IN him_PP ,_, during_IN which_WDT the_DT 
stranger_NN mate_NN expressed_VVD his_PP$ detestation_NN of_IN his_PP$ Captain_NP as_IN a_DT conceited_JJ 
ignoramus_NN ,_, who_WP had_VHD brought_VVN them_PP all_RB into_IN so_RB unsavory_JJ and_CC unprofitable_JJ 
a_DT pickle_NN ._SENT Sounding_VVG him_PP carefully_RB ,_, Stubb_NP further_RBR perceived_VVD that_IN/that the_DT 
Guernsey-man_NP had_VHD not_RB the_DT slightest_JJS suspicion_NN concerning_VVG the_DT 
ambergris_NN ._SENT He_PP therefore_RB held_VVD his_PP$ peace_NN on_IN that_DT head_NN ,_, but_CC otherwise_RB 
was_VBD quite_RB frank_JJ and_CC confidential_JJ with_IN him_PP ,_, so_RB that_IN/that the_DT two_CD quickly_RB 
concocted_VVN a_DT little_JJ plan_NN for_IN both_DT circumventing_VVG and_CC satirizing_VVG the_DT 
Captain_NN ,_, without_IN his_PP$ at_IN all_DT dreaming_VVG of_IN distrusting_VVG their_PP$ sincerity_NN ._SENT

any_DT nonsense_NN that_WDT should_MD come_VV uppermost_RB in_IN him_PP during_IN the_DT interview_NN ._SENT 

By_IN this_DT time_NN their_PP$ destined_JJ victim_NN appeared_VVD from_IN his_PP$ cabin_NN ._SENT He_PP was_VBD a_DT 
small_JJ and_CC dark_JJ ,_, but_CC rather_RB delicate_JJ looking_VVG man_NN for_IN a_DT sea-captain_NN ,_,

ostentatiously_RB put_VVN on_IN the_DT aspect_NN of_IN interpreting_VVG between_IN them_PP ._SENT 

"_`` What_WP shall_MD I_PP say_VV to_TO him_PP first_JJ ?_SENT "_'' said_VVD he_PP ._SENT

Upon_IN this_DT the_DT captain_NN started_VVD ,_, and_CC eagerly_RB desired_VVN to_TO know_VV more_RBR ._SENT 

"_`` What_WP now_RB ?_SENT "_'' said_VVD the_DT Guernsey-man_NP to_TO Stubb_NP ._SENT 

"_'' Why_WRB ,_, since_IN he_PP takes_VVZ it_PP so_RB easy_JJ ,_, tell_VV him_PP that_IN/that now_RB I_PP have_VHP eyed_VVN him_PP

"_'' He_PP vows_VVZ and_CC declares_VVZ ,_, Monsieur_NN ,_, that_IN/that the_DT other_JJ whale_NN ,_, the_DT dried_VVN one_CD ,_,

Instantly_RB the_DT captain_NN ran_VVD forward_RB ,_, and_CC in_IN a_DT loud_JJ voice_NN commanded_VVD his_PP$

"_`` What_WP now_RB ?_SENT "_'' said_VVD the_DT Guernsey-man_NP ,_, when_WRB the_DT Captain_NP had_VHD returned_VVN to_TO

(_( meaning_VVG himself_PP and_CC mate_NN )_) and_CC concluded_VVN by_IN inviting_VVG Stubb_NP down_RP

chief_JJ ,_, and_CC looking_VVG as_RB anxious_JJ as_IN gold-hunters_NNS ._SENT

screaming_VVG ,_, and_CC yelling_VVG ,_, and_CC fighting_VVG around_IN them_PP ._SENT Stubb_NP was_VBD

of_IN bad_JJ smells_NNS without_IN being_VBG absorbed_VVN by_IN it_PP ,_, as_RB one_CD river_NN will_MD flow_VV 
into_IN and_CC then_RB along_RB with_IN another_DT ,_, without_IN at_IN all_DT blending_NN with_IN it_PP for_IN 
a_DT time_NN ._SENT 

"_`` I_PP have_VHP it_PP ,_, I_PP have_VHP it_PP ,_, "_'' cried_VVD Stubb_NP ,_, with_IN delight_NN ,_, striking_JJ something_NN 
in_IN the_DT subterranean_JJ regions_NNS ,_, "_'' a_DT purse_NN !_SENT a_DT purse_NN !_SENT "_''

with_IN your_PP$ thumb_NN ;_: it_PP is_VBZ of_IN a_DT hue_NN between_IN yellow_NN and_CC ash_NN colour_NN ._SENT And_CC 
this_DT ,_, good_JJ friends_NNS ,_, is_VBZ ambergris_NN ,_, worth_JJ a_DT gold_JJ guinea_NN an_DT ounce_NN to_TO any_DT

come_VVN on_IN board_NN ,_, else_RB the_DT ship_NN would_MD bid_VV them_PP good_JJ bye_NN ._SENT 



CHAPTER_NN 92_CD 

Ambergris_NN ._SENT 


Now_RB this_DT ambergris_NN is_VBZ a_DT very_RB curious_JJ substance_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB important_JJ as_RB 
an_DT article_NN of_IN commerce_NN ,_, that_WDT in_IN 1791_CD a_DT certain_JJ Nantucket-born_JJ Captain_NP 
Coffin_NN was_VBD examined_VVN at_IN the_DT bar_NN of_IN the_DT English_NP House_NP of_IN Commons_NP on_IN 
that_DT subject_NN ._SENT For_IN at_IN that_DT time_NN ,_, and_CC indeed_RB until_IN a_DT comparatively_RB 
late_JJ day_NN ,_, the_DT precise_JJ origin_NN of_IN ambergris_NN remained_VVD ,_, like_IN amber_NN 
itself_PP ,_, a_DT problem_NN to_TO the_DT learned_VVD ._SENT Though_IN the_DT word_NN ambergris_NN is_VBZ but_RB 
the_DT French_JJ compound_NN for_IN grey_JJ amber_NN ,_, yet_RB the_DT two_CD substances_NNS are_VBP quite_RB 
distinct_JJ ._SENT For_IN amber_NN ,_, though_RB at_IN times_NNS found_VVN on_IN the_DT sea-coast_NN ,_, is_VBZ also_RB 
dug_VVD up_RP in_IN some_DT far_RB inland_JJ soils_NNS ,_, whereas_IN ambergris_NN is_VBZ never_RB found_VVN 
except_IN upon_IN the_DT sea_NN ._SENT Besides_RB ,_, amber_NN is_VBZ a_DT hard_JJ ,_, transparent_JJ ,_, brittle_JJ ,_, 
odorless_JJ substance_NN ,_, used_VVN for_IN mouth-pieces_NNS to_TO pipes_NNS ,_, for_IN beads_NNS and_CC 
ornaments_NNS ;_: but_CC ambergris_NN is_VBZ soft_JJ ,_, waxy_JJ ,_, and_CC so_RB highly_RB fragrant_JJ and_CC 
spicy_JJ ,_, that_IN/that it_PP is_VBZ largely_RB used_VVN in_IN perfumery_NN ,_, in_IN pastiles_NNS ,_, precious_JJ 
candles_NNS ,_, hair-powders_NNS ,_, and_CC pomatum_NN ._SENT The_DT Turks_NPS use_VVP it_PP in_IN cooking_NN ,_, and_NP 
also_RB carry_VV it_PP to_TO Mecca_NP ,_, for_IN the_DT same_JJ purpose_NN that_IN/that frankincense_NN is_VBZ 
carried_VVN to_TO St._NP Peter_NP 's_POS in_IN Rome_NP ._SENT Some_DT wine_NN merchants_NNS drop_VVP a_DT few_JJ 
grains_NNS into_IN claret_NN ,_, to_TO flavor_VV it_PP ._SENT 

Who_WP would_MD think_VV ,_, then_RB ,_, that_DT such_JJ fine_NN ladies_NNS and_CC gentlemen_NNS should_MD 
regale_VV themselves_PP with_IN an_DT essence_NN found_VVD in_IN the_DT inglorious_JJ bowels_NNS of_IN a_DT 
sick_JJ whale_NN !_SENT Yet_RB so_RB it_PP is_VBZ ._SENT By_IN some_DT ,_, ambergris_NN is_VBZ supposed_VVN to_TO be_VB the_DT 
cause_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN others_NNS the_DT effect_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT dyspepsia_NN in_IN the_DT whale_NN ._SENT How_WRB 
to_TO cure_VV such_PDT a_DT dyspepsia_NN it_PP were_VBD hard_JJ to_TO say_VV ,_, unless_IN by_IN administering_VVG 
three_CD or_CC four_CD boat_NN loads_NNS of_IN Brandreth_NP 's_POS pills_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB running_VVG out_RP 
of_IN harm_NN 's_POS way_NN ,_, as_IN laborers_NNS do_VVP in_IN blasting_VVG rocks_NNS ._SENT 

I_PP have_VHP forgotten_VVN to_TO say_VV that_IN/that there_EX were_VBD found_VVN in_IN this_DT ambergris_NN ,_, 
certain_JJ hard_JJ ,_, round_JJ ,_, bony_JJ plates_NNS ,_, which_WDT at_IN first_JJ Stubb_NP thought_NN might_MD 
be_VB sailors_NNS '_POS trowsers_NNS buttons_NNS ;_: but_CC it_PP afterwards_RB turned_VVD out_RP that_IN/that they_PP 
were_VBD nothing_NN more_JJR than_IN pieces_NNS of_IN small_JJ squid_NN bones_NNS embalmed_VVN in_IN that_DT 
manner_NN ._SENT 

Now_RB that_IN/that the_DT incorruption_NN of_IN this_DT most_RBS fragrant_JJ ambergris_NN should_MD be_VB 
found_VVN in_IN the_DT heart_NN of_IN such_JJ decay_NN ;_: is_VBZ this_DT nothing_NN ?_SENT Bethink_VV thee_NP of_IN 
that_DT saying_NN of_IN St._NP Paul_NP in_IN Corinthians_NNS ,_, about_IN corruption_NN and_CC 
incorruption_NN ;_: how_WRB that_RB we_PP are_VBP sown_VVN in_IN dishonour_NN ,_, but_CC raised_VVD in_IN glory_NN ._SENT 
And_CC likewise_RB call_VVP to_TO mind_VV that_IN/that saying_VVG of_IN Paracelsus_NP about_IN what_WP it_PP is_VBZ 
that_DT maketh_NN the_DT best_JJS musk_NN ._SENT Also_RB forget_VV not_RB the_DT strange_JJ fact_NN that_IN/that of_IN 
all_DT things_NNS of_IN ill-savor_NN ,_, Cologne-water_NP ,_, in_IN its_PP$ rudimental_JJ 
manufacturing_NN stages_NNS ,_, is_VBZ the_DT worst_JJS ._SENT 

I_PP should_MD like_VV to_TO conclude_VV the_DT chapter_NN with_IN the_DT above_JJ appeal_NN ,_, but_RB 
cannot_MD ,_, owing_VVG to_TO my_PP$ anxiety_NN to_TO repel_VV a_DT charge_NN often_RB made_VVD against_IN 
whalemen_NNS ,_, and_CC which_WDT ,_, in_IN the_DT estimation_NN of_IN some_DT already_RB biased_VVN minds_NNS ,_,

of_IN the_DT Frenchman_NN 's_POS two_CD whales_NNS ._SENT Elsewhere_RB in_IN this_DT volume_NN the_DT

is_VBZ throughout_IN a_DT slatternly_JJ ,_, untidy_JJ business_NN ._SENT But_CC there_EX is_VBZ another_DT 
thing_NN to_TO rebut_VV ._SENT They_PP hint_VVP that_IN/that all_DT whales_NNS always_RB smell_VVP bad_JJ ._SENT Now_RB how_WRB 
did_VVD this_DT odious_JJ stigma_NN originate_VV ?_SENT 

I_PP opine_VVP ,_, that_IN/that it_PP is_VBZ plainly_RB traceable_JJ to_TO the_DT first_JJ arrival_NN of_IN the_DT 
Greenland_NP whaling_NN ships_NNS in_IN London_NP ,_, more_JJR than_IN two_CD centuries_NNS ago_RB ._SENT 
Because_IN those_DT whalemen_NNS did_VVD not_RB then_RB ,_, and_CC do_VVP not_RB now_RB ,_, try_VV out_RP their_PP$ 
oil_NN at_IN sea_NN as_IN the_DT Southern_NP ships_NNS have_VHP always_RB done_VVN ;_: but_CC cutting_VVG up_RP the_DT 
fresh_JJ blubber_NN in_IN small_JJ bits_NNS ,_, thrust_VVD it_PP through_IN the_DT bung_JJ holes_NNS of_IN 
large_JJ casks_NNS ,_, and_CC carry_VV it_PP home_NN in_IN that_DT manner_NN ;_: the_DT shortness_NN of_IN the_DT 
season_NN in_IN those_DT Icy_NP Seas_NP ,_, and_CC the_DT sudden_JJ and_CC violent_JJ storms_NNS to_TO which_WDT 
they_PP are_VBP exposed_VVN ,_, forbidding_VVG any_DT other_JJ course_NN ._SENT The_DT consequence_NN is_VBZ ,_, 
that_IN/that upon_IN breaking_VVG into_IN the_DT hold_NN ,_, and_CC unloading_VVG one_PP of_IN these_DT whale_NN 
cemeteries_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT Greenland_NP dock_NN ,_, a_DT savor_NN is_VBZ given_VVN forth_RB somewhat_RB 
similar_JJ to_TO that_DT arising_VVG from_IN excavating_VVG an_DT old_JJ city_NN grave-yard_NN ,_, for_IN 
the_DT foundations_NNS of_IN a_DT Lying-in-Hospital_NP ._SENT 

I_PP partly_RB surmise_VVP also_RB ,_, that_IN/that this_DT wicked_JJ charge_NN against_IN whalers_NNS may_MD be_VB 
likewise_RB imputed_VVN to_TO the_DT existence_NN on_IN the_DT coast_NN of_IN Greenland_NP ,_, in_RB

which_WDT latter_JJ name_NN is_VBZ the_DT one_CD used_VVN by_IN the_DT learned_VVN Fogo_NP Von_NP Slack_NP ,_, in_RB 
his_PP$ great_JJ work_NN on_IN Smells_NP ,_, a_DT text-book_NN on_IN that_DT subject_NN ._SENT As_IN its_PP$ name_NN 
imports_NNS (_( smeer_NP ,_, fat_JJ ;_: berg_NN ,_, to_TO put_VV up_RP )_) ,_, this_DT village_NN was_VBD founded_VVN in_IN 
order_NN to_TO afford_VV a_DT place_NN for_IN the_DT blubber_NN of_IN the_DT Dutch_JJ whale_NN fleet_JJ to_TO 
be_VB tried_VVN out_RP ,_, without_IN being_VBG taken_VVN home_NN to_TO Holland_NP for_IN that_DT purpose_NN ._SENT 
It_PP was_VBD a_DT collection_NN of_IN furnaces_NNS ,_, fat-kettles_NNS ,_, and_CC oil_NN sheds_NNS ;_: and_CC when_WRB 
the_DT works_NNS were_VBD in_IN full_JJ operation_NN certainly_RB gave_VVD forth_RB no_RB very_RB 
pleasant_JJ savor_NN ._SENT But_CC all_PDT this_DT is_VBZ quite_RB different_JJ with_IN a_DT South_NP Sea_NP 
Sperm_NN Whaler_NP ;_: which_WDT in_IN a_DT voyage_NN of_IN four_CD years_NNS perhaps_RB ,_, after_RB 
completely_RB filling_VVG her_PP$ hold_NN with_IN oil_NN ,_, does_VVZ not_RB ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, consume_VVP 
fifty_CD days_NNS in_IN the_DT business_NN of_IN boiling_VVG out_RP ;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT state_NN that_IN/that it_PP 
is_VBZ casked_JJ ,_, the_DT oil_NN is_VBZ nearly_RB scentless_JJ ._SENT The_DT truth_NN is_VBZ ,_, that_IN/that living_VVG or_CC 
dead_RB ,_, if_IN but_CC decently_RB treated_VVN ,_, whales_NNS as_IN a_DT species_NNS are_VBP by_IN no_DT means_NNS 
creatures_NNS of_IN ill_JJ odor_NN ;_: nor_CC can_NN whalemen_NNS be_VB recognised_VVN ,_, as_IN the_DT people_NNS 
of_IN the_DT middle_JJ ages_NNS affected_VVN to_TO detect_VV a_DT Jew_NN in_IN the_DT company_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT 
nose_NN ._SENT Nor_CC indeed_RB can_MD the_DT whale_NN possibly_RB be_VB otherwise_RB than_IN fragrant_JJ ,_, 
when_WRB ,_, as_IN a_DT general_JJ thing_NN ,_, he_PP enjoys_VVZ such_JJ high_JJ health_NN ;_: taking_VVG 
abundance_NN of_IN exercise_NN ;_: always_RB out_RB of_IN doors_NNS ;_: though_RB ,_, it_PP is_VBZ true_JJ ,_, 
seldom_RB in_IN the_DT open_JJ air_NN ._SENT I_PP say_VVP ,_, that_IN/that the_DT motion_NN of_IN a_DT Sperm_NP Whale_NP 's_POS 
flukes_NNS above_IN water_NN dispenses_VVZ a_DT perfume_NN ,_, as_RB when_WRB a_DT musk-scented_NN lady_NN 
rustles_VVZ her_PP$ dress_NN in_IN a_DT warm_JJ parlor_NN ._SENT What_WP then_RB shall_MD I_PP liken_VV the_DT 
Sperm_NN Whale_NP to_TO for_IN fragrance_NN ,_, considering_VVG his_PP$ magnitude_NN ?_SENT Must_MD it_PP not_RB 
be_VB to_TO that_DT famous_JJ elephant_NN ,_, with_IN jewelled_VVN tusks_NNS ,_, and_CC redolent_JJ with_IN

the_DT Great_NP ?_SENT 



CHAPTER_NN 93_CD 

The_DT Castaway_NP ._SENT 


It_PP was_VBD but_CC some_DT few_JJ days_NNS after_IN encountering_VVG the_DT Frenchman_NN ,_, that_IN/that a_DT

and_CC not_RB only_RB that_IN/that ,_, but_CC you_PP must_MD live_VV in_IN it_PP for_IN the_DT time_NN ._SENT It_PP has_VHZ an_DT

that_DT lye_NN quickly_RB exterminates_VVZ it_PP ._SENT Hands_NNS go_VVP diligently_RB along_IN the_DT

CHAPTER_NN 101_CD 

The_DT Decanter_NP ._SENT 


Ere_IN the_DT English_JJ ship_NN fades_NNS from_IN sight_NN ,_, be_VB it_PP set_VVD down_RB here_RB ,_, that_IN/that she_PP 
hailed_VVN from_IN London_NP ,_, and_CC was_VBD named_VVN after_IN the_DT late_JJ Samuel_NP Enderby_NP ,_, 
merchant_NN of_IN that_DT city_NN ,_, the_DT original_NN of_IN the_DT famous_JJ whaling_NN house_NN of_IN 
Enderby_NP &_CC Sons_NPS ;_: a_DT house_NN which_WDT in_IN my_PP$ poor_JJ whaleman_NN 's_POS opinion_NN ,_, comes_VVZ

Whale_NN ;_: though_RB for_IN some_DT score_NN of_IN years_NNS previous_JJ (_( ever_RB since_IN 1726_CD )_) our_PP$

In_IN 1778_CD ,_, a_DT fine_JJ ship_NN ,_, the_DT Amelia_NP ,_, fitted_VVD out_RP for_IN the_DT express_JJ purpose_NN ,_,

CHAPTER_NN 102_CD 

A_DT Bower_NP in_IN the_DT Arsacides_NNS ._SENT 


Hitherto_RB ,_, in_IN descriptively_RB treating_VVG of_IN the_DT Sperm_NP Whale_NP ,_, I_PP have_VHP 
chiefly_RB dwelt_VVN upon_IN the_DT marvels_NNS of_IN his_PP$ outer_JJ aspect_NN ;_: or_CC separately_RB and_CC 
in_IN detail_NN upon_IN some_DT few_JJ interior_JJ structural_JJ features_NNS ._SENT But_CC to_TO a_DT large_JJ 
and_CC thorough_JJ sweeping_JJ comprehension_NN of_IN him_PP ,_, it_PP behooves_VVZ me_PP now_RB to_TO 
unbutton_VV him_PP still_RB further_RBR ,_, and_CC untagging_VVG the_DT points_NNS of_IN his_PP$ hose_NN ,_, 
unbuckling_VVG his_PP$ garters_NNS ,_, and_CC casting_VVG loose_RB the_DT hooks_NNS and_CC the_DT eyes_NNS of_IN 
the_DT joints_NNS of_IN his_PP$ innermost_JJ bones_NNS ,_, set_VVD him_PP before_IN you_PP in_IN his_PP$ 
ultimatum_NN ;_: that_WDT is_VBZ to_TO say_VV ,_, in_IN his_PP$ unconditional_JJ skeleton_NN ._SENT 

But_CC how_WRB now_RB ,_, Ishmael_NP ?_SENT How_WRB is_VBZ it_PP ,_, that_IN/that you_PP ,_, a_DT mere_JJ oarsman_NN in_IN the_DT 
fishery_NN ,_, pretend_JJ to_TO know_VV aught_NN about_IN the_DT subterranean_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT 
whale_NN ?_SENT Did_VVD erudite_JJ Stubb_NP ,_, mounted_VVN upon_IN your_PP$ capstan_NN ,_, deliver_VV 
lectures_NNS on_IN the_DT anatomy_NN of_IN the_DT Cetacea_NP ;_: and_CC by_IN help_NN of_IN the_DT windlass_NN ,_, 
hold_VV up_RP a_DT specimen_NN rib_NN for_IN exhibition_NN ?_SENT Explain_VV thyself_NN ,_, Ishmael_NP ._SENT 
Can_MD you_PP land_VV a_DT full-grown_JJ whale_NN on_IN your_PP$ deck_NN for_IN examination_NN ,_, as_IN a_DT 
cook_NN dishes_NNS a_DT roast-pig_NN ?_SENT Surely_RB not_RB ._SENT A_DT veritable_JJ witness_NN have_VHP you_PP 
hitherto_RB been_VBN ,_, Ishmael_NP ;_: but_CC have_VHP a_DT care_NN how_WRB you_PP seize_VVP the_DT privilege_NN 
of_IN Jonah_NP alone_RB ;_: the_DT privilege_NN of_IN discoursing_VVG upon_IN the_DT joists_NNS and_CC 
beams_NNS ;_: the_DT rafters_NNS ,_, ridge-pole_NN ,_, sleepers_NNS ,_, and_CC under-pinnings_NNS ,_, making_VVG 
up_IN the_DT frame-work_NN of_IN leviathan_NN ;_: and_CC belike_RB of_IN the_DT tallow-vats_NNS ,_, 
dairy-rooms_NNS ,_, butteries_NNS ,_, and_CC cheeseries_NNS in_IN his_PP$ bowels_NNS ._SENT 

I_PP confess_VVP ,_, that_IN/that since_IN Jonah_NP ,_, few_JJ whalemen_NNS have_VHP penetrated_VVN very_RB far_RB 
beneath_IN the_DT skin_NN of_IN the_DT adult_JJ whale_NN ;_: nevertheless_RB ,_, I_PP have_VHP been_VBN 
blessed_VVN with_IN an_DT opportunity_NN to_TO dissect_VV him_PP in_IN miniature_NN ._SENT In_IN a_DT ship_NN I_PP

(_( reydan-siskur_NP ,_, or_CC Wrinkled_NP Bellies_NP )_) at_IN one_CD hundred_CD and_CC twenty_CD yards_NNS ;_: 
that_DT is_VBZ ,_, three_CD hundred_CD and_CC sixty_CD feet_NNS ._SENT And_CC Lacepede_NP ,_, the_DT French_JJ

emptying_VVG into_IN it_PP his_PP$ canvas_NN bag_NN of_IN clothes_NNS ,_, set_VVD them_PP in_IN order_NN there_RB ._SENT

striving_VVG ,_, in_IN his_PP$ rude_JJ way_NN ,_, to_TO copy_VV parts_NNS of_IN the_DT twisted_JJ tattooing_VVG on_RP 
his_PP$ body_NN ._SENT And_CC this_DT tattooing_VVG had_VHD been_VBN the_DT work_NN of_IN a_DT departed_NN

last_JJ ._SENT And_CC this_DT thought_VVD it_PP must_MD have_VH been_VBN which_WDT suggested_VVD to_TO Ahab_NP

CHAPTER_NN 111_CD 

The_DT Pacific_NP ._SENT 


When_WRB gliding_VVG by_IN the_DT Bashee_NP isles_NNS we_PP emerged_VVD at_IN last_JJ upon_IN the_DT great_JJ

To_TO any_DT meditative_JJ Magian_NP rover_NN ,_, this_DT serene_JJ Pacific_NP ,_, once_RB beheld_VVN ,_,

CHAPTER_NN 112_CD 

The_DT Blacksmith_NP ._SENT

The_DT Forge_NP ._SENT

"_`` Oh_UH !_SENT that_DT is_VBZ the_DT one_CD ,_, sir_NN !_SENT Said_VVD I_PP not_RB all_DT seams_NNS and_CC dents_NNS but_CC one_CD ?_SENT "_'' 

"_'' Aye_RB ,_, blacksmith_NN ,_, it_PP is_VBZ the_DT one_CD ;_: aye_RB ,_, man_UH ,_, it_PP is_VBZ unsmoothable_JJ ;_: for_IN 
though_IN thou_NNS only_RB see'st_VVP it_PP here_RB in_IN my_PP$ flesh_NN ,_, it_PP has_VHZ worked_VVN down_RP into_IN 
the_DT bone_NN of_IN my_PP$ skull--THAT_NN is_VBZ all_DT wrinkles_NNS !_SENT But_CC ,_, away_RB with_IN child_NN 's_POS 
play_NN ;_: no_DT more_JJR gaffs_NNS and_CC pikes_NNS to-day_NN ._SENT Look_NN ye_NN here_RB !_SENT "_'' jingling_VVG the_DT 
leathern_JJ bag_NN ,_, as_RB if_IN it_PP were_VBD full_JJ of_IN gold_JJ coins_NNS ._SENT "_`` I_PP ,_, too_RB ,_, want_VVP a_DT

"_'' Horse-shoe_NP stubbs_NP ,_, sir_NN ?_SENT Why_WRB ,_, Captain_NP Ahab_NP ,_, thou_NN hast_NP here_RB ,_, then_RB ,_,

"_`` I_PP know_VVP it_PP ,_, old_JJ man_NN ;_: these_DT stubbs_NP will_MD weld_VV together_RB like_IN glue_NN from_IN

CHAPTER_NN 114_CD 

The_DT Gilder_NP ._SENT 


Penetrating_VVG further_RBR and_CC further_RBR into_IN the_DT heart_NN of_IN the_DT Japanese_JJ 
cruising_VVG ground_NN ,_, the_DT Pequod_NP was_VBD soon_RB all_RB astir_JJ in_IN the_DT fishery_NN ._SENT

At_IN such_JJ times_NNS ,_, under_IN an_DT abated_VVN sun_NN ;_: afloat_RB all_DT day_NN upon_IN smooth_JJ ,_, slow_JJ

of_IN the_DT ocean_NN 's_POS skin_NN ,_, one_PP forgets_VVZ the_DT tiger_NN heart_NN that_WDT pants_VVZ beneath_IN 
it_PP ;_: and_CC would_MD not_RB willingly_RB remember_VV ,_, that_IN/that this_DT velvet_NN paw_NN but_RB 
conceals_VVZ a_DT remorseless_JJ fang_NN ._SENT 

These_DT are_VBP the_DT times_NNS ,_, when_WRB in_IN his_PP$ whale-boat_NN the_DT rover_NN softly_RB feels_VVZ a_DT 
certain_JJ filial_JJ ,_, confident_JJ ,_, land-like_JJ feeling_NN towards_IN the_DT sea_NN ;_: that_WDT he_PP

there_EX steals_VVZ the_DT hush_NN ,_, the_DT hum_NN ;_: you_PP almost_RB swear_VVP that_IN/that play-wearied_JJ

Nor_CC did_VVD such_JJ soothing_JJ scenes_NNS ,_, however_RB temporary_JJ ,_, fail_VVP of_IN at_IN least_JJS as_RB

Oh_UH ,_, grassy_JJ glades_NNS !_SENT oh_UH ,_, ever_RB vernal_JJ endless_JJ landscapes_NNS in_IN the_DT soul_NN ;_: in_IN

again_RB ;_: and_CC are_VBP infants_NNS ,_, boys_NNS ,_, and_CC men_NNS ,_, and_CC Ifs_NP eternally_RB ._SENT Where_WRB lies_VVZ

that_IN/that he_PP has_VHZ always_RB been_VBN jolly_JJ !_SENT "_'' 



CHAPTER_NN 115_CD 

The_DT Pequod_NP Meets_NP The_NP Bachelor_NP ._SENT 


And_CC jolly_JJ enough_NN were_VBD the_DT sights_NNS and_CC the_DT sounds_NNS that_WDT came_VVD bearing_NN 
down_RB before_IN the_DT wind_NN ,_, some_DT few_JJ weeks_NNS after_IN Ahab_NP 's_POS harpoon_NN had_VHD been_VBN

It_PP was_VBD a_DT Nantucket_NP ship_NN ,_, the_DT Bachelor_NP ,_, which_WDT had_VHD just_RB wedged_VVN in_IN her_PP

surprising_JJ success_NN ;_: all_PDT the_DT more_RBR wonderful_JJ ,_, for_IN that_IN/that while_IN cruising_VVG

captain_NN 's_POS and_CC officers_NNS '_POS state-rooms_NNS ._SENT Even_RB the_DT cabin_NN table_NN itself_PP 
had_VHD been_VBN knocked_VVN into_IN kindling-wood_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT cabin_NN mess_NN dined_VVD off_RP the_DT 
broad_JJ head_NN of_IN an_DT oil-butt_NP ,_, lashed_VVD down_RP to_TO the_DT floor_NN for_IN a_DT 
centrepiece_NN ._SENT In_IN the_DT forecastle_NN ,_, the_DT sailors_NNS had_VHD actually_RB caulked_VVN 
and_CC pitched_VVD their_PP$ chests_NNS ,_, and_CC filled_VVD them_PP ;_: it_PP was_VBD humorously_RB added_VVN ,_, 
that_IN/that the_DT cook_NN had_VHD clapped_VVN a_DT head_NN on_IN his_PP$ largest_JJS boiler_NN ,_, and_CC filled_VVN 
it_PP ;_: that_IN/that the_DT steward_NN had_VHD plugged_VVD his_PP$ spare_JJ coffee-pot_NN and_CC filled_VVD it_PP ;_: 
that_IN/that the_DT harpooneers_NNS had_VHD headed_VVN the_DT sockets_NNS of_IN their_PP$ irons_NNS and_CC filled_VVN 
them_PP ;_: that_IN/that indeed_RB everything_NN was_VBD filled_VVN with_IN sperm_NN ,_, except_IN the_DT 
captain_NN 's_POS pantaloons_NN pockets_NNS ,_, and_CC those_DT he_PP reserved_VVD to_TO thrust_VV his_PP$ 
hands_NNS into_IN ,_, in_IN self-complacent_JJ testimony_NN of_IN his_PP$ entire_JJ satisfaction_NN ._SENT 

As_IN this_DT glad_JJ ship_NN of_IN good_JJ luck_NN bore_VVD down_RP upon_IN the_DT moody_JJ Pequod_NP ,_, the_DT 
barbarian_JJ sound_NN of_IN enormous_JJ drums_NNS came_VVD from_IN her_PP$ forecastle_NN ;_: and_CC 
drawing_VVG still_RB nearer_JJR ,_, a_DT crowd_NN of_IN her_PP$ men_NNS were_VBD seen_VVN standing_VVG round_NN her_PP 
huge_JJ try-pots_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, covered_VVN with_IN the_DT parchment-like_JJ POKE_NN or_CC stomach_NN 
skin_NN of_IN the_DT black_JJ fish_NN ,_, gave_VVD forth_RB a_DT loud_JJ roar_NN to_TO every_DT stroke_NN of_IN the_DT 
clenched_VVN hands_NNS of_IN the_DT crew_NN ._SENT On_IN the_DT quarter-deck_NN ,_, the_DT mates_NNS and_CC 
harpooneers_NNS were_VBD dancing_VVG with_IN the_DT olive-hued_JJ girls_NNS who_WP had_VHD eloped_VVN 
with_IN them_PP from_IN the_DT Polynesian_JJ Isles_NP ;_: while_IN suspended_VVN in_IN an_DT

the_DT try-works_NNS ,_, from_IN which_WDT the_DT huge_JJ pots_NNS had_VHD been_VBN removed_VVN ._SENT You_PP would_MD 
have_VHP almost_RB thought_VVN they_PP were_VBD pulling_VVG down_RP the_DT cursed_JJ Bastille_NP ,_, such_JJ 
wild_JJ cries_NNS they_PP raised_VVD ,_, as_IN the_DT now_RB useless_JJ brick_NN and_CC mortar_NN were_VBD 
being_VBG hurled_VVN into_IN the_DT sea_NN ._SENT 

Lord_NP and_CC master_NN over_IN all_PDT this_DT scene_NN ,_, the_DT captain_NN stood_VVD erect_VV on_IN the_DT

And_CC Ahab_NP ,_, he_PP too_RB was_VBD standing_VVG on_IN his_PP$ quarter-deck_NN ,_, shaggy_JJ and_CC black_JJ ,_, 
with_IN a_DT stubborn_JJ gloom_NN ;_: and_CC as_IN the_DT two_CD ships_NNS crossed_VVD each_DT other_JJ 's_POS 
wakes--one_NN all_DT jubilations_NNS for_IN things_NNS passed_VVN ,_, the_DT other_JJ all_RB

"_`` Come_VV aboard_RB ,_, come_VV aboard_RB !_SENT "_'' cried_VVD the_DT gay_JJ Bachelor_NP 's_POS commander_NN ,_,

"_'' Hast_NP seen_VVN the_DT White_NP Whale_NP ?_SENT "_'' gritted_VVD Ahab_NP in_IN reply_NN ._SENT 

"_`` No_UH ;_: only_RB heard_VVN of_IN him_PP ;_: but_CC do_VVP n't_RB believe_VV in_IN him_PP at_IN all_DT ,_, "_'' said_VVD the_DT 
other_JJ good-humoredly_NNS ._SENT "_`` Come_VV aboard_RB !_SENT "_'' 

"_`` Thou_NN art_NN too_RB damned_RB jolly_JJ ._SENT Sail_VV on_IN ._SENT Hast_NP lost_VVD any_DT men_NNS ?_SENT "_'' 

"_`` Not_RB enough_JJ to_TO speak_VV of--two_NN islanders_NNS ,_, that_WDT 's_VBZ all_DT ;_: --but_NN come_VVN aboard_RB ,_,

"_`` How_WRB wondrous_JJ familiar_JJ is_VBZ a_DT fool_NN !_SENT "_'' muttered_VVD Ahab_NP ;_: then_RB aloud_RB ,_, "_'' Thou_NP

And_CC thus_RB ,_, while_IN the_DT one_CD ship_NN went_VVD cheerily_RB before_IN the_DT breeze_NN ,_, the_DT

CHAPTER_NN 116_CD 

The_DT Dying_NP Whale_NP ._SENT 


Not_RB seldom_RB in_IN this_DT life_NN ,_, when_WRB ,_, on_IN the_DT right_JJ side_NN ,_, fortune_NN 's_POS favourites_NNS

Ahab_NP ._SENT 

It_PP was_VBD far_RB down_RB the_DT afternoon_NN ;_: and_CC when_WRB all_PDT the_DT spearings_NNS of_IN the_DT

"_'' He_PP turns_VVZ and_CC turns_VVZ him_PP to_TO it_PP ,_, --how_RB slowly_RB ,_, but_CC how_WRB steadfastly_RB ,_, his_PP$ 
homage-rendering_VVG and_CC invoking_VVG brow_NN ,_, with_IN his_PP$ last_JJ dying_VVG motions_NNS ._SENT He_PP 
too_RB worships_VVZ fire_NN ;_: most_RBS faithful_JJ ,_, broad_JJ ,_, baronial_JJ vassal_NN of_IN the_DT 
sun_NN !_SENT --Oh_NN that_IN/that these_DT too-favouring_JJ eyes_NNS should_MD see_VV these_DT too-favouring_NN 
sights_NNS ._SENT Look_NN !_SENT here_RB ,_, far_RB water-locked_JJ ;_: beyond_IN all_DT hum_NN of_IN human_JJ weal_NN 
or_CC woe_NN ;_: in_IN these_DT most_RBS candid_JJ and_CC impartial_JJ seas_NNS ;_: where_WRB to_TO traditions_NNS

of_IN faith_NN ;_: but_CC see_VV !_SENT no_DT sooner_RBR dead_JJ ,_, than_IN death_NN whirls_NNS round_VVP the_DT 
corpse_NN ,_, and_CC it_PP heads_VVZ some_DT other_JJ way_NN ._SENT 

"_`` Oh_UH ,_, thou_NNS dark_JJ Hindoo_JJ half_NN of_IN nature_NN ,_, who_WP of_IN drowned_JJ bones_NNS hast_NP

"_`` Oh_UH ,_, trebly_RB hooped_VVN and_CC welded_VVN hip_NN of_IN power_NN !_SENT Oh_UH ,_, high_JJ aspiring_JJ ,_,

breaths_NNS of_IN once_RB living_VVG things_NNS ,_, exhaled_VVN as_IN air_NN ,_, but_CC water_NN now_RB ._SENT 

"_'' Then_RB hail_NN ,_, for_IN ever_RB hail_NN ,_, O_NN sea_NN ,_, in_IN whose_WP$ eternal_JJ tossings_NNS the_DT wild_NN 
fowl_NN finds_VVZ his_PP$ only_JJ rest_NN ._SENT Born_VVN of_IN earth_NN ,_, yet_RB suckled_VVN by_IN the_DT sea_NN ;_:

CHAPTER_NN 117_CD 

The_DT Whale_NP Watch_NP ._SENT 


The_DT four_CD whales_NNS slain_VVN that_IN/that evening_NN had_VHD died_VVN wide_RB apart_RB ;_: one_CD ,_, far_RB to_TO 
windward_NN ;_: one_CD ,_, less_RBR distant_JJ ,_, to_TO leeward_RB ;_: one_PP ahead_RB ;_: one_PP astern_RB ._SENT 
These_DT last_JJ three_CD were_VBD brought_VVN alongside_IN ere_IN nightfall_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT

"_'' Aye_RB ,_, aye_RB !_SENT a_DT strange_JJ sight_NN that_IN/that ,_, Parsee_NN :_: --a_NN hearse_NN and_CC its_PP$ plumes_NNS

CHAPTER_NN 118_CD 

The_DT Quadrant_NP ._SENT 


The_DT season_NN for_IN the_DT Line_NN at_IN length_NN drew_VVD near_IN ;_: and_CC every_DT day_NN when_WRB Ahab_NP ,_, 
coming_VVG from_IN his_PP$ cabin_NN ,_, cast_VVD his_PP$ eyes_NNS aloft_RB ,_, the_DT vigilant_JJ helmsman_NN 
would_MD ostentatiously_RB handle_VV his_PP$ spokes_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT eager_JJ mariners_NNS 
quickly_RB run_VVN to_TO the_DT braces_NNS ,_, and_CC would_MD stand_VV there_RB with_IN all_PDT their_PP$ eyes_NNS 
centrally_RB fixed_VVN on_IN the_DT nailed_VVN doubloon_NN ;_: impatient_JJ for_IN the_DT order_NN to_TO 
point_VV the_DT ship_NN 's_POS prow_NN for_IN the_DT equator_NN ._SENT In_IN good_JJ time_NN the_DT order_NN came_VVD ._SENT 
It_PP was_VBD hard_JJ upon_IN high_JJ noon_NN ;_: and_CC Ahab_NP ,_, seated_VVN in_IN the_DT bows_NNS of_IN his_PP$

the_DT sun_NN to_TO determine_VV his_PP$ latitude_NN ._SENT 

Now_RB ,_, in_IN that_DT Japanese_JJ sea_NN ,_, the_DT days_NNS in_IN summer_NN are_VBP as_IN freshets_NNS of_IN 
effulgences_NNS ._SENT That_DT unblinkingly_RB vivid_JJ Japanese_JJ sun_NN seems_VVZ the_DT blazing_VVG

looks_NNS lacquered_VVD ;_: clouds_NNS there_RB are_VBP none_NN ;_: the_DT horizon_NN floats_VVZ ;_: and_CC this_DT 
nakedness_NN of_IN unrelieved_JJ radiance_NN is_VBZ as_RB the_DT insufferable_JJ splendors_NNS of_IN 
God_NP 's_POS throne_NN ._SENT Well_RB that_IN/that Ahab_NP 's_POS quadrant_NN was_VBD furnished_VVN with_IN coloured_VVN

that_DT posture_NN for_IN some_DT moments_NNS to_TO catch_VV the_DT precise_JJ instant_NN when_WRB the_DT

his_PP$ wild_JJ face_NN was_VBD subdued_VVN to_TO an_DT earthly_JJ passionlessness_NN ._SENT At_IN length_NN 
the_DT desired_VVN observation_NN was_VBD taken_VVN ;_: and_CC with_IN his_PP$ pencil_NN upon_IN his_PP$ ivory_NN 
leg_NN ,_, Ahab_NP soon_RB calculated_VVD what_WP his_PP$ latitude_NN must_MD be_VB at_IN that_DT precise_JJ 
instant_JJ ._SENT Then_RB falling_VVG into_IN a_DT moment_NN 's_POS revery_NN ,_, he_PP again_RB looked_VVD up_RP 
towards_IN the_DT sun_NN and_CC murmured_VVD to_TO himself_PP :_: "_`` Thou_NN sea-mark_NN !_SENT thou_NNS high_JJ 
and_CC mighty_JJ Pilot_NN !_SENT thou_NN tellest_NN me_PP truly_RB where_WRB I_NP AM--but_NP canst_JJ thou_NNS 
cast_VV the_DT least_JJS hint_NN where_WRB I_PP SHALL_NP be_VB ?_SENT Or_CC canst_JJ thou_NNS tell_VV where_WRB some_DT 
other_JJ thing_NN besides_IN me_PP is_VBZ this_DT moment_NN living_NN ?_SENT Where_WRB is_VBZ Moby_NP Dick_NP ?_SENT 
This_DT instant_JJ thou_NNS must_MD be_VB eyeing_VVG him_PP ._SENT These_DT eyes_NNS of_IN mine_PP look_VVP into_IN 
the_DT very_JJ eye_NN that_WDT is_VBZ even_RB now_RB beholding_VVG him_PP ;_: aye_RB ,_, and_CC into_IN the_DT eye_NN 
that_DT is_VBZ even_RB now_RB equally_RB beholding_VVG the_DT objects_NNS on_IN the_DT unknown_JJ ,_, 
thither_RB side_NN of_IN thee_NP ,_, thou_NN sun_NN !_SENT "_'' 

Then_RB gazing_VVG at_IN his_PP$ quadrant_NN ,_, and_CC handling_NN ,_, one_CD after_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, its_PP$ 
numerous_JJ cabalistical_JJ contrivances_NNS ,_, he_PP pondered_VVD again_RB ,_, and_CC muttered_VVD :_: 
"_'' Foolish_JJ toy_NN !_SENT babies_NNS '_POS plaything_NN of_IN haughty_JJ Admirals_NNS ,_, and_CC Commodores_NP ,_, 
and_CC Captains_NP ;_: the_DT world_NN brags_VVZ of_IN thee_NP ,_, of_IN thy_NN cunning_NN and_CC might_MD ;_: but_RB 
what_WP after_IN all_DT canst_JJ thou_NNS do_VVP ,_, but_CC tell_VV the_DT poor_JJ ,_, pitiful_JJ point_NN ,_, where_WRB 
thou_NN thyself_NN happenest_NN to_TO be_VB on_IN this_DT wide_JJ planet_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT hand_NN that_RB 
holds_VVZ thee_NP :_: no_UH !_SENT not_RB one_CD jot_NN more_RBR !_SENT Thou_NNS canst_VVD not_RB tell_VV where_WRB one_CD drop_NN 
of_IN water_NN or_CC one_CD grain_NN of_IN sand_NN will_MD be_VB to-morrow_NN noon_NN ;_: and_CC yet_RB with_IN 
thy_JJ impotence_NN thou_NNS insultest_VVG the_DT sun_NN !_SENT Science_NN !_SENT Curse_NN thee_NP ,_, thou_NN 
vain_JJ toy_NN ;_: and_CC cursed_VVD be_VB all_PDT the_DT things_NNS that_WDT cast_VVD man_NN 's_POS eyes_NNS aloft_RB to_TO

"_`` The_DT corpusants_NNS have_VHP mercy_NN on_IN us_PP all_DT ,_, "_'' cried_VVD Stubb_NP ,_, again_RB ._SENT

During_IN the_DT most_RBS violent_JJ shocks_NNS of_IN the_DT Typhoon_NP ,_, the_DT man_NN at_IN the_DT

been_VBN attached_VVN to_TO it--for_NN they_PP were_VBD slack--because_NN some_DT play_NN to_TO the_DT

In_IN a_DT severe_JJ gale_NN like_IN this_DT ,_, while_IN the_DT ship_NN is_VBZ but_CC a_DT tossed_VVD

sort_NN of_IN unwonted_JJ emotion_NN ._SENT 

Some_DT hours_NNS after_IN midnight_NN ,_, the_DT Typhoon_NP abated_VVD so_RB much_RB ,_, that_IN/that through_IN 
the_DT strenuous_JJ exertions_NNS of_IN Starbuck_NP and_CC Stubb--one_NP engaged_VVD forward_RB

CHAPTER_NN 124_CD 

The_DT Needle_NP ._SENT 


Next_JJ morning_NN the_DT not-yet-subsided_JJ sea_NN rolled_VVN in_IN long_JJ slow_JJ billows_NNS of_IN

this_DT hour_NN in_IN the_DT morning_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT sun_NN astern_RB ?_SENT "_''

never_RB again_RB ,_, of_IN itself_PP ,_, recovers_VVZ the_DT original_JJ virtue_NN thus_RB marred_VVN or_CC

course_NN to_TO be_VB changed_VVN accordingly_RB ._SENT The_DT yards_NNS were_VBD hard_RB up_RB ;_: and_CC once_RB 
more_RBR the_DT Pequod_NN thrust_VVD her_PP$ undaunted_JJ bows_NNS into_IN the_DT opposing_JJ wind_NN ,_, for_IN 
the_DT supposed_VVN fair_NN one_PP had_VHD only_RB been_VBN juggling_VVG her_PP ._SENT 

Meanwhile_RB ,_, whatever_WDT were_VBD his_PP$ own_JJ secret_JJ thoughts_NNS ,_, Starbuck_NP said_VVD 
nothing_NN ,_, but_CC quietly_RB he_PP issued_VVD all_DT requisite_JJ orders_NNS ;_: while_IN Stubb_NP and_NP 
Flask--who_NN in_IN some_DT small_JJ degree_NN seemed_VVD then_RB to_TO be_VB sharing_VVG his_PP$ 
feelings--likewise_RB unmurmuringly_RB acquiesced_VVN ._SENT As_RB for_IN the_DT men_NNS ,_, though_RB 
some_DT of_IN them_PP lowly_RB rumbled_VVD ,_, their_PP$ fear_NN of_IN Ahab_NP was_VBD greater_JJR than_IN their_PP$ 
fear_NN of_IN Fate_NP ._SENT But_CC as_RB ever_RB before_RB ,_, the_DT pagan_NN harpooneers_NNS remained_VVD 
almost_RB wholly_RB unimpressed_JJ ;_: or_CC if_IN impressed_VVN ,_, it_PP was_VBD only_RB with_IN a_DT 
certain_JJ magnetism_NN shot_NN into_IN their_PP$ congenial_JJ hearts_NNS from_IN inflexible_JJ 
Ahab_NP 's_POS ._SENT 

For_IN a_DT space_NN the_DT old_JJ man_NN walked_VVD the_DT deck_NN in_IN rolling_VVG reveries_NNS ._SENT But_RB

"_'' Thou_NNS poor_JJ ,_, proud_JJ heaven-gazer_NN and_CC sun_NN 's_POS pilot_NN !_SENT yesterday_RB I_PP wrecked_VVD

Accessory_JJ ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, to_TO the_DT impulse_NN dictating_VVG the_DT thing_NN he_PP was_VBD now_RB

CHAPTER_NN 126_CD 

The_DT Life-Buoy_NP ._SENT 


Steering_VVG now_RB south-eastward_JJ by_IN Ahab_NP 's_POS levelled_VVN steel_NN ,_, and_CC her_PP 
progress_NN solely_RB determined_VVN by_IN Ahab_NP 's_POS level_NN log_NN and_CC line_NN ;_: the_DT Pequod_NP 
held_VVN on_IN her_PP$ path_NN towards_IN the_DT Equator_NN ._SENT Making_VVG so_RB long_RB a_DT passage_NN 
through_IN such_JJ unfrequented_JJ waters_NNS ,_, descrying_VVG no_DT ships_NNS ,_, and_CC ere_IN long_JJ ,_,

mild_JJ ;_: all_PDT these_DT seemed_VVD the_DT strange_JJ calm_JJ things_NNS preluding_VVG some_DT riotous_JJ 
and_CC desperate_JJ scene_NN ._SENT 

At_IN last_JJ ,_, when_WRB the_DT ship_NN drew_VVD near_IN to_TO the_DT outskirts_NNS ,_, as_IN it_PP were_VBD ,_, of_IN the_DT

the_DT dawn_NN ,_, was_VBD sailing_VVG by_IN a_DT cluster_NN of_IN rocky_JJ islets_NNS ;_: the_DT watch--then_NN

Herod_NP 's_POS murdered_VVN Innocents--that_NP one_CD and_CC all_RB ,_, they_PP started_VVD from_IN their_PP$ 
reveries_NNS ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT space_NN of_IN some_DT moments_NNS stood_VVD ,_, or_CC sat_VVD ,_, or_CC leaned_VVN 
all_DT transfixedly_RB listening_VVG ,_, like_IN the_DT carved_VVN Roman_NP slave_NN ,_, while_IN that_DT 
wild_JJ cry_NN remained_VVD within_IN hearing_NN ._SENT The_DT Christian_JJ or_CC civilized_JJ part_NN of_IN 
the_DT crew_NN said_VVD it_PP was_VBD mermaids_NNS ,_, and_CC shuddered_VVD ;_: but_CC the_DT pagan_NN 
harpooneers_NNS remained_VVD unappalled_JJ ._SENT Yet_RB the_DT grey_JJ Manxman--the_NN oldest_JJS 
mariner_JJR of_IN all--declared_JJ that_IN/that the_DT wild_JJ thrilling_JJ sounds_NNS that_WDT were_VBD 
heard_VVN ,_, were_VBD the_DT voices_NNS of_IN newly_RB drowned_VVN men_NNS in_IN the_DT sea_NN ._SENT 

Below_IN in_IN his_PP$ hammock_NN ,_, Ahab_NP did_VVD not_RB hear_VV of_IN this_DT till_NN grey_NN dawn_NN ,_, when_WRB 
he_PP came_VVD to_TO the_DT deck_NN ;_: it_PP was_VBD then_RB recounted_VVN to_TO him_PP by_IN Flask_NP ,_, not_RB 
unaccompanied_JJ with_IN hinted_VVN dark_JJ meanings_NNS ._SENT He_PP hollowly_RB laughed_VVD ,_, and_NP 
thus_RB explained_VVD the_DT wonder_NN ._SENT 

Those_DT rocky_JJ islands_NNS the_DT ship_NN had_VHD passed_VVN were_VBD the_DT resort_NN of_IN great_JJ 
numbers_NNS of_IN seals_NNS ,_, and_CC some_DT young_JJ seals_NNS that_WDT had_VHD lost_VVN their_PP$ dams_NNS ,_, or_CC 
some_DT dams_NNS that_WDT had_VHD lost_VVN their_PP$ cubs_NNS ,_, must_MD have_VH risen_VVN nigh_IN the_DT ship_NN and_CC 
kept_VVN company_NN with_IN her_PP ,_, crying_VVG and_CC sobbing_VVG with_IN their_PP$ human_JJ sort_NN of_IN 
wail_NN ._SENT But_CC this_DT only_RB the_DT more_RBR affected_JJ some_DT of_IN them_PP ,_, because_IN most_RBS

not_RB only_RB from_IN their_PP$ peculiar_JJ tones_NNS when_WRB in_IN distress_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB from_IN
