CHAPTER_NN 128_CD 

The_DT Pequod_NP Meets_NP The_NP Rachel_NP ._SENT 


Next_JJ day_NN ,_, a_DT large_JJ ship_NN ,_, the_DT Rachel_NP ,_, was_VBD descried_VVN ,_, bearing_VVG directly_RB 
down_RB upon_IN the_DT Pequod_NP ,_, all_PDT her_PP$ spars_NNS thickly_RB clustering_VVG with_IN men_NNS ._SENT At_IN 
the_DT time_NN the_DT Pequod_NP was_VBD making_VVG good_JJ speed_NN through_IN the_DT water_NN ;_: but_CC as_RB 
the_DT broad-winged_JJ windward_JJ stranger_NN shot_VVD nigh_RB to_TO her_PP ,_, the_DT boastful_JJ

life_NN fled_VVD from_IN the_DT smitten_VVN hull_NN ._SENT 

"_'' Bad_JJ news_NN ;_: she_PP brings_VVZ bad_JJ news_NN ,_, "_'' muttered_VVD the_DT old_JJ Manxman_NP ._SENT But_CC ere_IN

"_'' Hast_NP seen_VVN the_DT White_NP Whale_NP ?_SENT "_''

CHAPTER_NN 130_CD 

The_DT Hat_NP ._SENT 


And_CC now_RB that_IN/that at_IN the_DT proper_JJ time_NN and_CC place_NN ,_, after_IN so_RB long_JJ and_CC wide_JJ a_DT 
preliminary_JJ cruise_NN ,_, Ahab_NP ,_, --all_NN other_JJ whaling_NN waters_NNS swept--seemed_JJ to_TO

"_`` I_PP will_MD have_VH the_DT first_JJ sight_NN of_IN the_DT whale_NN myself_PP ,_, "_'' --he_NP said_VVD ._SENT "_`` Aye_NP !_SENT

When_WRB in_IN working_VVG with_IN his_PP$ hands_NNS at_IN some_DT lofty_JJ almost_RB isolated_VVN place_NN in_IN

Now_RB ,_, the_DT first_JJ time_NN Ahab_NP was_VBD perched_VVN aloft_RB ;_: ere_IN he_PP had_VHD been_VBN there_RB ten_CD

thousand_CD feet_NNS straight_RB up_RB into_IN the_DT air_NN ;_: then_RB spiralized_VVN downwards_RB ,_, 
and_CC went_VVD eddying_VVG again_RB round_VV his_PP$ head_NN ._SENT

"_`` Your_PP$ hat_NN ,_, your_PP$ hat_NN ,_, sir_NN !_SENT "_'' suddenly_RB cried_VVD the_DT Sicilian_JJ seaman_NN ,_, who_WP

But_CC already_RB the_DT sable_NN wing_NN was_VBD before_IN the_DT old_JJ man_NN 's_POS eyes_NNS ;_: the_DT long_JJ

CHAPTER_NN 131_CD 

The_DT Pequod_NP Meets_NP The_NP Delight_NP ._SENT 


The_DT intense_JJ Pequod_NP sailed_VVD on_RP ;_: the_DT rolling_VVG waves_NNS and_CC days_NNS went_VVD by_IN ;_: the_DT 
life-buoy-coffin_NN still_RB lightly_RB swung_VVN ;_: and_CC another_DT ship_NN ,_, most_JJS 
miserably_RB misnamed_VVN the_DT Delight_NN ,_, was_VBD descried_VVN ._SENT As_IN she_PP drew_VVD nigh_RB ,_, all_RB 
eyes_NNS were_VBD fixed_VVN upon_IN her_PP$ broad_JJ beams_NNS ,_, called_VVN shears_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, in_IN some_DT 
whaling-ships_NNS ,_, cross_VVP the_DT quarter-deck_NN at_IN the_DT height_NN of_IN eight_CD or_CC nine_CD 
feet_NNS ;_: serving_VVG to_TO carry_VV the_DT spare_NN ,_, unrigged_VVD ,_, or_CC disabled_JJ boats_NNS ._SENT 

Upon_IN the_DT stranger_NN 's_POS shears_NNS were_VBD beheld_VVN the_DT shattered_JJ ,_, white_JJ ribs_NNS ,_, and_NP 
some_DT few_JJ splintered_VVN planks_NNS ,_, of_IN what_WP had_VHD once_RB been_VBN a_DT whale-boat_NN ;_: but_RB 
you_PP now_RB saw_VVD through_IN this_DT wreck_NN ,_, as_RB plainly_RB as_IN you_PP see_VVP through_IN the_DT 
peeled_VVN ,_, half-unhinged_JJ ,_, and_CC bleaching_VVG skeleton_NN of_IN a_DT horse_NN ._SENT 

"_'' Hast_NP seen_VVN the_DT White_NP Whale_NP ?_SENT "_'' 

"_'' Look_NN !_SENT "_'' replied_VVD the_DT hollow-cheeked_JJ captain_NN from_IN his_PP$ taffrail_NN ;_: and_CC 
with_IN his_PP$ trumpet_NN he_PP pointed_VVD to_TO the_DT wreck_NN ._SENT 

"_'' Hast_NP killed_VVD him_PP ?_SENT "_'' 

"_'' The_DT harpoon_NN is_VBZ not_RB yet_RB forged_VVN that_IN/that ever_RB will_MD do_VV that_DT ,_, "_'' answered_VVD the_DT 
other_JJ ,_, sadly_RB glancing_VVG upon_IN a_DT rounded_JJ hammock_NN on_IN the_DT deck_NN ,_, whose_WP$ 
gathered_VVN sides_NNS some_DT noiseless_JJ sailors_NNS were_VBD busy_JJ in_IN sewing_NN together_RB ._SENT 

"_`` Not_RB forged_VVN !_SENT "_'' and_CC snatching_VVG Perth_NP 's_POS levelled_VVN iron_NN from_IN the_DT crotch_NN ,_, 
Ahab_NP held_VVD it_PP out_RP ,_, exclaiming--_JJ "_`` Look_NN ye_NN ,_, Nantucketer_NP ;_: here_RB in_IN this_DT 
hand_VV I_PP hold_VV his_PP$ death_NN !_SENT Tempered_VVN in_IN blood_NN ,_, and_CC tempered_VVN by_IN lightning_NN 
are_VBP these_DT barbs_NNS ;_: and_CC I_PP swear_VVP to_TO temper_VV them_PP triply_RB in_IN that_DT hot_JJ place_NN 
behind_IN the_DT fin_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT White_NP Whale_NP most_RBS feels_VVZ his_PP$ accursed_JJ life_NN !_SENT "_'' 

"_'' Then_RB God_NP keep_NN thee_NP ,_, old_JJ man--see'st_NN thou_NNS that_IN/that "_`` --pointing_VVG to_TO the_DT 
hammock--_NN "_`` I_PP bury_VVP but_CC one_CD of_IN five_CD stout_JJ men_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD alive_RB only_RB 
yesterday_NN ;_: but_CC were_VBD dead_JJ ere_IN night_NN ._SENT Only_RB THAT_NP one_CD I_PP bury_VVP ;_: the_DT rest_NN 
were_VBD buried_VVN before_IN they_PP died_VVD ;_: you_PP sail_VVP upon_IN their_PP$ tomb_NN ._SENT "_'' Then_RB 
turning_VVG to_TO his_PP$ crew--_NN "_`` Are_VBP ye_NN ready_JJ there_RB ?_SENT place_VV the_DT plank_NN then_RB on_IN the_DT 
rail_NN ,_, and_CC lift_VV the_DT body_NN ;_: so_RB ,_, then--Oh_NP !_SENT God_NP "_'' --advancing_NN towards_IN the_DT 
hammock_NN with_IN uplifted_VVN hands--_NN "_`` may_MD the_DT resurrection_NN and_CC the_DT life--_NN "_''

CHAPTER_NN 133_CD 

The_DT Chase--First_NP Day_NP ._SENT

"_'' Man_NN the_DT mast-heads_NNS !_SENT Call_VV all_DT hands_NNS !_SENT "_''

*_SYM This_DT motion_NN is_VBZ peculiar_JJ to_TO the_DT sperm_NN whale_NN ._SENT It_PP receives_VVZ its_PP$ 
designation_NN (_( pitchpoling_NN )_) from_IN its_PP$ being_VBG likened_VVN to_TO that_DT preliminary_JJ 
up-and-down_JJ poise_NN of_IN the_DT whale-lance_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT exercise_NN called_VVD 
pitchpoling_NN ,_, previously_RB described_VVN ._SENT By_IN this_DT motion_NN the_DT whale_NN must_MD 
best_JJS and_CC most_RBS comprehensively_RB view_VV whatever_WDT objects_NNS may_MD be_VB encircling_VVG 
him_PP ._SENT 


But_CC soon_RB resuming_VVG his_PP$ horizontal_JJ attitude_NN ,_, Moby_NP Dick_NP swam_VVD swiftly_RB 
round_NN and_CC round_VV the_DT wrecked_VVN crew_NN ;_: sideways_RB churning_VVG the_DT water_NN in_IN his_PP$ 
vengeful_JJ wake_NN ,_, as_RB if_IN lashing_VVG himself_PP up_RP to_TO still_RB another_DT and_CC more_JJR 
deadly_JJ assault_NN ._SENT The_DT sight_NN of_IN the_DT splintered_VVN boat_NN seemed_VVD to_TO madden_VV

swim_NN ,_, --though_NN he_PP could_MD still_RB keep_VV afloat_RB ,_, even_RB in_IN the_DT heart_NN of_IN such_PDT a_DT 
whirlpool_NN as_IN that_DT ;_: helpless_JJ Ahab_NP 's_POS head_NN was_VBD seen_VVN ,_, like_IN a_DT tossed_VVN

"_'' Omen_NN ?_SENT omen_NN ?_SENT --the_JJ dictionary_NN !_SENT If_IN the_DT gods_NNS think_VVP to_TO speak_VV outright_RB to_TO

"_'' Good_JJ !_SENT he_PP will_MD travel_VV slower_JJR now_RB '_POS tis_NNS night_NN ._SENT Down_RB royals_NNS and_CC

CHAPTER_NN 134_CD 

The_DT Chase--Second_NP Day_NP ._SENT 


At_IN day-break_NN ,_, the_DT three_CD mast-heads_NNS were_VBD punctually_RB manned_VVN afresh_RB ._SENT 

"_'' D'ye_NP see_VV him_PP ?_SENT "_'' cried_VVD Ahab_NP after_IN allowing_VVG a_DT little_JJ space_NN for_IN the_DT 
light_JJ to_TO spread_VV ._SENT 

"_`` See_VV nothing_NN ,_, sir_NN ._SENT "_'' 

"_'' Turn_VV up_RP all_DT hands_NNS and_CC make_VV sail_NN !_SENT he_PP travels_VVZ faster_RBR than_IN I_PP thought_VVD 
for_IN ;_: --the_JJ top-gallant_JJ sails_NNS !_SENT --aye_NN ,_, they_PP should_MD have_VH been_VBN kept_VVN on_IN her_PP 
all_DT night_NN ._SENT But_CC no_DT matter--'tis_NN but_CC resting_VVG for_IN the_DT rush_NN ._SENT "_'' 

Here_RB be_VB it_PP said_VVD ,_, that_IN/that this_DT pertinacious_JJ pursuit_NN of_IN one_CD particular_NN 
whale_NN ,_, continued_VVN through_IN day_NN into_IN night_NN ,_, and_CC through_IN night_NN into_IN day_NN ,_, 
is_VBZ a_DT thing_NN by_IN no_DT means_NNS unprecedented_JJ in_IN the_DT South_JJ sea_NN fishery_NN ._SENT For_IN 
such_JJ is_VBZ the_DT wonderful_JJ skill_NN ,_, prescience_NN of_IN experience_NN ,_, and_CC invincible_JJ

Nantucket_NP commanders_NNS ;_: that_WDT from_IN the_DT simple_JJ observation_NN of_IN a_DT whale_NN 
when_WRB last_RB descried_VVN ,_, they_PP will_MD ,_, under_IN certain_JJ given_VVN circumstances_NNS ,_, 
pretty_RB accurately_RB foretell_VV both_CC the_DT direction_NN in_IN which_WDT he_PP will_MD 
continue_VV to_TO swim_VV for_IN a_DT time_NN ,_, while_IN out_RB of_IN sight_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN his_PP$ 
probable_JJ rate_NN of_IN progression_NN during_IN that_DT period_NN ._SENT And_CC ,_, in_IN these_DT 
cases_NNS ,_, somewhat_RB as_IN a_DT pilot_NN ,_, when_WRB about_RB losing_VVG sight_NN of_IN a_DT coast_NN ,_, whose_WP$ 
general_JJ trending_VVG he_PP well_RB knows_VVZ ,_, and_CC which_WDT he_PP desires_VVZ shortly_RB to_TO 
return_NN to_TO again_RB ,_, but_CC at_IN some_DT further_JJR point_NN ;_: like_IN as_IN this_DT pilot_NN stands_VVZ 
by_IN his_PP$ compass_NN ,_, and_CC takes_VVZ the_DT precise_JJ bearing_NN of_IN the_DT cape_NN at_IN present_NN 
visible_JJ ,_, in_IN order_NN the_DT more_RBR certainly_RB to_TO hit_VV aright_RB the_DT remote_JJ ,_, unseen_JJ 
headland_NN ,_, eventually_RB to_TO be_VB visited_VVN :_: so_RB does_VVZ the_DT fisherman_NN ,_, at_IN his_PP$ 
compass_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT whale_NN ;_: for_IN after_RB being_VBG chased_VVN ,_, and_CC diligently_RB 
marked_JJ ,_, through_IN several_JJ hours_NNS of_IN daylight_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, when_WRB night_NN obscures_VVZ 
the_DT fish_NN ,_, the_DT creature_NN 's_POS future_JJ wake_NN through_IN the_DT darkness_NN is_VBZ almost_RB 
as_RB established_VVN to_TO the_DT sagacious_JJ mind_NN of_IN the_DT hunter_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT pilot_NN 's_POS 
coast_NN is_VBZ to_TO him_PP ._SENT So_RB that_IN/that to_TO this_DT hunter_NN 's_POS wondrous_JJ skill_NN ,_, the_DT 
proverbial_JJ evanescence_NN of_IN a_DT thing_NN writ_NN in_IN water_NN ,_, a_DT wake_NN ,_, is_VBZ to_TO all_DT 
desired_VVN purposes_NNS well_RB nigh_RB as_RB reliable_JJ as_IN the_DT steadfast_JJ land_NN ._SENT And_CC as_RB 
the_DT mighty_JJ iron_NN Leviathan_NP of_IN the_DT modern_JJ railway_NN is_VBZ so_RB familiarly_RB 
known_VVN in_IN its_PP$ every_DT pace_NN ,_, that_WDT ,_, with_IN watches_NNS in_IN their_PP$ hands_NNS ,_, men_NNS time_NN 
his_PP$ rate_NN as_IN doctors_NNS that_IN/that of_IN a_DT baby_NN 's_POS pulse_NN ;_: and_CC lightly_RB say_VVP of_IN it_PP ,_, 
the_DT up_RB train_NN or_CC the_DT down_JJ train_NN will_MD reach_VV such_JJ or_CC such_JJ a_DT spot_NN ,_, at_IN 
such_JJ or_CC such_JJ an_DT hour_NN ;_: even_RB so_RB ,_, almost_RB ,_, there_EX are_VBP occasions_NNS when_WRB these_DT 
Nantucketers_NP time_NN that_IN/that other_JJ Leviathan_NP of_IN the_DT deep_JJ ,_, according_VVG to_TO the_DT 
observed_JJ humor_NN of_IN his_PP$ speed_NN ;_: and_CC say_VVP to_TO themselves_PP ,_, so_IN many_JJ hours_NNS 
hence_RB this_DT whale_NN will_MD have_VH gone_VVN two_CD hundred_CD miles_NNS ,_, will_MD have_VH about_RB 
reached_VVN this_DT or_CC that_DT degree_NN of_IN latitude_NN or_CC longitude_NN ._SENT But_CC to_TO render_VV 
this_DT acuteness_NN at_IN all_DT successful_JJ in_IN the_DT end_NN ,_, the_DT wind_NN and_CC the_DT sea_NN 
must_MD be_VB the_DT whaleman_NN 's_POS allies_NNS ;_: for_IN of_IN what_WP present_JJ avail_NN to_TO the_DT 
becalmed_JJ or_CC windbound_JJ mariner_NN is_VBZ the_DT skill_NN that_WDT assures_VVZ him_PP he_PP is_VBZ 
exactly_RB ninety-three_NN leagues_NNS and_CC a_DT quarter_NN from_IN his_PP$ port_NN ?_SENT Inferable_JJ 
from_IN these_DT statements_NNS ,_, are_VBP many_JJ collateral_JJ subtile_JJ matters_NNS touching_JJ 
the_DT chase_NN of_IN whales_NNS ._SENT 

The_DT ship_NN tore_VVD on_RP ;_: leaving_VVG such_PDT a_DT furrow_NN in_IN the_DT sea_NN as_IN when_WRB a_DT 
cannon-ball_NN ,_, missent_NN ,_, becomes_VVZ a_DT plough-share_NN and_CC turns_VVZ up_RP the_DT level_NN 
field_NN ._SENT 

"_'' By_IN salt_NN and_CC hemp_NN !_SENT "_'' cried_VVD Stubb_NP ,_, "_'' but_CC this_DT swift_JJ motion_NN of_IN the_DT deck_NN

"_`` Heed_VV them_PP not_RB !_SENT those_DT teeth_NNS but_CC give_VV new_JJ rowlocks_NNS to_TO your_PP$ oars_NNS ._SENT Pull_VV

"_'' But_CC at_IN every_DT bite_NN ,_, sir_NN ,_, the_DT thin_JJ blades_NNS grow_VVP smaller_JJR and_CC smaller_JJR !_SENT "_'' 

"_`` They_PP will_MD last_VV long_RB enough_RB !_SENT pull_VV on_IN !_SENT --But_NN who_WP can_MD tell_VV "_`` --he_NN

At_IN length_NN as_IN the_DT craft_NN was_VBD cast_VVN to_TO one_CD side_NN ,_, and_CC ran_VVD ranging_VVG along_RP 
with_IN the_DT White_NP Whale_NP 's_POS flank_NN ,_, he_PP seemed_VVD strangely_RB oblivious_JJ of_IN its_PP$

round_VV his_PP$ great_JJ ,_, Monadnock_JJ hump_NN ;_: he_PP was_VBD even_RB thus_RB close_VV to_TO him_PP ;_: when_WRB ,_,
